text2: Turamtai Jesús hebreo chichamejai kakar untsumak : — Elí , Elí , lema sabactani , — timiayi . Nuka ii chichamejai “ Yusru , Yusru ¿ waruka ajapruamsha ukurme ? ” taku timiayi .

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Tamati aints nuni wajainau nuna antukar : — Antuktaram . Yuse chichame etserin Elías yaanchuik pujumia nu tati tusa untsuawai , — tiarmiayi .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Tinamtai aints kichik ampuki we , vino churiniun uruchjai chupir sapapjai iju , mukunat tusa áapamiayi .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Turamtai chikich aints ainau chicharinak : — Inaisata . ¿ Elías taa uwemtikrashtimpiash ? Nu wainkami , — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús ataksha kakar untsumak nuniangka jakamiayi .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Jesús jakamtai , Yus seatai juun jeanam aparmau netimia nu ningki yakíya tseu jaankamiayi . Tura nungka uurkamiayi . Uurmatai pampa ainausha puuntrarmiayi .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: Tura aints iwiartai ainausha ningki urankaru asaramtai , Yuse umirin jakaru ainau untsuri nantakiarmiayi .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Tura kampatam kinta nangkamarai , Yus Jesúsan eemak inankiamtai , nu jakaru ainau iwiarsamunmaya jiinkiar , Yuse yaktarin Jerusalénnum wayaawaramtai , aints untsuri niin wainkarmiayi .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Jesús jakamtai nungka uurmatai , suntar ainau Jesúsan nakarmia nusha , tura ni kapitangkrisha nuna wainkar , tura chikich shamrumtin amia nunasha wainkar shamkarmiayi . Tura shaminak : — Juka nekas Yuse Uchiri ayayi , — tiarmiayi .

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Tura nuwa ainau untsuri arák jiij wajatiarmiayi . Nu nuwa ainau Galilea nungkanmaya taar , Jesúsan nemarsar yaingkiarmiayi .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Nu nuwa irunu Magdalanmaya Maríjai , tura José nukuri Maríjai , tura Zebedeo nuwarijai nuni wajaarmiayi .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Kintamati Arimateanmaya aints kuikiartin José naartin tamiayi . Nusha Jesúsan nemarnuyayi .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Tura Pilatonam we , Jesúsa namangken iwiarsatas iniimiayi . Tamati Pilato : Susataram tusa chichaman akuptukmiayi .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: Turamtai José Jesúsa namangken juki , tarach yamarmajai kangkarmiayi .

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: Tura ni iwiarsatnunam pampa taimu yamarmanam iwiarsamiayi . Tura nuni iwiaras umis , waiitirin kaya juun najanamujai epenmiayi .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Turamtai nuni Magdalanmaya Marí chikich Maríjai iwiarsamun nákainak jiij pujuriarmiayi .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Kashin tsawaar , ayamtai kinta kintamaunum sacerdote ainau fariseo ainaujai Pilaton jiisartas weriarmiayi .

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: Tura chicharinak : — Apua , nu wait chichaman etserin yaanchuik iwiaaku pujak chichaak : ‘ Wi jakan kampatam kinta tepayatun ataksha nantaktatjai , ’ tinuyayi .

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: “ Tu tinu asamtai ni nuiniatiri ainau kashi tariar , ni namangken kasamkarai tusam , kampatam kinta suntarum iwiarsamun wainkarti tusam akupkarta . Nu turachkumningkia , ni namangken kasamkar , aints ainau anangminak : ‘ Nekas jakamunmaya nantakni , ’ tiarai tusam turata . Nu chichamjaingkia aints ainaun yaanchuik anangmawarmia nuna nangkamasarang anangmawartinuitai , — tiarmiayi .

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Tinamtai Pilato aimiak : — Atum wakerakrumka aints ainau iwiarsamun urakarai tusaram suntar ainau atumek akupkataram , — timiayi .

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Tamati ayu tusar weriar , iwiarsamun urakarai tusar , epentairin kaya najanamun sentajai kantserar , apu aarmaurin sello tutaijai nujtukarmiayi . Tura suntar ainau iwiarsamun wainkarat tusar ukurkiarmiayi .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Judío ayamtai kinta nangkamaramtai , tumíng kintati kashik Magdalanmaya Marí chikich Maríjai iwiarsamun jiisartas wearmiayi .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Tura weenai nungka kakarman uurkamiayi . Tura uurmatai Yuse awemamuri nayaimpinmaya tari , epenmiaurin kaya ututun urak nuni keemsamiayi .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Yuse awemamuri peema timianu paan tsantramiayi . Tura ni entsatiri nekas puju jiitsumir amiayi .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Tumamtai suntar ainau nuna wainkar shaminak kura kura wajaarmiayi . Tura jakawa nunisarang ayaarar nungkanam tepesarmiayi .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Turinamtai Yuse awemamuri nuwa taaru ainaun chicharak : — Shamrukairap . Atumka nekasrum Jesús numi winangmanum maawarma nu earme tusan nekajrume .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Juningkia tepatsui . Jakayat ni tímia nunisang nantakni . Ni iwiarsamuri jiistaram .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Turaram wári werum ni nuiniatiri ainau jiisrum : ‘ Jesús jakayat jakamunmaya nantakni . Tura atum weatsrumning , niyá eemak Galilea nungkanam wetatui . Tura asamtai nuni weriram wainkatatrume tawai , ni ujatruktaram . ’ Nunak tajarme , — timiayi .

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Tamati nu nuwa ainau shaminayat , nukap warasar iwiarsamun ukukiar : Jesúsa nuiniatiri ainau ujakmi tusar ampukiar waketkiarmiayi .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Waketinai Jesús wantintukmiayi . Tura wantintuk : — ¿ Pujarmek ? — tamati , Jesúsan tariar tikishmatrar nawencha takarsar : — Ameketme juuntam , — tiarmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús chicharak : — Shamrukairap . Yamaikia werum wína yatsur ainau ujatruktaram : Galileanam wearti . Tura nuni jear wína waitkartatui tawai tusaram ni ujatruktaram , — timiayi .

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Nuwa ainau waketkiaramtai , suntar iwiarsamu wainin ainau yaktanam wear , sacerdote juuntri ainaun ni wainkamurin mash ujakarmiayi .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Ujakaram niisha nuna antukar ¿ itiurkamnawaita ? tusar , judío juuntri ainaun jiisartas weriarmiayi . Tura chichasar umisar metek nintimrar , suntar ainaun kuikian nukap susar chicharinak :

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: — Anturtuktaram . Aints ininminamtai tu ujaakrum : Kashi ii kanakur teparin , ni nuiniatiri ainau tariar Jesúsa namangken kasamkar jukiari , anangkuram titaram .

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Turakrumningkia juun apu Pilato nu chichaman antuk , atumin pasé awajtamsarai tusar , ii weri chichamka iwiaratatji , — tiarmiayi .

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Tinamtai suntar ainau ayu tusar kuikian jukiar , judío juuntri tina nunisrik titai tusar wearmiayi . Tura asar judío ainau yamaisha tuke nunisarang tu etserin ainawai .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Nunia Jesúsa nuiniatiri once ( 11 ) ainauti Galileanam wemiaji . Tura Jesús nu muranam wakataram timiau asar , nuni wakamiaji .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Tura Jesús wainkar tikishmatrar : “ Ameketme juuntam , ” timiaji . Antsu chikich ainausha : ¿ Nekasash Jesúsai ? tu nintimrarmiayi .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Tuminamtai Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainauti wajainamunam tejuwach taa iin chichartamak : — Yus wína chichartak : Nayaimpinam tura nungkanmasha wína kakarmarjai mash ainia nu inarta turutmiayi .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Turutin asamtai , mash nungka ainamunam werum , wína nuiniatir wajasarti tusaram , aints ainau nuiniartaram . Tura wína Apaachiru Yuse naari pachisrum , tura Yuse Uchiri naari pachisrum , tura Yuse Wakani naari pachisrum aints ainau imiaitaram .

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Turaram wína chichamur wi akupkamiajrume nuka chikich aints ainau miatrusarang umirkarat tusaram nuiniartaram . Tura nusha kajinmakirap : Nungka amuachmataikia wikia kintajai metek , kashincha kashincha tuke atumjai tsaniasan pujustinuitjai tajarme , — Jesús akatamak turammiaji .

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Yuse Uchiri Jesucriston pachis pengker etserkamu tu nangkamamiayi .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Yaanchuik imiakratin Juan akiintsaing , Yuska niin pachis ni chichamen etsernun Isaías naartinun ni chichamen aamtikramiayi . Nu aarmauka nuwaitai : “ Nintimrataram . Yus chichaak : Ami wetintrumin weti tusan , tura ami jintimin iwiarati tusan , wína akupamurun eemkan akupajai , ” timiayi .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Nisha numi atsamunam taa aints ainaun chicharak : “ Juun Apu wekaasatniun jintan tupin iwiarina nunisrumek atumi nintisha iwiarataram . ” Tu aarmawaitai .

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Yaanchuik aarmawa nunisang Juan numi atsamunam aints ainaun entsanam imaimiayi , tura chicharak : — Wína tunaarun Yus sakturati tusaram , atumi nintimauri yapajiataram . Tu nintimraram maaitaram , — timiayi .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Tura Yuse chichamen etserkau asamtai , Judea nungkanmaya ainau mash anturkatai tusar , Juan pujamunam wearmiayi . Tura Jerusalén yaktanmayasha aints untsuri kaunkarmiayi . Tura Jordán entsanam taar ni tunaarin etserkaramtai , Juan nu aints ainaun imaimiayi .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Juan kamiyu uren kachumnuyayi . Peetirincha nuwap najanamun peeyayi . Tura manchincha yuyayi . Tura wapasa yumirincha uminuyayi .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Tura aints ainaun ujaak : “ Wína ukurun winá nuka nekas wína nangkatusang kakaram atatui . Wikia nekasan mianchau asan , tsuntsumruan sapatri jingkiamurin atiataj tayatun , natsaamau asan atiachminuitjai .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Wikia aya entsanmak imiajrume , antsu ningkia Yuse Wakani atumi nintin engketramatnuitrume , ” Juan timiayi .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Juan aints ainaun imiaak pujai , Jesús Nazaret yaktanmaya Galilea nungkanmaya jiinki : Jordán entsanam wína imiatti tusa Juankun werimiayi .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Tura maai entsanmaya jiinki , nayaim uranniun wainkamiayi . Tura Yuse Wakani yapangma tumau ni muuken winaun wainkamiayi .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Tura nayaimpinmaya chichaman antukmiayi . Nu chichamka nuwaitai : “ Ameka wína uchiruitme , wína anetiruitme . Amin pengker nintimtusan pujajme , ” timiayi .

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Nunia Yuse Wakani Jesúsan aints atsamunam ayamiayi .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Nuni pachim pujuinamunam cuarenta ( 40 ) kinta iwianchi apuri Satanásjai nekapnaisatas pujumiayi . Turamtai Yuse awemamuri ainau Jesúsan wainkartas tariarmiayi .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Suntar ainau Juankun achikiar , kársernum engkewaramtai , Jesús : Yus aints ainaun tu inartinuitai tusa , Yusnum uwemratin chichaman etserkatas Galilea nungkanam tamiayi .

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: Tura chichaak : “ Yuse kintari jeayi . Tura ni aintsri inartin kinta jeatak wajasu asamtai , yaanchuik pasé nintimtaingkia yapajiaram , Yusnum uwemratin chicham nekasampita tusaram umirkataram , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Jesús Galileanam juun kucha kaanmatkarin wekaas , namakan achiun Simón naartinun ni yachí Andrésjai nuni pujuinaun wainkamiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Tura wainak chicharak : — Wína nemartustaram . Turaram namak achiarme nunisrumek aints ainau wína chichamur ujakmintrum , — timiayi .

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Tamati nuna antukar arutsuk ni rederin japawar ukukiar Jesúsan nemarkarmiayi .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Turinamtai Jesús kucha kaanmatkarin arakchichu wekaas , Zebedeo uchirin Santiagon ni yachí Juanjai kanunam engkemsar rederin apainak pujuinaun wainkamiayi .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Tura wainak : “ Wína nemartustaram , ” tusa untsukmiayi . Tamati ni aparin tura ni aintsri ainauncha kanunam ukukiar Jesúsan nemarkarmiayi .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Nunia Capernaum yaktanam jearmiayi . Tura ayamtai kinta asamtai , Jesús iruntai jeanam waya , aints ainaun Yuse chichamen nuiniarmiayi .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Tura nuiniamtai aints ainau ni chichamen antukar nintiminak : “ Juka Moisésa chichamen nuikiartin ainaun nangkamasang iincha Yuse kakarmarijai timiá pengker nuitamji , ” tiarmiayi .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Nu iruntai jeanam aints iwianchrintin pujus kakar untsumak :

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: — Nazaretnumia Jesúsa ¿ warukaya iincha amukratkatasmesha winame ? Wikia nekajme . Yus akupkamuitme . Nekasam pengké tunaarinchau aa nuwaitme , — tu jiyakmiayi .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Tamati Jesús iwianchin kakar chicharak : — Chichatsuk asata . Tura ju aintska ukuktia , — timiayi .

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Tama iwianchkia nu aintsnaka kura kura awajki , kakar untsumak jiinkimiayi .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Tura jiinkiamtai aints ainau nuna wainkar nintimrar mai nuamtak iniininak : — ¿ Ausha waringki ? ¿ Ju yamaram chichamsha waringki ? Juka timiá kakaram asa , iwianch ainaun jiiki akupawapi . Tura akupamu asar , niincha umirinawapi , — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Tura asaramtai wári Galilea nungkanam Jesúsa turamurin pachisar etserkarmiayi .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Nunia iruntai jeanmaya jiinkiar Jesús Simónjai , nunia Andrésjai Simónka jeen wayaawarmiayi . Santiagosha tura Juansha Jesúsan nemariarmiayi . Nu jeaka Simónka pujutiri , tura yachí Andrésu pujutiri ayayi .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Jesús jea wayaamtai : Simónka tsatsari tsuweak peaknum tepawai tusar ujakarmiayi .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Tura ujakaram Jesús ni tepamunam weri , uwejen tap achik inankimiayi . Turamtai tsuweamuri karmachu michatramiayi . Tura michatar wajaki irasartas taarun yuramiayi .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Tsaa nungká wajasai , jau ainauncha tura iwianchrintin ainauncha mash Jesúsan itariarmiayi .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Tura Jesús pujamunam waiti aarin nu yaktanmaya ainau mash kaunkarmiayi .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Tura kaunkaramtai Jesús najaiminauncha untsuri tsuwarmiayi . Tura iwianchrintin ainauncha iwianchnasha untsuri jiirkimiayi . Tura iwianch ainau Jesúsan pachisar : Juka Yuse Uchirintai tusar nekainau asaramtai , ni naarin pachisar chichakarai tusa : — Chichatsuk jiinkitaram , — timiayi .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Nunia kashin tsawaatsaing Jesús nantakmiayi . Tura jeanmaya jiinki aints atsamunam Yusen seatas wemiayi .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Turamtai Simón ni amikri ainaujai ¿ tuning puja ? tusar eakartas jiinkiarmiayi .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Tura Jesúsan wainkar : — Amin mash eatminawai , — tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús chicharak : — Chikich chikich yaktanam tejuwach ainamunam Yuse chichame etserkatasar weartai . Nuna turatasan taawitjai , — timiayi .

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Nunia Galilea nungkanam mash iruntai jea ainamunam Yuse chichamen etserkamaikiak wekaikinij , tura iwianch ainauncha jiiki akupkamaikiak wekaimiayi .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Nunia aints kuchaprintin Jesúsan seatas tarimiayi . Tura taa tikishmatar seak : — Ame wakerutakmeka namangkrusha tsuwaramnawaitme , — timiayi .

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Tamati Jesús wait anentar uwejejai ni namangken takaras chicharak : — Ja ai , wakerajme . Pengker wajasta , — timiayi .

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Tamati nu tamaujai metek tsaar pengker wajasmiayi .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Turamtai Jesús akatak : — Antukta . Ameka juka kichkisha etserkaip . Antsu sacerdotenam weta . Tura nuni weme namangkem inakmasta . Tura pengker wajasu asam , aints ainau pengker wajasmaurumin nekaawarat tusam , Moisés tímia nunismek turata , — Jesús tusa akupkamiayi .

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Tamaitiat ni Jesúsnumia jiinki ni turunamurin pachitsuk aints ainaun mash ujakmiayi . Tura nuna mash antukaru asaramtai , Jesús kichik yaktanmasha paan wainkaram wayaatatkama tujinkamiayi . Antsu yakta aarin aints atsamunam pujumiayi . Turamtai mash yaktanmaya aints ainau jiinkiar Jesúsnum taarmiayi .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Jumchik kinta nangkamaramtai , Jesús ataksha Capernaum yaktanam jeamiayi . Tura jeamtai aints ainau ni amikri jeen pujaun nekaawarmiayi .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Tura asaramtai aints untsuri jeanam wári kautkarmiayi . Tura jeanam kak piakaramtai , waaitinmasha wayaachmin angkanchauyayi . Tura Jesús Yuse chichamen nu aints ainaun ujaak pujurmiayi .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Tura ujaak pujai , cuatro aints pimpirun tampumruwar itaarmiayi .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Tuminamtai aints untsuri jeanam iruntraru asaramtai , Jesúsnum jeatatkamar tujinkar jea yakí wakaar patan urakar , pimpirun tampunam engketun Jesús pujamunam yakiya itararmiayi .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Tura nu cuatro aints pimpirun akupinak : Jesús nekasampi tsuwartatua , tu nintimraru asaramtai , Jesús nuna nekaa , pimpirun chicharak : — Natsachi , tunaarum mash tsangkuramuitme , — timiayi .

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Tamati Moisésa chichamen nuikiartin ainau nuna antú pujuarmiayi . Tura ni nintijai nintiminak :

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: “ ¿ Jusha waruka tuusha chichaawa ? ¿ Ningki Yusetjai tumamtsuash ? ¿ Yusek tunaunaka sakarminchaukai ? ” tu nintimrarmiayi .

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Tuminamtai Jesús ni nintimaurin nekaamiayi . Tura chicharak : — ¿ Waruka tuusha nintimsarmesha pujarme ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: ¿ Warí timiá yumtinuita ? ¿ Ami tunaarum tsangkuramuitme titin yumtinkai ? Antsu nu tachakrisha pimpiru : ¿ Wajakim wekaasata titin yumtinkai ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Tura wikia aints ayatun Yus akupkamu asan , ju nungkanam aints ainau tunaurin tsangkuratnuitjai . Tura wi turamnawaitjai tusan , yamaikia nekamtikiatjarme , — timiayi . Tura pimpirun chicharak :

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: — Amin tajame : Nantakim tampuram jukim jeemin waketkita , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Tamati nu tamaujai metek aints ainau mash jiminai , pimpiru wajaki tampurin juki jiinkimiayi . Turamtai aints ainau mash nintiminak : — Yus nekas kakarmaitai . Ju turamuka pengké kichkisha wainchawaitji , — tiarmiayi .

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Jesús jeanmaya jiinki , ataksha kucha kaanmatkarin wekaimiayi . Tura asamtai aints ainau mash niin kautkaram nuiniarmiayi .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Nunia ukuki , apu akitinam nangkamak , Alfeo uchiri Leví naartinun nuni pujaun wainkamiayi . Nuka romano apuri akatramu asa , aints ainau apun akikiarti tusa kuikian juyayi . Tura Levín wainak Jesús chicharak : — Wína nuiniatir ata , — tama Leví ayu tusa wajaki ni takatrinka mash ukuki Jesúsan nemarsamiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Tura Leví Jesúsan : Yuwita tusa ni jeen jeemiayi . Turamtai Jesús nuni yuwak pujai , kuikian juu untsuri , tura chikich tunaarintin ainausha untsuri nijai iruntrar misanam yuwiarmiayi . Ni nuiniatiri ainausha Jesúsjai tsaniasar wekajiarmia nusha untsuri nuni yuwaarmiayi .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Tura Jesús kuikian juu ainaujai , tura chikich tunaarintin ainaujaisha iruntrar yuwinamtai , fariseo ainausha , tura Moisésa chichame nuikiartin ainausha nuna wainkar , Jesúsa nuiniatiri ainaun iniinak : — ¿ Maj atumi nuitamin waruka kuikian juu ainaujai tura chikich tunaarintin ainaujaisha yuwawa ? — tiarmiayi .

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús nuna antuk aimiak : — Aints pengker pujuinauka tsuwakratnunka yuuminatsui . Antsu najaiminak pujuinau tsuwakratnun yuuminawai . Wikia pengke aintsuitjai tinaunka : Pasé nintimaurum yapajiataram titasnaka tachawitjai , antsu tunaawitjai tinaun : Pasé nintimaurum yapajiaram Yus umirkataram titasan tawitjai , — timiayi .

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Juanku nuiniatiri ainau , tura fariseo nuiniatiri ainausha Yus seami tusar yutsuk pujuarmiayi . Turinamtai chikich aints ainau tariar , Jesúsan iniinak : — Juanku nuiniatiri tura fariseo nuiniatiri ainausha ijarmawar yutsuk Yusen seainawai . ¿ Antsu ami nuiniatiram ainau Yus seami tusar waruka ijarmatskesha pujuinawa ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Tu iniinam Jesús nuikiartamun nuikiartak : — ¿ Aints yamai nuwan nuwatkau ni untsukmau ainaujai iruntrar pujuinauka yutsukek pujuina ? Atsa , nunaka tuminatsui . Antsu aints nuwan nuwatak ni untsukmau ainaujai pujamtai , untsukmau ainau warainak yutanka yutsukka pujuschartinuitai .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Antsu aints nuwan yamai nuwatkamun jukiartin kinta jeamtai , nuniangka untsukmau ainau wake mesekar ijarmawartinuitai . Wikia wína nuiniatir ainaujai pujamtai , nusha nunisarang warainak yutsukka pujuschartin ainawai . Antsu wína jurukiaramtai , nuniangka ijarmawartinuitai , — timiayi .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Nunia Jesús yamaram chichaman ni nuiniarmia nuna pachis ataksha etserak : “ Wejmak arut jaankamtai , ju nungkanam aints kichkisha tarachin yamarman nujtuk apainatsui . Antsu nu turamka , nunia nijaram yamaram tarach setur tuupich wajaayi , tura asa arutrin chingkiana nuna nangkamasang nukap jaankatnuitai .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Nuniangka amuti , vino tutai , yamai kariauka nuwap aparmau mamurunmaka yarakchatnuitai . Nu turamka vino kariak wapakrak nuwap aparmaunaka pujkatnuitai . Tura vino ukaratnuitai , tura nuwap aparmausha pasemartinuitai . Antsu vino yamaram aa nu nuwap aparmau yamarmanam yaratayi , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Chikich ayamtai kintati Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaujai aja japeng nangkaminak , ni nuiniatiri trigo jingkiajin achikiar majurar yukiar wearmiayi .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Turinamtai fariseo nuna wainkar , Jesúsan chicharinak : — Ayamtai kintati Moisés takakmatsuk asataram tusa surimkau wainiatcha ¿ warukaya ami nuiniatirmeka aitkinawa ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Tinamtai Jesús aimiak : — ¿ Atumka ii juuntri Davidta turamuri pachisrum Yuse Papiri aujchaukitrum ? ¿ Nuka yurumkan yuumak ni aintsri ainaujai tsukaminak turuwarmia nuka aujchaukitrum ?

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: Sacerdote apuri , Abiatar naartin pujai , David Yus seatai juun jeanam waya , nuni Yus inaktustin pang Yus susamu , aya sacerdote yutairi au wainiat , nisha sacerdotechutiat yuwamiayi . Tura nijai wekainauncha : Yuwataram tusa susamiayi . Antsu Yus nu turamu pachiska tunaawitai tichamiayi , — timiayi .

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Tura ataksha chicharak : — Yus ayamtai kinta aints ainau ayamrarti tusa najanamiayi . Antsu aints ainau wait wajakarti tusangka , Yus ayamtai kintanka najanachmiayi .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Wi aints ayatun Yus akupkamu asan , aints ainaun ayamtai kintati tu pujusarti tusan inartinuitjai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Chikich ayamtai kintati Jesús ataksha iruntai jeanam wayaamiayi . Tura nuni waya , aints uwejen mutchaun wainkamiayi .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Turamtai fariseo ainau Jesúsan jiisar : Ayamtai kintati ju aintsun tsuwaramtaikia , Jesús tunau wajasi timi , tu nintimsar jiij pujuriarmiayi .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Tuminamtai Jesús uwejen mutchaun chicharak : — Wajakim japen wajasta , — timiayi .

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Tura nu aints japen wajasamtai , Jesús aints ainaun iniak : — ¿ Ayamtai kintatisha pengker aa nuka turatnukai ? ¿ Nu turachkursha pasé aa nuka turatnukai ? ¿ Tura ju kintatisha aints jakashti tusarsha uwemtikratnukai ? ¿ Nu turachkursha ju kintatisha aints maatnukai ? ¿ Atumsha itiur nintimrume ? — Tu iniamaitiat Jesúsan aitske pujuarmiayi .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Tura nu aints pasé nintintin asaramtai , Jesús mash jiis kajerak wake mesekmiayi . Tura uwejen mutchaun chicharak : — Uwejem kutsmarta , — timiayi . Tama uwejen kutsmar pengker wajasmiayi .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Turamtai fariseo ainau jiinkiar , arutsuk Herodesa nemarin ainaujai iruntrar : Jesús maami tusar chichaman najatiarmiayi .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Nunia Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaujai kucha kaanmatkarin wemiayi . Turamtai Galilea nungkanmaya ainau untsuri Jesúsan nemariarmiayi .

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: Tura Judea nungkanmayasha , tura Jerusalén yaktanmayasha , tura Idumea nungkanmayasha , tura Jordán entsa majiniasha , tura Tiro yaktanmayasha , tura Sidón yaktanmayasha aints untsuri Jesús wainchatai takat turamun nekaawaru asar , Jesúsnum kaunkarmiayi .

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Jesús untsuri aintsun tsuwaru asamtai , jau ainau mash : Jesús antingmi tusar shitanikiar wajarmiayi . Aints untsuri kautkaram , chanuntawarai tusa , Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaun : Kanu umistaram tusa akupkamiayi .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Tura iwianchrintin ainau Jesúsan wainkar , naka tikishmatrar untsuminak : — Ameka nekasam Yuse Uchirinme , — tiarmiayi .

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús iwianch ainaun surimiak : — Nuka pengké etserkairap , — tusa chicharkamiayi .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Nunia Jesús mura waka : Aints wína nuiniatir arti tusa , aints ainaun ni wakerimia nuna untsukmiayi . Tura untsukaram Jesúsan tariarmiayi .

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: Tura asamtai doce ( 12 ) aints irunun nijai wekaasarat tusa , tura Yuse chichamen etserkarat tusa akupkatas inaikiamiayi .

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: Tura jau ainauncha tsuwararat tusa , tura iwianchrintin ainauncha iwianchrin jiirkiar akupkarat tusa , Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaun ni kakarmarin susamiayi .

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: Nu doce ( 12 ) aintsu naaringkia nu ainawai : Simón , chikich naari Pedron Jesús inaikiamiayi .

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: Nuniasha Zebedeo uchiri Santiago , nuna yachí Juanjai , mai Boanerges inaikiamiayi . Nuka “ ipiamta tumau ainiarme ” taku tawai .

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: Nunia Andrésnasha , nunia Felipencha , nunia Bartoloméncha , nunia Mateoncha , nunia Tomásnasha , nunia Alfeo uchirin Santiagoncha , nunia Tadeoncha , nunia Simón yaanchuik mesetan najanin amia nu ,

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: nunia Judas Iscariotencha : Wina nuiniatir ata tusa Jesús inaikiamiayi . Antsu nu Judaska ukunam Jesúsan anangka surukmiayi .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Tura jeanam waketkiaramtai , aints ainau ataksha kaunkaru asaramtai , Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaujai yuwartatkamawar tujinkarmiayi .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Turinamtai Jesúsa wearisha nuna nekaawar : ¿ Waurtsuash ? tu nintimsar Jesúsan jukiartas tariarmiayi .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Turinamtai Moisésa chichamen nuikiartin ainau Jerusalénnumia taar pasé chicharinak : — Iwianchi apuri Beelzebú kakarmarijai iwianch ainaun jiiru weawai , — tiarmiayi .

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Tu tinamtai , Jesús nu aints ainaun winitaram tusa untsukmiayi . Tura nuikiartutai chichaman nuiniak : “ ¿ Iwianchi apuri Satanáska itiur ningkisha japmamating ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Nintimrataram . Chikich nungkanmaya apu ainau kajernaikiar kanakar pujusar maaninamtaikia , nu nungkaka wári mesertinuitai .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Tura aints ainau kichik jeanmasha iruntrar kajernaikiar pujuinakka nu jeancha wári ukukiartinuitai .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: Tura Satanás ni inatiri ainaujai kajernaikiar maaninakka ¿ itiur tukesha pujusarting ? Nekasar amunikiartinuitai .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: “ Nintimrataram . Aints nekas kakaram ni jeen pujamtaikia , jeentin jingkiatskeka ni waririn ainia nunaka pengké kichkisha kasarkachartinuitai . Antsu jeeniun jingkiawar waririn jurukiartinuitai .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: “ Nekasan tajarme : Aintsu tunaari ainia nunaka mash tsangkuratnuitai . Tura Yusen pachisar pasé chichaamuncha tsangkuratnuitai .

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: Antsu Yuse Wakanin pachisar pasé chichainaunka pengké tsangkurashtinuitai , antsu nu aintska tuke wait wajakartinuitai , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: Jesús iwianchrinuitai tinu asaramtai nunaka timiayi .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Nunia Jesúsa yachí ainau ni nukurijai Jesús pujamunam taarmiayi . Tura aanum wajasar , Jesús untsutruta tusar , chikich aintsun akupkarmiayi .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: Turinamtai aints niin tentewarmia nu Jesúsan chicharinak : — Nukuram yachim ainaujai aanum wajasar amin aujtamsartas untsurminawai , — tiarmiayi .

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Tu tinam Jesús chicharak : — ¿ Yaa ainawa wína nukursha tura wína yatsursha ? — timiayi .

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Tu iniam aimkacharamtai , niin tentewarmia nuna jiis chicharak : — Juka wína yatsur ainawai . Tura wína nukur ainawai .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Aints Yuse wakeramurin umirinauka wína yatsur tura wína umaar tura wína nukur ainawai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Jesús ataksha kucha kaanmatkarin aints ainaun nuiniartas nangkamamiayi . Aints untsuri iruntraramtai , kanunam engkema pujamtai , aints ainau kucha kaanmatkarin pujusarmiayi .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Turinamtai Jesús nuikiartutai chichaman untsuri ujakmiayi . Tura aints ainaun nuiniartas chicharak :

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: “ Anturtuktaram . Aints arakan tsaamratas jiinkimiayi .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Tura tsaamam , araka jingkiaji jinta kakeekamtai , chingki yakiiya kautkar yuwarmiayi .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Chikich araka jingkiaji kayanam nungka jumchik amanum kakeekamiayi . Tura kakeek nungka jumchik ayat kakarmachu tsapaimiayi .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Antsu tsapaiyat tsaa sukuam kaarmiayi . Tura kangkape atsau asamtai jakamiayi .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Chikich araka jingkiajisha jangki amanum kakeekamiayi . Tura jangki pempearam araksha nerekchamiayi .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Chikitcha nungka pengkernum kakeekamiayi . Tura tsapai pengker nerekmiayi . Tura nu árakka treinta ( 30 ) , tura kitcha sesenta ( 60 ) , tura kitcha cien ( 100 ) nerekmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Aints ainautiram , ju chicham antukrum nintimrataram , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Nunia aints untsuri jiinkiaramtai , Jesúsjai juwakarmia nu tura ni nuiniatiri ainausha Jesúsan iniinak : “ ¿ Nu nuikiartutai chichamsha warimpita ? ” tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : “ Yus aints ainaun itiur inartinuita tusar , chikich aints ainau paan nekaacharmin wainiatrum , atumka paan nekamtikiamuitrume . Antsu Yusen umirtan nakitinauka nuikiartutai chichamak ujakmawaitai .

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: Nuka Yusen umirtan nakitinau asar , ni jiijaingkia paan waininayat , wainmichua nunisarang wajasarti tusan , tura antutnasha antinayat nekaacharti tusan , ni tunaurin tsangkurai tusan tu ujakarjai , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Jesús ataksha chicharak : “ ¿ Ju nuikiartutai chichamka wi taja juka warinkung taj tusaram nekatsrumek ? Ju nekachkurmeka ¿ itiur chikich nuikiartutai chichamsha mashcha nekaatrumek ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: Aints arakan tsaamramia nuka Yuse chichamen etsernua nunisketai .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Tura árak jinta kakeeramia nuka chikich aintsua nunisarang ainawai . Nuka chichaman antinayat , iwianchi apuri Satanás naartin wári tari , nu chichamnaka ni nintinian jurawai .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: Chikich árak kayanam kakeeramia nuka chikich aintsua nunisarang ainawai . Nuka Yuse chichamen antukar , warasar wári umirinawai . Antsu árak kayanam kakeeramia nuka , kangkape atsau asamtai , wári jaawa nunisarang nintiminawai . Tura itiurkachmin amatai tura Yusen nakitin ainau wishikinam , Yuse chichamen umirkachmin nintiminak umirtan wári inainawai .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: Tura árak jangki amanum kakeeramia nuka chikich aintsua nunisarang ainawai . Nu aints ainausha Yuse chichamen antinawai .

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: Tura paan antinayat ju nungkanmaya aa nuna nintiminawai . Tura kuikiartin wajastaj tu nintimsar , mash iruna nuna wakerinawai . Tura asar Yuse chichamen nintimtsuk pujuinawai . Jangki amanum árak kakeeramia nuka nerekchatnuitai . Nu aintska jangki amanum árak kakeerawa nunisarang ainawai .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Antsu árak pengke nungkanam kakeeramia nuka chikich aintsua nunisarang ainawai . Nuka Yuse chichamen antukar pengker umirinawai . Tura asar chikich aints ainau treinta ( 30 ) , tura kitcha sesenta ( 60 ) , tura kitcha cien ( 100 ) nerekua nunisarang ainawai , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Ataksha Jesús chikich nuikiartamun etserak : “ ¿ Aints kichkisha kantii keemak itaa muitsnum engkeawak ? Atsa , tura paan ati tusa , ¿ peaka wamketin pujsatnukai ? Atsa , antsu paan ati tusa , yakí kentsatnuitai .

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Tura yamai uukmau aa nunaka ukunam mash paan inakmastinuitai . Tura yamai nekaachmin ainia nunaka ukunam mash paan nekaawartinuitai .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Aints ainautiram , ju chicham antukrum nintimrataram , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Tura ataksha chicharak : “ Atum antu wearme nu nintimrataram . Yuse chichame jumchik antukrumka jumchik nekaatnuitrume . Antsu Yuse chichame nukap antukakrumningkia , Yuska atumin nuna nangkamasang nukap nekaataram tusa nekamtikramatnuitrume .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Tura asamtai Yuse chichamen nekas pengker nintimtusar pujuinaunka Yuska nuna nangkamasang paan nekamtikiatnuitai . Antsu Yuse chichamen nintimtachunka antukmaurin kajinmamtikui , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Nunia Jesús ataksha chicharak : “ Yus aints ainaun inawa nuka aints arakan tsaamua nunisketai . Aints arakan arakmak tsaamui .

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: Tura arak tsaamrar umisam , kanaisha tura iwiaisha kashisha tura tsawaisha árak tuke tsakaawai . Tura itiur tsakaawa tusangka nekatsui .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: Arak nungkanam tsaamram , ningki pengker tsapaayi . Tura tsapai nukarui , nunia chiikruk árakka katsuawai .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Tura mash katsuaramtai , juuktin kinta jeayi tusar , aints ainau arakan juwinawai , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Ataksha Jesús chicharak : “ ¿ Yuse aintsri ainau itiur yujainawa ? tusan , nuikiartutai chichamjai nuiniartajrume . Anturtuktaram .

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Mostaza jingkiajiya tumawaitai . Nuka chikich araka jingkiajia nuna nangkamasang tuupchitai .

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: Antsu nuka araam tsapai , chikich arakan nangkamasang juuntaitai . Tura kanawe saram tsakaramtai , nuna kanawen mikin amanum chingki pasungminawai , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Tura nuna antukmin ainau nekaawarti tusa , Jesús nuikiartutai chichamchaujaingkia aints ainaunka pengké ujakchamiayi . Antsu ni nuiniatiri ainaujai kanakar pujusar : Nuna takun tajai tusa , nuikiartutai chichaman nekamtiknuyayi .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Chikich kintati kiarai Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaun chicharak : — Atumajin katingtai , — timiayi .

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Tamati ayu tusar , aints ainaun ukukiar kanunam engkemawar , Jesúsan jukiar katingkiarmiayi . Turinamtai chikich aints ainausha kanunam engkemawar wearmiayi .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Tura katinai nasesha nukap nasentan nangkamamiayi . Tura yumi kanunam yaranak ukantias wajamiayi .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Turai Jesús kanu tatangken kanur tepemiayi . Kanuru asamtai Jesúsan shintinak : — Nuikiartinua , ukantiatji . ¿ Ameka nuka pachiatsmek ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús nantaki nasen chicharkamiayi . Tura kucha tamparaun chicharak : — Miaaku asata , — timiayi . Tama nasesha majanmiayi . Tura kuchasha miaaku wajasmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Turamtai Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaun chicharak : — ¿ Waruka timiatcha shamarme ? ¿ Waruka wína nintimturtsurme ? — timiayi .

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Tama timiá shaminak : — ¿ Ausha warí aints asamtaiya nasesha , tura tampaasha umirinawa ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Kucha atumajin katingkiar Gerasa nungkanam nujamkarmiayi .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Tura nuni nujamkar Jesús kanunmaya jiinkiamtai , aints iwianchrintin jakau iwiartainumia waurki winimiayi .

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: Nu iwianchrinnuka jakau iwiartainum tuke pujuyayi . Tura asamtai jirujai jingkiawartatkamawar tujinkarmiayi .

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: Tura timiá kakaram asamtai , aints ainau nepetkamniauka atsuyayi . Jirujai nawencha tura uwejencha jingkiatamaitiat tuke nepetmakmiayi . Tura ataksha jirujai jingkiawarmaitiat , ataksha putirkaja tsurinuyayi .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Tura tuke tsawaisha , tura kashisha aints jakau iwiartainum tura muranmasha kayajai tukumakmaikiak wekainuyayi .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Tura Jesúsan arák winaun wainak , ampuki tari naka tikishmatramiayi .

text: And cried with a loud voice , and said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of the most high God ? I adjure thee by God , that thou torment me not .
text2: Tikishmatram Jesús chicharak : — Iwianchia , ju aintsnumia jiinkita tajame , — timiayi . Tama iwianchkia aintsnumia kakar chicharak : — Jesúsa , Yus yakí puja nuna Uchiriya , ¿ waruka winasha tarutniume ? Yusjai tajame : Winaka waitkaip , — tu jiyamiayi .

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Tu untsumkamtai Jesús iniak : — ¿ Amesha yaachitme ? — tu iniam nu aintsu namangken engkemau aimiak : — Untsuri asar , wikia untsuri naartinuitjai , — timiayi .

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Tura iwianch ainau nu nungkanmaya akuptukai tusa , Jesúsan nukap seamiayi .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Nu muranmasha ayaamsar kuchi untsuri shushungminak wajaarmiayi .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Tura asaramtai iwianch ainau Jesúsan chicharinak : — Au kuchinam engkemataram tusam akupkartukta , — tu searmiayi .

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús ayu tusa tsangkatkamiayi . Turamtai iwianch ainau nu aintsnumia jiinkiar , kuchinam engkemawaramtai , nuka wakenam pisarar , kuchanam ayangkar , kijiakar mash kajingkiarmiayi . Nu kuchikia jimia warang achayawash .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Tuminamtai kuchi wainin ainau nuna wainkar ampukiar wear , yaktanam pujuinauncha tura ajanam pujuinauncha kuchi turunamurin etserkarmiayi . Tura asamtai aints ainau : Nekaami tusar nu yaktanmaya jiinkiarmiayi .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Tura jiinkiar Jesúsnum taar , aints nuwik iwianchrintin pujuya nu pengker wajas wejmakan entsar , pengker nintimias pujaun wainkar shamkarmiayi .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Tura iniinam iwianchruku pujuun turunamuncha , tura kuchi turunamuncha wainkaru ainau mash etserkarmiayi .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Tura asamtai nunia aints ainau : Jesús ii nungkarinia jiinkiti tusar searmiayi .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Tu seainam , Jesús ayu tusa wetas kanunam engkemamiayi . Engkemamtai nuwik iwianchrintin pujuya nuka pengker wajasu asa , Jesúsan chicharak : — Wisha winitjai , — tusa iniimiayi .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Tu iniamaitiat Jesús surimiak : — Atsa , antsu jeemin waketkim Apu Yus amin wait anentramra nuka , ami wearam mash ujakarta , — timiayi .

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Tama nu aintska ayu tusa , Decápolis nungkanam waketki , Jesús niin pengker awajsamurin etserkamiayi . Turamtai nu nungkanmaya ainau nuna antukar mash nukap nintimrarmiayi .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Jesús ataksha kanujai katingkiamtai , aints untsuri nijai iruntrarmiayi . Tura kucha kaanmatkarin iruntraramtai , Jesús nuni wajasmiayi .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: Tura nuni wajamtai , iruntai jea wainu apuri , Jairo naartin tamiayi . Tura taa Jesúsan wainak pinakumar tepesmiayi .

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: Tura pinakumar Jesúsan nukap seak : — Wína nawantur jarutui . Tura asamtai wait aneasam wári winita . Tura tsaar pengker pujusat tusam , uwejmijai antintrukta , — timiayi .

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Tama Jesús nijai wemiayi . Weamtai aints untsuri niin nemarkiar Jesúsnaka teawar wearmiayi .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Nu aints ainamunam nuwa doce ( 12 ) musach numpan nangkaantsuk numpamia nusha pachinkamiayi .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: Nuka tsuwakratin ainaun untsuri jiiutiat numpan nangkantsuk nukap wait wajayayi . Tura kuikiarin mash japiat pengké tsuwamichuyayi .

text: When she had heard of Jesus , came in the press behind , and touched his garment .
text2: Nu nuwaka Jesúsa turamurin antuku asa , tuntupenini taa : “ Wejmakrin antingnaka pengkerapi wajasaintja , ” tu nintimias Jesúsa wejmakrin antingmiayi .

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Tura anting numpamurinka nangkankamiayi . Numpamuri nangkankau asa , pengker nekapramiayi .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Turamtai Jesús ni kakarmarijai nu nuwa tsuwarmaurin nekapmamramiayi . Tura nekaa pajas jiis : — ¿ Yáki wejmakrun antinkama ? — tu inintrimiayi .

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Tu iniam ni nuiniatiri ainau Jesúsan chicharinak : — Aints timiá untsuri amin etenmawaru wainiatmesha ¿ waruka yáki antinkama tame ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Tinamaitiat Jesús aints ainaun : ¿ Yáki antinkama ? tusa mash jiimsamiayi .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Turamtai nu nuwaka ni numpe nangkankau asamtai , shamak kuraimiayi . Tura Jesús wajamunam tikishmatramiayi . Tura tikishmatar ni turunamurin Jesúsan mash paan ujakmiayi .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Turamtai Jesús chicharak : — Nawantru , wína nekasampita turutu asam , pengker wajasume . Pengker nintimsam weta . Numpem yamaikia numparchatatui , — timiayi .

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: Tu chichaak wajai , Jairo aintsri ainau tariar chicharinak : — Nawantrumka yanchuk jakayi . Nuikiartin nemarkini awajip , — tiarmiayi .

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: Tu tinamtai Jesús ni tiarmia nuna antayat , iruntai jea wainu apurin chicharak : — Shamkaip , antsu nekasampita tusam wína nintimtursata , — timiayi .

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Tura untsuri aints : Iijai jiismi tinamaitiat , Jesús surimkamiayi . Antsu Pedron , nunia Santiagoncha , nunia Santiago yachí Juannasha : Wijai wayaawarti tusa tsangkatkamiayi .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Tura iruntai jea wainu apuri jeen jear , aints juutkamaikiak untsuminaun wainkarmiayi .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Tura Jesús jeanam waya , nuna jiis : — ¿ Waruka timiá juutusha pujarme ? Nuwachikia jakachi , antsu kanuri , — timiayi .

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Tamaitiat Jesúsan : Nangkami tawai tusar wishikiarmiayi . Tinamtai Jesús aintsnaka mash aanum jiir akupkamiayi . Antsu aparincha , tura nukurincha , tura nijai taaruncha : Iijai wayaami tusa nuwawach tepamunam wayaawarmiayi .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Tura nuwachi uwejen achirak : — Talita kum , — timiayi . Nuka ii chichamejaingkia : “ Nawantru , nantaktia tajame , ” taku tawai .

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Tu chicharam nu nuwachikia nantakmiayi . Tura nantaki wekaasamiayi . Nuka doce ( 12 ) musachrinuyayi . Tura asamtai aints nuna wainkar nukap nintimrarmiayi .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Tura Jesús chicharak : — Ju aitkamuka aints kichkisha pengké ujakairap , — timiayi . Nuniasha : — Nuwawach yurataram , — timiayi .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: Jesús nunia jiinki Nazaret yaktanam ni tsakarmaurin wemiayi . Tura weamtai , ni nuiniatiri ainausha nemariarmiayi .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Tura ayamtai kinta jeamtai , iruntai jeanam waya , aints ainaun nuiniatan nangkamamiayi . Tura nuininam aints untsuri Jesúsa chichamen anturkar nintiminak : — ¿ Junasha yáki ni nekamtairincha nuiniaria ? ¿ Wainchatai takatan turati tusasha yáki kakarmarincha susaya ?

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: ¿ Juka tau takakminchaukai ? ¿ Marí uchirinchukai ? ¿ Tura ni yachí Santiago , nunia José , nunia Judas , nunia Simón naartinchaukai ? Ni umajisha iijai pujuinauka wainiaji , — tiarmiayi . Tura asar Jesúsan suwirpiaku jiinak pachischarmiayi .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Tura pachischaram Jesús chicharak : — Aints ainau Yuse chichame etsernun mash anturinawai . Antsu ni nungkarin pujuinausha , tura ni weari ainausha anturinatsui , — timiayi .

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: Aints pachischarmau asa , Jesús ni nungkarinka Yuse kakarmarijaingkia wainchatai takatan turachmiayi . Antsu jau ainaun jumchik ni uwejejai achik tsuwarmiayi .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Tura ¿ warukaya wínaka nekasampita turutinatsua ? tu nintimramiayi . Nunia Jesús chikich chikich yaktachinam aints ainaun Yuse chichamen nuiniak wekaimiayi .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Tura nuni wekaas ni nuiniatiri doce ( 12 ) amia nuna untsuk : — Jimiarchik jimiarchik werum , Yuse chichame etserutaram , — timiayi . Tura iwianch ainaun nepetkarat tusa , ni kakarmarin susamiayi .

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Tura chicharak : — Jinta weakrumsha pang nunia pitakrumsha jukirap . Tura uyuntrumin kuikiasha engketsuk wetaram . Antsu aintsarmek wai takusrum wetaram .

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: Tura sapat wampuwach wejkaram , wejmak kichik entsarum wetaram .

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Tura chikich yaktanam werum nuni pujusrum , jea wayaarmeka tuke nuning kanurtaram .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Antsu chikich yaktanam werum , aints nuni pujuinau ni jeen suritraminak : Juni wayaawairap turaminamtaikia , tura atumi chichamen antutan nakitinamtaikia , nunia jiinkuram atumi nawe japimiarum nu yaktaka ukuktiaram . Turaram ju aints ainaun Yus jiisti tusaram , mash nuna nekaawarti tusaram turataram , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Tamati Jesúsa nuiniatiri ainau Jesúsan ukukiar wekaasar : Aints ainau ni pasé nintimaurin yapajiawarti tusar Yuse chichamen etserkarmiayi .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Nunia aints ainamunmaya iwianchin untsuri jiikiar akupkarmiayi . Tura jau ainauncha olivo macharijai yakarar tsuwararmiayi .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Jesúsa naarin pachisar aints mash etserinau asaramtai , apu Herodescha nuna antukmiayi . Tura chichaak : — ¿ Imiakratin Juan jakamunmaya nantakchayash ? Tura asa nu wainchati takatan takaawai , — timiayi .

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: Antsu chikich ainau : — Yuse chichame etserin Elíasaitai , — tiarmiayi . Tura chikich ainausha chichainak : — Atsa , yaanchuik Yuse chichamen etserin pujuarmia tumawaitai , — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: Tu tinamtai Herodes nuna antuk : — Atsa , nuka nekas Juankuitai . Wi nuwik muuken akarkataram tusan , aintsun akuptukmiaja nuka nekasampi ataksha jakamunmaya nantaki , — timiayi .

text: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John , and bound him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife : for he had married her .
text2: Herodeska ni yachí Felipen iwiaaku pujau wainiat , nuna nuwarin nuwatkamiayi . Nu nuwaka Herodías naartinuyayi . Tura asamtai Juan apu Herodesan chicharak : “ Yachim iwiaaku pujau wainiatum , ni nuwari nuwatkamiame nunaka Yuska surimiawai , ” timiayi . Nuna tama nu nuwaka , Herodías naartin , nuna antuk Juankun kajerkamiayi , tura maawarat tusa wakerimiayi . Tura wainiat apu Herodes surimkamiayi . Antsu : “ Juan achikrum kársernum engkeataram , ” tusa ni suntarin akupkamiayi .

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: Juan nekas pengke aints asa , nunia Yusen miatrusang umirkau asamtai , Herodes nuna nekau asa , Juankun shammiayi . Tura asa ni nuwarin pachischamiayi . Tura Juanku chichamen pengker nintimias anturkamiayi . Tura Juanku etsermaurin antayat : Itiurkainjak tusangka nintimrachmiayi .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Turamtai nu nuwaka Herodías naartin : ¿ Juankun itiurkanak maamtikiawaintja ? tu nintimias pujai , apu Herodesa akiinamuri kinta jeamiayi . Turamtai Herodes juun ainauncha , tura suntara apuri ainauncha , tura Galilea nungkanmaya kuikiartin ainauncha : Mash yuwitaram tusa chichaman akupkamiayi .

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: Mash iruntrar yuwinai , Herodíasa nawantri ningki waya yaamramiayi . Tura yaamak apu Herodesan pengker awajsamiayi . Tura nijai tsaniasar yuwinak pujuinauncha pengker awajsamiayi . Tura asamtai apu nu nawantan chicharak : — Ame warí wakerame nuka pachitsuk seattia . Turakminka susatatjame .

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Wi Yusjai nekasan tajame : Ame waring achat mash seatkumningkia , nunaka nekasan suritkashtatjame . Tura nungkar wakerakminkia japen akankan susatatjame , — timiayi .

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: Tama Herodíasa nawantri jiinki ni nukuri pujamunam waya iniak : — ¿ Warinak seataj ? — timiayi . Tu iniam nukuri chicharak : — Imiakratin Juanku muuken wakerajai tita , — timiayi .

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Tama nu nuwachikia wári waketki , apu Herodesan chicharak : — Imiakratin Juanku muuke puwatnum engkeam yamaik surusta tusan wakerajai , — timiayi .

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Nuna tama apu napchau nintimramiayi . Turayat : Yusjai nekasan tajame tinu asa , tura ni untsukarmau ainau mash nuna antukaru asaramtai , surimkatatkama yuumatkamiayi .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Tura ni suntarin wári untsuk : — Juanku muuke akakam itata , — tusa akupkamiayi .

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: Turamtai suntar kársernum we , Juanku muuken chik akak puwatnum engkea itamiayi , tura pai tusa nawantan susamiayi . Tura susam nawan puwatun juki nukurin susamiayi .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Turamtai Juanku nuiniatiri ainau : Juankun maawari tamaun antukar tariar , ni namangken iwiarsatai tusar jukiarmiayi .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: Jesús akupkamu ainau Jesúsnum ataksha iruntrarmiayi . Tura ni turamurin , tura aints ainaun nuiniarmaurincha Jesúsan mash ujakarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Tura aints untsuri nijai chichasartas kauninamtai , nisha angkan pujusartatkamawar tujinkarmiayi . Tura yuwartatkamawar tujinkarmiayi . Tura asaramtai Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaun chicharak : — Aints atsamunam iijai wemi . Auni jumchik ayamrami , — timiayi .

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Tura Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaujai kanunam engkemawar aints atsamunam wearmiayi .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Tura weenamtai aints untsuri jiisar : “ Au weana auka Jesúsaitai , ” tusar ampukiar chikich chikich yaktanmaya jiinkiar , eemkiar Jesús nujamkatnunam jear nakasarmiayi .

text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Tuminamtai Jesús nujamak kanunmaya jiinki , aints untsuri uwijaya nunisarang pujuinaun wainkamiayi . Tura ni wainin atsurmawa nunisarang ainamtai wait anentramiayi . Tura asa nukap nuiniarmiayi .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Tsaa akaamatai , ni nuiniatiri Jesúsan tariar chicharinak : — Yanchuk tsaa akaawai , antsu juni aintsu pujutiri pengké atsawai .

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: Tura asamtai ju aints ainau wári akupkam , yakat arakchichu amanum aints pujuinamunam yurumkan sumakarat tusam akupkarta , — tiarmiayi .

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: Tinamtai Jesús ayaak : — Atumek ni yutairi susataram , — timiayi . Tama niisha aiminak : — Amesha ju aints ainau yuratin ¿ jimia pachak kuikiajai yurumak sumaataram tamek ? — tiarmiayi .

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús iniak : — ¿ Pang warutma takakrume ? Jiistaram , — timiayi . Tamati niisha nekapmarar : — Pangka cincoitai . Tura namaksha jimiarchikitai , — tiarmiayi .

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús : Aints ainau angkan angkan chirichrinam pujusarti tusa akatram ,

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: aints kichik pachak junini , tura chikich pachaksha atunini pujusar , tura cincuenta ( 50 ) cincuenta ( 50 ) kanakar pujusarmiayi .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Mash pujusaramtai , Jesús pangkan cinco ( 5 ) achik , nunia namaknasha jimiarchik takus , nayaimpinmanini jiimias Yusen maaketai timiayi . Tura pangkan puuk , ni nuiniatiri ainaun susa , nunia namaknasha puuk : Aints mash susataram tusa , ni nuiniatiri ainaun susamiayi .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: Tura susaram mash yuwaar tutuararmiayi .

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: Nuna yuwaruka nuwa ainausha , tura uchi ainausha nekapmatsuk aishmangkuk aishmangkuk cinco warang yuwaarmiayi . Tura yuwaar umisar , pang ampintrauncha tura namak ampintrauncha changkin doce ( 12 ) amia nuni chumpiawar jukiarmiayi .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: Nunia ni nuiniatiri ainaun chicharak : “ Kanunam engkemaram katingkrum tumajin Betsaida yaktanam eemajataram . Wikia ju aints ainaun ausan akupkartatjai , ” timiayi .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Tura aints ainaun aujas umis , ningki Yusjai chichastas muranam wakamiayi .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Tura kashi aing , Jesús ningki kukarnum wajai , kanu juun kucha japen wemiayi .

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Tura nase nujinmanini kakar nasenmatai , Jesúsa nuiniatiri ainau kawi kawinmaka pimpikiarmiayi . Tuminamtai Jesús muranam wajas nuna wainkamiayi . Tura atash shinutnak wajai , Jesús juun kuchanam nungkanma nunisang nawejai najamas wekaas , aints nangkamaktias wea nunisang wemiayi .

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: Tura Jesús juun kuchanam winamtai , ni nuiniatiri ainau nuna wainkar : ¿ Wakanchawashi ? tu nintimrar untsumkarmiayi .

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Tura nuna wainkar mash nukap shamkarmiayi . Tuminamtai Jesús chicharak : — Kakaram wajastaram . Wiitjai , shamrukairap , — timiayi .

text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Tura Jesús kanunam engkemamtai , nasengka nangkamarmiayi . Turamtai ni nuiniatiri ainau nukap nintimrar shamkarmiayi .

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: Antsu nintinchau asar , aints timiá untsuri pangkan yuwinak mash tutuararmia nunaka nintimtsuk : Jesúska pengké tujinkachuitai ticharmiayi .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
