text2: Nunia Jesús Yus seatai jeanam waya , aints ainaun kintajai metek Yuse chichamen nuiniarmiayi . Turamtai sacerdote juuntri ainausha , tura Moisésa chichame nuikiartin ainausha , tura judío juuntri ainausha mash iruntrar : “ ¿ Itiurak Jesús maawaintai ? ” tu nintimrarmiayi .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Tu nintiminayat , aints mash Jesúsa chichamen pengker nintimsar anturinau asaramtai , maawartatkamawar arantukarmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Chikich kintati Jesús Yus seatai jeanam waya , aints ainaun Yusnum uwemratin chichaman nuiniak pujamtai , sacerdote juuntri ainau , tura Moisésa chichame nuikiartin ainausha , tura judío juuntri ainausha Jesúsan tariar ,

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: chicharinak : — ¿ Ame aitkame jusha yana chichamejia aitkame ? ¿ Tura yaachia aitkata tusasha amincha akuptamkama ? Iikia nu nekaatasar wakeraji . Nu ujakratkata , — tiarmiayi .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — Wisha atumnasha kichik chichaman iniastasan wakerajrume . Nu airkataram .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: Watska . ¿ Yáki Juankun aints imaita tusasha akupkaya ? ¿ Yuseash akupkaya . Turachkusha aintsuash akupkaya ? — timiayi .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Tu iniam mai nuwamtak chicharnainak : — ¿ Iikia warintajik ? Yusek akupkamuitai takurningkia , ¿ waruka niin nekasampita tichamiarume ? iincha turami tusar tichamnawaitji .

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Antsu aints akupkamuitai takurningkia , aints mash : Juan Yus akupkamuitai tinau asar , iin kayajai tukurmiar mantamawarai tusar shamaji , — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Tura Jesúsan aiinak : — ¿ Juan aints ainaun imaita tusasha yáki akupkaya ? tusarsha iikia nekatsji , — tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús chicharak : — Ayu , tu tau asakrumin , yáki wina akuptukia tusancha , wisha nunisnak atumnasha ujakchatatjarme , — timiayi .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Nunia Jesús aints ainaun chikich nuikiartamun nuiniak : — Aints ni ajarin uva naekrin araamiayi . Tura araa umis , aints ainau takartusarti tusa ukukmiayi . Tura tatsuk arák puja pujakka ,

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: juuktin kinta jeamtai , ni inatirin akatar akuptak : ‘ Yamaikia weme , ajarun takau ainau ujaakum : Ajartin chichaman akupturmak : Uva yumiri winar aa nunaka akupturkarti tawai tita , ’ timiayi . Tura akuptukmaitiat ajan takau ainau ajartinu inatirin katsumkar , uva yumirinka sutsuk akupkarmiayi .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Turawaramtai ajartin ataksha chikich inatirin akuptukmaitiat , nu aintsnasha nunisarang katsekar , nunia katsumkar uva yumirinka sutsuk akupkarmiayi .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Nuna turuwaramtai , ajartin ataksha chikich inatirincha akuptukmaitiat , nunasha nunisarang charu charu najanawar ajanmaya jiikiarmiayi .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: “ Turinamtai nuniangka ajartin nintimias : ‘ ¿ Yamaisha itiurkainjak ? Yamaikia wína uchirun aneetirun akuptuktajai . Niin wainkar nekasar anturkachartimpiash , ’ timiayi .

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Tura apari akupkamu waininayat , ajan takau ainau ajartinu uchirin wainkar chicharnainak : ‘ Ni apari jakamtai , ju ajaka uchirinu atinuitai . Watska , maatai . Ju maarkia , nuniangka ju ajaka iinu achaintak , ’ tunaiyarmiayi .

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Tura ajartinu uchirin achikiar , ajanmayan jiikiar maawarmiayi , ” Jesús timiayi . Nunia nu nuikiartamun antukaru ainaun iniak : — ¿ Atumsha itiur nintimrume ? ¿ Ajartin taa nu takau ainaun itiurkatnuita ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Niisha taa , nu pasé takau ainaun maatnuitai . Nunia chikich aints ainaun eak : ‘ Ajarun takakmasarti ’ tusa susatnuitai , — Jesús timiayi . Tamati nuna antukaru ainau chicharinak : — Atsa , pengké turachminuitai , — tiarmiayi .

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Tu tinam Jesús nuna antuk nu aints ainaun pangkai jiis ayaak : — ¿ Tura Yuse chichame etserin ainau aararmia nuna warina takua tawa tusarmeka nintimtsurmek ? Nu aarmauka nuwaitai : ‘ Jeamin ainau kaya jean jeamkar , chikich kayan wainkar chichainak : Ju kayaka paseetai tusar japawarmiayi . Japinau wainiat Yuska : Nu kayaka timiá pengkeraitai timiayi . ’

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Tu aarmau asamtai , aints ainau nu kaya nekas pengker aa nunaka tukumkar kupinartinuitai . Tura nu kaya aintsnum ayaarkungka , nu aintsun tsairtinuitai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Tama sacerdote juuntri ainau , tura Moisésa chichame nuikiartin ainausha nu nuikiartamun antukar : Iin pachitmas turamji tusar Jesúsan kajerinak : Yamaik achiktai tu nintimtinayat , aints ainaun shaminau asar achikcharmiayi .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Tura Jesús romano apurin suruktai tu nintiminak , chichaman najatawar , Jesús tsanurtai tusar , aints ainaun eakar : Nuka iikia pengke aintsuitji tinayat , Jesús iniam , niisha warintintak tusar , ni chichamen anturkar , nuna jukiarat tusar akupkarmiayi .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Tura akupkamu asar , Jesúsan jeariar chicharinak : — Nuikiartinu , ameka nekas chicham chichaame . Iikia nuka nekaji , tura aints ainau wína pengker nintimtursarat tuuka nintimtsuk pujame , tura nekasam Yuse jinti tu awai tusam , tupin nuikiartame .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Tura asakmin ¿ itiur nintime ? tusar nekaatasar wakeraji . Juun apu César ni aintsrin akupak : Kuik irumrataram tamati ¿ ii kuikiarin akiimiaktin pengkerkai ? ¿ Antsu akiimiatsuk pujustinka pengkerkai ? Nu nekaatasar wakeraji , — tiarmiayi .

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Tu iniinam Jesús ni pasé nintimaurin nekaru asa chicharak : — ¿ Waruka anangkruaram winasha nekaprustasrumsha wakerutarme ?

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: Watska , kuik inaktursataram , — timiayi . Tura inaktusam Jesús chicharak : — ¿ Jusha yana yapiya nakumkamuita ? ¿ Tura yana naariya aarmawita ? — timiayi . Tu iniam ainak : — Apu Césarnawaitai , — tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús chicharak : — Tu tinu asaram , juun apu Césarnau aa nuka ni susataram . Tura Yusnau aa nuka Yus susataram , — timiayi .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Aints mash antinamunam nuna tamati , nu chichaman antukaru ainau ni chichamejai achikiartatkamawar tujinkarmiayi . Antsu nintimrar chichatsuk wajasarmiayi .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Nunia saduceo ainau : Aints jakauka jakamunmaya nantakchatnuitai tinu asar , chichaman nekaawartas tariarmiayi . Tura Jesús warintintak tusar chicharinak :

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: — Nuikiartinu , Moisés chichaman aarmia nu chichamka nuwaitai : ‘ Aints uchin yajutmatsuk jakamtaikia , ni yachí uchin yajutmartas ni wajerin nuwatkatnuitai . Tura uchin yajutmarka , nuka ni yachí jakau uchiriya nunisang atinuitai , ’ tu aarmawaitai .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Ayu , juni iijai iruntrar siete ( 7 ) yachintin pujuarmiayi . Tura eemkauri nuwan nuwatak , uchin yajutmatsuk jakamtai ,

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: jakau yachí wajerin nuwatkayat , nusha nunisang uchin yajutmatsuk jakamiayi .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Tura nusha nunisang jakamtai , chikich yachiisha wajerin nuwatak , tura chikitcha chikitcha siete ( 7 ) yachintin nu nuwan nuwatinayat , mash uchin yajutmatsuk kajingkiarmiayi .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Nunia nuwasha ukunam jakamiayi .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Tura nu siete ( 7 ) yachintin mash nu nuwan nuwatkaru asar ¿ jakamunmaya nantakiar nu nuwaka yana nuwariya atinuita ? — tu iniasarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Tu iniinam Jesús ayaak : — Ju nungkanam pujuinauka nuwatnaikiatin ainawai .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Tura Yusen umirin ainau jakaar ju nungkanka ukukiar , nuniangka jakamunmaya nantakiar , ataksha jakachartin ainawai . Antsu Yusnum tuke pujuinau asar , nuwanka nuwatkachartinuitai . Nunia nuwasha aintsun ninumkachartinuitai .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Antsu Yuse awemamuriya nunisarang nuwartichu artinuitai . Tura jakamunmaya nantakiaru asar , Yuse uchiri artinuitai .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Tura jakaru ainaun pachis Moiséscha tu awai tusa , iin nekamtikramamiaji . Tura aints atsamunam numi jangkirtin kapaayat kajintsuk wajamtai , Apu Yus Moisésan chicharak : ‘ Abrahama Yusrinka wiitjai . Tura Isaaca Yusrinka wiitjai . Tura Jacobo Yusrinka wiitjai , ’ timiayi .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Tura aintsu wakani tuke jakachartin asaramtai , Yuska jakau ainau Yusrinchuitai , antsu iwiaaku ainau Yusrintai . Yuska aints jakaru ainaun mash iwiaakua nunisang jiiawai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Tamati Moisésa chichame nuikiartin ainau chicharinak : — Nekasam pengker tame , — tiarmiayi .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Tura nuniangka iniasartatkamawar arantukarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Nunia Jesús nu aints ainaun iniak : — Aints ainau Yus akupkatniun , Mesías tutain pachisar ¿ waruka Davidta wearintai tinawa ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Davidcha Yuse chichamen Salmo tutainum ningki tu aarmiayi : Apu Yus wína Apurun chicharak : ‘ Juni wína untsurunini apu keemtainum keemsam nakarsata .

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Tura nakarkumin ami nemasem ainaun mash nepetkatatjai , ’ timiayi .

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: Davidka Mesíasan pachis : Wina Apuruitai tinu wainiatrumsha ¿ waruka Mesíaska Davidta uchirintai tarume ? — timiayi .

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Tura mash aints antinamunam Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaun chicharak :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: — Moisésa chichame nuikiartin ainau wainkataram . Niisha nekau aintsuitjai tusar , entsatirin sarman entsarar jampesarang wekajin armiayi . Tura yaktanam wekainak : Wína jiirsar aujtusarat tusar wekainawai . Tura iruntai jeanmasha keemtai nekas pengkernum keemsartas wakerinawai . Tura fiesta amanumsha eemkar keemsar yuwartas wakerinawai .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Tura waje jeen atantin ainayat anangminak wína pengke aintsuitai turutiarat tusar , aya jangkejai Yusen sarman seainawai . Tuminau asaramtai , Yus chikich ainaun nangkamasang niin nukap wait wajaktiniun susartinuitai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Jesús Yus seatai juun jeanam waya , kuikiartin ainau kuik engketinam kuikiarin engkeenaun wainkamiayi .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Tura waje kuikiartichu jimia jiru kuikian engkeaun wainkamiayi .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Tura nuna wainak aints ainaun chicharak : — Nekasan tajarme : Ju wajeka kuikiartichutiat , chikich aints ainaun mash nangkamasang nukap engkeayi .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Chikich aints ainauka nekasar kuik ampirmaurinak engkeenawai . Antsu ju wajeka ninu aa nunaka mash ampitsuk engkeayi , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Chikich aints ainau Yus seatai juun jeanam wajasar , kaya ainaun shiirman iwiarinaun jiisar , tura warinchu shiirman Yus susamun jiisar chicharnainak : — Yus seatai juun jea juka shiirmapita , — tunaiyarmiayi . Tu tinamtai Jesús chicharak :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: — Ju mash waintrume juka ni kintari jeamtaikia mash yumpunkatnuitai . Tura yumpunkamtai , kaya kichkisha chikich kayanmasha patamkashtinuitai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Jesús tamati nunia iniinak : — Nuikiartinu ¿ nusha warutik ati ? Tura nu turunatin kinta jeatak wajasamtaisha ¿ waring wantinkatnui ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús chicharak : — Wina anangkruwarai tusaram , aneartaram . Aints untsuri nangkamiar : ‘ Wiitjai Yus akupkamuitjai , ’ tiartinuitai . Tura : ‘ Nungka yumpunkatin yamaikia jeayi , ’ tiartinuitai . Tu tinamtaisha nu aintska nemarkairap .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Tura maaniamu atatui , tura mesetan najaninawai tamau antakrumsha shamkairap . Nusha eemak turunatnuitai . Antsu nungka mesertinka tewarikia achatnuitai , — timiayi .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Nunia Jesús tuke chicharak : “ Aints ainau chikich nungkanmaya ainaujai maaniawartinuitai . Tura apu ainausha kajernaikiar mesetan najanawartinuitai .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Nunia uusha untsuri uurkatnuitai , tura tsukasha nukap atinuitai , tura sungkur ainausha yujarartinuitai . Nayaimpinmayasha shamrumtin wantinkartinuitai . Tura asamtai Yuse kakarmarin aints ainau wainkartinuitai .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: “ Tura nuka jeatsaing , atumin achirmakar wait wajaktiniun suramsartinuitai . Tura chicham nekarami tusar , iruntai jeanmasha juramkiartinuitai . Nuniangka kársernum engketmawartinuitai . Tura engketmawarsha wína aintsur asakrumin , judío apuri ainamunmasha , tura romano apuri ainamunmasha atumin juramkiartinuitai .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Tura nuni juraminamtaisha , wína pachitsaram chichaktinuitrume .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Tura atumi nemase : Waitaitai turamiarai tusan , wína nekamtairun atumin susan chichamtikiatnuitjarme . Tura asamtai atumin apunam juraminamtai , apu ininmamtaisha ¿ itiurak aimkataj ? tusarmeka , nuwá eemkarmeka nintimsairap .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: “ Atumi aparisha , tura atumi yachiisha , atumi weari ainayat , tura atumi amikrisha nunisarang atumin anangkramawar apunam surutmakartinuitai . Tura chikich ainautirmincha mantamawartinuitai .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Tura wína aintsur asakrumin , aints mash atumin kajertamkartinuitai .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Tura kajertaminaun wainiat , Yus atumi intashin kichkisha mengkakashti tusa waitmaktinuitrume .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Tura asaram wait wajayatrumek , tuke inaitutsuk wína umirtakrum pujakrumka , pujut nangkankashtin jukitnuitrume .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: “ Ju yakat Jerusalénnaka suntar ainau tenteawaramtai , atumka nu wainkurmesha , wáriapi ju yaktan yumpungkartatua tusaram nekaataram .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Nu yaktan yumpungkartin asaramtai , Judea nungkanam pujuinauka muranam anumkartas tupikiakiartinuitai . Tura juni Jerusalénnum pujuinauka juniangka jiinkiartinuitai . Tura ajanam takakminak pujuinauka yaktanmaka waketkichartinuitai .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Nu kintati Yuse chichame aarmawa nunisang mash umiktas niin umirchau ainaun Yus wait wajaktiniun susartinuitai .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Tura Yuska ju nungkanam pujuinaunka nukap wait wajaktiniun susatin asamtai , nuwa jamtin ainaunka , tura uchin muntsak pujuinaunka wait anentinajai .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Junia aints ainaun untsurin mesetnum maawartin ainawai . Tura chikich aints ainau achikiar metawar mash nungkanam jukiartin ainawai . Tura judíochu ainau Jerusalénnum taar , ju yaktan yumpungkar mesrartinuitai . Yus tsangkamkamu asamtai turuwartinuitai . Antsu Yus nuke ati tamati , nuniangka inaisartinuitai , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: Nunia Jesús ataksha etserak : “ Nuniangka tsaanmasha , tura nantunmasha , tura yaanmasha aints pengké wainchati wantinkartinuitai . Tura juun entsa kakar tamparuktinuitai . Tura mash nungkanmaya ainau juun entsa uutmaurincha antukar , pachimian nintimrar nukap shamkartinuitai .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: “ Tura nayaimpinam tuke muchichu ainausha muchitrartinuitai . Tura asamtai aints ainau nuna wainkar : Nungkaka yamaikia meseawapi tusar , nukap shaminak mayajin tak enerar jakawa nunisarang tepesartinuitai .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Nunia wikia aintsutiatnak Yus akupkamu asan , Yuse kakarmarijai yurangmijai winamtai , wínaka paan waitkartinuitai .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Nu turunatin wainkatin asaram kakaram wajastaram . Tura atumi uwemtikramratin wári tatin asamtai , pengker nintimsaram pujustaram , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Nunia nunasha takun tajai tusa , nuikiartamun nuikiartak : “ Numi higuera tutai tura chikich numi ainausha nintimrataram .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Numi tsaraptur nangkamar nukarmatai , atumka : Esat jeatak wajasi tusaram nekarme .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Tura asaram wi tajarme nuka mash wainkurmeka , atumsha nunisrumek : Yus aints ainaun inartin kinta jeatak wajasi tusaram nekaamnawaitrume .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: “ Nekasan tajarme , nunaka mash umiatsaing , aints ju nungkanam iwiaaku pujuinauka pengké jakarchatnuitai .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Nayaimpisha , tura nungkasha mengkakartinuitai . Antsu wína chichamrun taja nuka umitskeka inaisashtinuitjai .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: “ Mash nungkanmaya ainau nu kinta wári jeatatuapi tusarka , nunaka nintimtsuk pujuinai , nu kintaka aneachmau tsawaartinuitai . Antsu atum pasé aa nu turakrumka , tura nampet wakerakrumka , tura ju nungkanam sumin ainia nu nintimsaram pujakrumka , paan nintimsaram pujustatkamaram tujintarme . Nu shamrumtin kinta awaktukai tusaram , anearum pujustaram .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Tura Yusen umirchau ainau turunatnurin mash iisha turunawai tusaram , Yus tuke seataram . Tura aintsutiatnak Yus akupkamu asan ataksha wi winamtai , atumsha wijai pujusmi tusaram , Yuska tuke seataram , tura anearum pujustaram tusan tajarme , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Jesús tsawai Yus seatai jeanam waya aints ainaun nuinimiayi . Tura kashiti Olivo Muranam pujustas , Jerusalénnumia jiinkimiayi .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Tura tuke tumin asamtai , aints ainau Jesúsa chichamen antukartas Yus seatai jeanam kashik tariarmiayi .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Pascua fiesta tura pang pachimrachmau yuwatin fiesta jeatak wajasmiayi .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Tura asamtai sacerdote juuntri ainausha , tura Moisésa chichame nuikiartin ainausha Jesúsan anangkawar achikiar maawarat tusar chichaman najatiarmiayi . Tura Jesúsan maatasar wakerinayat , aints ainaun shamiarmiayi .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Nuniangka Judas Iscariote Jesúsa nuiniatiri wainiat , iwianchi apuri Satanás ni nintin engkemtuamiayi .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Satanás engkemtuam , Judas sacerdote juuntri ainamunam , tura Yus seatai wainin ainau iruntrar pujuinamunam we : Jesúska tu achikminuitai tusa etserkamiayi .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Tu etsermatai , nuna antukar warainak : — Ame anangkakminkia akiimiaktatji , — tiarmiayi .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Tu tinam Judas : Ayu tusa ¿ aints atsamunam itiur akankanak surukaintaj ? tu nintimiayi .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Pang pachimrachmau yuwatin fiesta nu kinta jeau asamtai , nu fiesta Pascua tutainum uwija uchirin maawar yu armiayi .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Tura asamtai Jesús Pedroncha , tura Juannasha akupak : — Atum werum Pascua fiestati yuwatin umistaram , — timiayi .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Tamati niisha iniinak : — ¿ Pascua fiestati yuwatniusha tunia umisarti tusamea wakerame ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — Juun yaktanam werum , nuni jearam aints muitsan yumin shikik yanas weau wainkaram nu aints nemarsataram . Nu aints jeanam wayaamtai ,

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: jeentin wainkaram : ‘ Ii nuitamin amin chichaman akupturmak : ¿ Wina nuiniatir ainaujai Pascua fiestati yuwatin jea tesaamusha tuniinta ? turamui , ’ titaram .

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Takurmin jeentin pata yakí amanum jea tesaamun yanchuk mash umismaun inakturmastatrume . Nuni ii yuwatin umistaram , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Tamati ayu tusar wear , Jesús tímia nunisarang wainkarmiayi . Tura wainkar nuni Pascua fiestati yuwatniun umisarmiayi .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Yurumak yuwatin jeamtai , Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaujai misanam yuwartas keemsarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Mash keemsaramtai , Jesús chicharak : — Wína mantinatsaing , nekasan atumjai iruntran , ju fiestatin yurumkan yuwatasan nukap wakerinuyajai .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Yamaikia atumjai ju fiestati yuwaja junaka ataksha yuwashtatjai . Antsu Yuse pujutirin jean , mash umisan nuni ataksha atumjai iruntran yuwatnuitjai , — timiayi .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Nuna tina piningkian achik , Yusen maaketai tusa , ni nuiniatiri ainaun suak : — Ataksha ju nungkanam uva yumirin amurchatnuitjai . Antsu Yuse pujutirin jean ataksha amurtinuitjai tajarme . Tura asamtai ju pining jukiram sunaisaram amurtaram , — timiayi .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Nunia yurumkan achik , Yusen maaketai tusa , nunia puurak , ni nuiniatiri ainaun suak : — Juka wína namangkrua tumawaitai . Atumin uwemtikratin asamtai , winaka mantuwartatui . Turutawartin asaramtai , wina nintimtursaram yuwataram , — timiayi .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Tura yutan umisaramtai , Jesús piningkian ataksha achik chicharak : — Ju piningnum amuti yarakmau wína numparua tumawaitai . Wína mantinamtai , atumin uwemtikratasan wína numparka numpartatui . Tura wi jakan , yamaram chichaman etsernuyaja nunaka mash umiktatjai .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: Tura wína surutkatin wijai tsanias ju misanam ni uwejejai yurumkan achik yuwawai .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Wikia aintsutiatnak Yus akupkamu asan , Yuse wakeramurin miatrusnak umiktinuitjai . Turayatnak wína anangkrua surutkatniunka nukap wait anentajai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Tamati nuna antukar ni nuiniatiri ainau : — ¿ Ni suruktincha yáki at ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Nunia Jesúsa nuiniatiri ainau chicharnainak : — ¿ Yáki iin nangkatamsangsha ati ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Tu tunainamtai Jesús chicharak : — Ju nungkanmaya apu ainauka ni aintsri ainaun akatrar pe akupin armiayi . Tura aintsu akupin ainaun pachisar : ‘ Pengker turinuitai , ’ tinawai .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Antsu atumka tuuka nintimrashtinuitrume . Atum eemkau ainautirmeka uchi ekeria nunisrumek atinuitrume . Tura inakratin akurmesha miajuitjai tumamtsuk , antsu aintsu inatiria nunisrumek atinuitrume .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Nintimrataram . Aints misanam yuwak pujau , tura chikich aints ainaun yutan sua nujai apatkam ¿ tuá nekas timiá nangkamakuita ? Yuta yuwa nu nekas nangkamakuitai , antsu wikia aintsu inatiria nunisnak atumjai iruntran pujajai .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: “ Wi wait wajamtaisha atumsha tuke wijai iruntraram pujuyarme .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: Tura asakrumin apu atiniun wína Apaachir wína tsangkatrukmia nunisnak atumnasha tsangkatkatnuitjarme .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Tura wína pujutirun pujusrum wijai yuwatnuitrume , tura wijai umurtinuitrume . Tura apu keemtairi doce ( 12 ) ainamunam pujusrum , Israela weari inartinuitrume , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Nunia Apu Jesús Simón Pedron chicharak : — Simónka wainkata . Aints trigo jingkiajin juuk pakar peawa nunisang Satanás atumin pachimian nintimtikramratas Yusen iniasi .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Tura wainiatnak wikia amin pachisan : Ame tuke inaitutsuk wina nekasampita turutminam tusan Yusen seatmiajme . Tura ataksha wina umirtukam wína umirtin ainau kakamtikrarta , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Tamati Simón ayaak : — Apuru , kársernum engketminamtaisha , wisha nunisnak amijai tsaniasan engkematatjai . Tura amin mantaminamtaisha , winasha mantuwarat tusan wakerajai , — timiayi .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Tamaitiat Jesús chicharak : — Pedro , nekasan tajame : Yamaik atash shinatsaing , wina pachitsam : Nu aintsnaka wainchawaitjai tusam , ameka kampatam waitrakum uurtuktatme , — timiayi .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Nunia Jesús ataksha ni nuiniatiri ainaun iniak : — ¿ Wi yaanchuik yurumak entsatsuk , nunia kuikiasha takutsuk , tura sapatcha takutsuk wetaram tusan akupkamiajrume nuni yuumakmakiarum ? — Tu iniam aiminak : — Atsa , pengké yuumakchamiaji , — tiarmiayi .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús chicharak : — Antsu yamaikia yurumkan takakuka nuka takusti . Tura kuikiancha nunisang takusti . Tura saapin takakchauka ni wejmakrin suruk , saapin sumakti tajarme .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Yuse chichame etserin yaanchuik aararmia nunaka mash umiktin asamtai , ju aarmauka : ‘ Pasé aints ainaujai maawarmiayi , ’ wína pachitas aarmawa junaka umikiartatui , — timiayi .

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Jesús tamati ni nuiniatiri chicharinak : — Apuru , juni saapikia jimiar takakji , — tinamtai , Jesús ayaak : — Ayu , maaketai , nuke ati , — timiayi .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Nunia Jesús jiinki , tuke tumin asa , Olivo Muranam wemiayi . Ni weamtai nuiniatiri ainausha nemarkarmiayi .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Tura mura wakaar , Jesús nuiniatirin chicharak : — Tunau nepetukai tusaram Yus seataram , — timiayi .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Nunia kaya nangkimiamsha ayaarminum Jesús ai arakchichu wemiayi . Tura we Yusen seak :

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: — Apaachi , ame wakerakmeka , wi wait wajaktinka tsangkamrukaip . Antsu wi wakeraja nuka achati , antsu ame wakerame nuke ati , — timiayi .

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Tamati Yuse awemamuri nayaimpinmaya Jesúsan kakamtikratas tarimiayi .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Tura Jesús ni wait wajaktintrincha nintimias shamak nuna nangkamasang kakar Yusen seak , seekirisha numpa tumau nungká kitaamiayi .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Tura Yusen sea umis wajaki , ni nuiniatiri ainaun jiistas werimiayi . Turam timiá wake mesekar napchau nekapinak , kari nepetinam kanú tepearmiayi .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Kaninamtai nuna wainak Jesús chicharak : — ¿ Waruka kanusha teparme ? Tunau nepetukai tusaram nantakrum Yus seataram , — timiayi .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Jesús tuke chichaak wajai , aints untsuri tariarmiayi . Tura Jesúsa nuiniatiri Judas niyá eemkak Jesúsan mejeastas tarimiayi .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Turamtai Jesús chicharak : — Judasa , wikia Yus akupkamu ayatnak , aints akiinai waitiatmek ¿ wína mejentsam surutam ? — timiayi .

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Tamati Jesúsjai pujuarmia nuka nuna wainkar : — Apuru ¿ saapijai maaniktajiash ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Tura aints Jesúsjai wajau saapirin kuinak , sacerdote apuri inatiri kuwishin untsurinini met charutkamiayi .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Turamtai Jesús chicharak : — Maaketai , inaisataram , — timiayi . Nunia nu aintsu kuwishin ataksha nujtuk pengker najanamiayi .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Nunia sacerdote juuntri ainau , tura Yus seatai wainin ainausha , tura judío apuri ainausha Jesúsan achikiartas taarmia nuna chicharak : — ¿ Waruka kasa aints achiktasrum winitua nunisrumsha saapisha , tura numisha takusrumsha tarutniurme ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Wikia kashincha kashincha Yus seatai juun jeanam atumjai tuke pujusan aints ainaun nuininuyajai . Tura wainiatrumsha nuni achirkachmarume . Turayatrum tuke teenam puja nuna inatiri asaram , ni kakarmarijai yamai kintati aitkararme , — Jesús timiayi .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Nunia Jesúsan achikiar metawar sacerdote apuri jeen umaarmiayi . Turinamtai Pedrosha ukunam yaitas nemarki wemiayi .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Tura nuni weri , sacerdote inatiri ainau aanum jin yaminak pujuinamtai , Pedrosha nu aints ainaujai pachinak keemsamiayi .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Tura nuni pujamtai , nuwa sacerdote inatiri , Pedron jin ayamak pujaun wainak tari jiij wajatmiayi . Tura chicharak : — Ju aintska Jesúsjai wekainuyayi , — timiayi .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Tamaitiat Pedro aimiak : — Atsa nuwachi , nangkami tame . Nu aintsnaka wainchajai , — timiayi .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Tamati jumchik arus chikich aintcha niin wainak : — Amesha au aintsjai pachitkauyame , — timiayi . Tamaitiat Pedro aimiak : — Atsa aishmangku , wichawaitjai , — timiayi .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Tura kichik hora nangkamaramtai , chikich aints nuni iruntrar pujuinaun chicharak : — Juka nekas aujai wekainuyayi . Juka nekas Galilea nungkanmaya aintsuitai , — timiayi .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Tamaitiat Pedro aimiak : — Aishmangku ¿ warintsuk turutrum ? nunaka nekatsjai , — timiayi . Tura chichaak pujai atash shinimiayi .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Atash shinamtai , Apu Jesús Pedron ayanmatar jiij wajatmiayi . Turamtai Pedro Apu Jesúsa timiaurin nintimramiayi . Ni timiauringkia nuwaitai : Atash shinatsaing , nu aintsnaka wainchawaitjai tusam , ameka kampatam waitrakum uurtuktatme .

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Nu timiau asa , Pedro nuna nintimias jiinki kakar juutmiayi .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Aints Jesúsan wainkarmia nuka wishikrami tusar awatiarmiayi .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Tura Jesúsa jiinka tarachjai jingkiatawar awatinak : — Watska , ame ¿ yáki aitkara ? tusam jiitsuk nekaata , — tiarmiayi .

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Tura katsekinak chichaman untsuri chichariarmiayi .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Tsawaaramtai judío juuntri ainau , tura sacerdote juuntri ainausha , tura Moisésa chichame nuikiartin ainausha mash iruntrar chicham nekaaratai tusar , Jesúsan judío apuri iruntramunam umaarmiayi . Tura nuni jeeniar iniinak :

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: — ¿ Nekasmek Mesíasaitam ? ¿ Yus akupkatnuitjai tímia nukítam ? Nu paan etserkata , — tiarmiayi . Tu iniinamaitiat Jesús ayaak : — Wikia nekasan Mesíasaitjai tamatisha , atumsha nekasampita turutchatatrume .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Tura wi atumin iniamsha , winaka airkashtatrume .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Tura wikia aintsutiatnak Yus akupkamu asan , jumchik arusan Yus nekas kakaram aa nuna untsurinini pujustatjai , — timiayi .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Tamati mash iniinak : — ¿ Nekasmek ame Yuse Uchirintam ? — tiarmiayi . Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — Ja ai , atum wína turutrume nuka nuwaitjai , — timiayi .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Jesús tamati chicharinak : — Pai , ii antarin nuwaitjai ningki tumamusha ¿ warí chicham antuktasrik nakastaij ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Nunia mash wajakiar Jesúsan romano apuri Pilato pujamunam jeeniarmiayi .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Tura Pilatonam jeeniar tsanuminak : — Ju aintska ii aintsri ainaun pachimian nintimrarti tusa chicharu anturkamji . Tura romano apurin kuik akikchamnawaitji tau anturkamji . Tura wiitjai Mesíasaitjai tau anturkamji . Nuka judío ainauti apurinjai taku tawai , — tiarmiayi .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Tu tinam Pilato Jesúsan iniak : — ¿ Nekasmek judío apurintam ? — timiayi . Tama Jesús ayaak : — Ame turutme nuka nekasam tame , — timiayi .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Tamati Pilato sacerdote juuntri ainaun , tura aints iruntrarun chicharak : — Ju aintsu tunaarinka kichkisha nekaarachjai , — timiayi .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Tamaitiat nuna nangkamasarang kakarar chicharinak : — Antsu juka mash judío nungkanmaya ainaun nuiniak : Atumka apu umirtsuk asataram tusa tsanumnuyayi . Yanchuk Galilea nungkanam nangkama tsanu tsanumka junisha tamayi , — tiarmiayi .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Tu tinamtai Pilato nuna antuk iniak : — ¿ Ju aintska nekas Galileanmayangkai ? — timiayi .

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Tu iniam : — Ja ai , — tinamtai , apu Herodes chichaman nekaati tusa , Pilato Jesúsan Herodesnum akupkamiayi . Herodeska Galilea apuri ayayi . Turayat Jerusalénnum irastas taa , nu kintati nuni pujumiayi .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Tura Herodes yaanchuik Jesúsan pachisar chichainamun antuku asa , Jesús aints wainchatai takatan turamtai , wisha wainkataj tusa wakerukmiayi . Tura asa Jesúsan jeeniaramtai , Herodes niin wainak warasmiayi .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Tura inintramun untsurin iniasmiayi . Tura wainiat Jesúska pengké aitsuk wajamiayi .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Herodes Jesúsan iníamtai , sacerdote juuntri ainau tura Moisésa chichame nuikiartin ainausha antú wajarmiayi . Tura Jesús aimtsuk wajamtai , niisha nangkamiar chichaman najatinak nukap tsanumiarmiayi .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Turinamtai Herodescha ni suntari ainaujai iruntrar Jesúsan : Ainusha tusar wishikinak , apu entsatirin shiirman antsrarmiayi . Nunia Herodes : Ataksha Pilatonam waketkiti tusa Jesúsan akupkamiayi .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Yaanchuikkia Herodeska Pilatojaingkia kajernaikiar wainaitsuk puju ainayat , nu kintati amikmawarmiayi .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Nunia Jesúsan ataksha itarim , Pilato sacerdote juuntri ainaun , tura judío juuntri ainauncha , tura chikich aints ainauncha mash irurmiayi .

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: Nunia juun ainaun chicharak : — Atumka ju aints : Apu umirtsuk asataram tusa , aints ainaun tsanuyayi tusaram wini itaarume . Tura wainiatun atumsha antarmin , wi iniaknasha ju aintsu tunaarin pachisrum chichaa wearme nunaka nekaratatkaman pengké tujinkajai .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Herodescha nunisang ni tunaarincha nekarachu asa , ataksha juni akupturmakji . Tura asamtai ju aintsnaka maawarti tichamnawaitjai . Atumsha nusha nekarme .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Tura asan tajarme : Suntar awatraramtai nuniangka akupkatatjai , — Pilato timiayi .

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Musachjai metek Pascua fiesta jeamtai , Pilato kichik aintsun karsernumia jiiki akupnuyayi . Tura asa aints ainaun iniak : — ¿ Ju aintsnaka jiikin akupkatjash ? — timiayi .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Tamaitiat aints mash iruntrar kakarar chichainak : — Atsa , juka nakitaji . Antsu Barrabás akupkata , — tiarmiayi .

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Nu Barrabáska romano apurin umirtan nakitak , Jerusalén yaktanam chikich aints irunujai mesetan najana , aintsun mau asa kársernum engkeamu pujuyayi .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Tura asamtai Pilatoka aints ainaun ataksha chicharak : — Antsu nekasnaka Jesúsan akupkatjai , — timiayi .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Tau waininayat nuna nangkamasarang kakarar chicharinak : — Atsa , antsu numi winangmaunum ajinkam maata , — tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Nunia Pilato ataksha aints ainaun chicharak : — ¿ Waruka ? ¿ Warí tunauna turini ? Ju aintsun maawarti tusanka , ni tunaarinka pengké nekarachjai . Tura asan suntar awatraramtai , nuniangka akupkatatjai , — timiayi .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Tamaitiat tuke kakarar chicharinak : — Juka numi winangmaunum ajinkam maata , — tusar wakerinau asar , Pilatonka nepetkarmiayi .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Tinamtai Pilatoka : — Ayu , nuniangka suntar numi winangmaunum ajinkar maawarti , — tusa aints ainau seainam tsangkamkamiayi .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Antsu mesetan najanin tura mangkartin akupkata tinau asaramtai , Pilato nu aintsun karsernumia jiiki akupkamiayi . Tura : Aints ainau ni wakeramurin turuwar , Jesúsnaka maawarti tusa tsangkamkamiayi .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Nunia Jesúsan jukiar jinta weenak , Cirene nungkanmaya Simón naartiniun ajanmaya winaun wainkar , suntar ainau niin achikiar , numi winangmaun yanas Jesúsan nemarsati tusar nijai wekaasarmiayi .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Turinamtai aints ainau untsuri jiistai tusar nemariarmiayi . Tura nuwasha untsuri Jesúsan wainkar , napchau nintimrar juutiarmiayi , tura wake mesekar untsumkiar Jesúsan nemariarmiayi .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Tuminamtai Jesús nuwa irunun jiis chicharak : — Jerusalénnumia nuwa ainautiram , wína anenkurmeka juutirap . Antsu atumek nintimtumasrum , tura atumi uchiri nintimsaram juutiaram .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Atum wait wajaktin kintaka jeartinuitai . Nu kinta jearamtai , aints ainau chichainak : Nuwa kaa ainau , uchin jurechu asar , tura uchin munchau ainausha chikich nuwa ainaun nangkamasarang warasartin ainawai , tiartinuitai .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Tura nukap wait wajainau asar , nu kintati aints ainau muran chicharinak : ‘ Mura ainautiram , yakíya ayaarum iin tukukratkataram , ’ tiartinuitai .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Tura asamtai wikia pengké tunaarinchautiatnak , timiá wait wajau asamtai , tunaarintin ainawa wina nangkamasarang wait wajakartin ainawai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Turamtai mangkartin ainaun jimiaran Jesúsjai maami tusar jukiarmiayi .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Tura mura muuk ukunch tutainum jear , suntar ainau Jesúsan numi winangmanum ajinkar yakí nenaawar , mangkartin aintsnasha nunisarang Jesúsa untsurinini , tura Jesúsa menarininisha numi winangmanum ajinkar nenaawarmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Turinamtai Jesús Yusen seak : — Apaachi , ju aints aitkarinia juka nintiminachu asaramtai tsangkurarta , — timiayi . Tamati Jesúsa entsatirin jurukiar , suntar ainau ¿ Yáki juna jukit ? tusar nakuruti “ suerte ” tutain nakuriarmiayi .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Turinamtai aints irunuka Jesúsan jiij wajatiarmiayi . Tura judío juuntri ainau wishikinak : — Chikich ainaun uwemtiknuyayi . Nekas Yus akupkamuitkungka ningki uwemrati , — tiarmiayi .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Suntar ainausha nunisarang wishikinak , vino churiniun mukunat tusar aapawarmiayi .

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: Tura chicharinak : — Ame nekasam judío apurinkumka amek uwemrata , — tiarmiayi .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Tura Jesúsa muuken yakinini griego chichamjai , tura romano chichamjai , tura hebreo chichamjai tatangnum aarmaun numi winangmanum nujtukarmiayi . Nu aarmauka nuwaitai : Juka judío apurintai .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Mangkartin aints nuni netimia nuka Jesúsan jiyaak : — Ame Yus akupkamu Mesíasaitkumka , watska amek uwemrata . Tura iincha uwemtikiarturta , — timiayi .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Tamati kichka ni tsaniakmaurin chicharak : — Ameka jakatin kinta jeau wainiatmek ¿ Yus tuke shamatsum ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Iikia nekasar tunau asar wait wajakminuitji . Tura asar ii tunaari akiimiakur waitnaji . Antsu ju aintska tunaunaka pengké kichkisha turichuitai , — timiayi .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Nunia Jesúsan chicharak : — Jesúsa , ami pujutirmin jeam , aints inau wajasam kajinmatrukiip , — timiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Tama Jesús ayaak : — Nekasan tajame , yamai kintaka Yuse umirin jakaru matsatmanum wijai pujustatme , — timiayi .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Tsaa tupin wajasamtai , mash nungka tee wajasmiayi . Tura kampatam hora nangkamaramtai , tsaa yantanti ataksha tsantramiayi .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Tsaa mushatmaramtai , Yus seatai juun jeanam aparmau netimia nu ningki yakiya tseu jaankamiayi .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Turunamtai Jesús kakar untsumak : — Apaachia , wína wakantruka ame waitrukta , — tusa mayajin tak nangkankamiayi .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Turamtai suntara kapitangkri Jesúsa jakamurin wainak , Yus juuntapita tusa chichaak : — Ju aintska nekas pengké tunaarinchauyayi , — timiayi .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Jesús jakamtai , aints ainau nuna wainkar , mash napchau nintimsar netsepen awatmaminak : “ Pengké nangkamiapi ju aintsun maawari , ” tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Tura Jesúsan wainkaru ainausha tura nuwa ainausha Galileanmaya niin nemarkarmia nusha arák wajasar jiij wajatiarmiayi .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Jesús jakamtai , aints José naartin pengke aints asa , Pilaton weri : — Jesúsa namangke surusta , — tusa seamiayi . Nuka judío nungkanmaya Arimatea yaktanmaya aintsuyayi . Joséka judío juuntri chicharin ayat , judío apuri iruntramunam mash Jesús maatai tiarmia nunaka pengké nakitmiayi . Antsu Yus aints ainaun inarti tusa nakauyayi .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Pilato Josén : — Jesúsa namangke jukita , — tamati , José we Jesúsa namangken numinmaya kuaki , tarachjai kangkarmiayi . Nunia jakau iwiartai pampa taimunam iwiarsamiayi . Nu iwiartainum aints kichkisha iwiarsachmauyayi .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Tura kashin tsawaarka ayamtai kinta atin asamtai , kintamrai tusa José Jesúsa namangken wári iwiarsamiayi .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Tura iwiarsamtai Galileanmaya nuwa ainau Jesúsan nemarsarmia nusha iwiarsamunam wear : ¿ Jesúsa namangken tuning iwiarsarma ? tusar jiij wajatiarmiayi .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Tura jiisar ni jeen waketkiar , Jesúsa namangke chikich kintati yakaarami tusar kungkutin pachimrarmiayi . Tura nu kintati aints kichkisha takakmascharti Moisés tu aarmau asamtai , nu chichaman umiinak ayamsarmiayi .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Tuming kintati kashik nu nuwa ainauka kungkuti pachimramun jukiar , chikich nuwa irunujai tsaniasar , Jesús iwiarsamunam wearmiayi .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Tura nuni jear kaya juuntan iwiarsamu waarin ututkarmia nuna urankaun wainkarmiayi .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Tura wayaawariat ii Apuri Jesúsa namangkenka wainkacharmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Tura wainkacharu asar : Warukatjik tusar shamkarmiayi . Tura shaminak , Yuse awemamuri jimia aintsua tumaun entsatin pujun winchaan jiischamniaun entsarun wainkarmiayi .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Nuna wainkar nukap shamkar tsuntsumawaramtai , Yuse awemamuri chicharinak : — Jesús iwiaaku pujausha ¿ waruka iwiarsamusha jiarme ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Juningkia tepatsui . Antsu jakamunmaya nantaki . Nisha Galileanam pujus atumin chichartamak : ‘ Wikia Yus akupkamu waitinayat , winaka tunau aints ainamunam surutkartinuitai . Tura numinam ajinkar mantuwaramtai , kampatam kinta jakan tepayatnak nantaktinuitjai , ’ ¿ ni tímia nuka nintimtsurmek ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Tu tinam Jesúsa timiaurin nintimrarmiayi .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Nunia iwiarsamunmaya waketkiar , Jesúsa nuiniatiri once ( 11 ) amia nuna wainkar , tura chikich irununcha wainkar , nu turunamun mash etserkarmiayi .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Jesúsa nuiniatirin ujakaru ainauka nu ainawai : Magdalanmaya Marí , nunia Juanasha , nunia Jacobo nukuri Marísha , tura chikich nuwa irunusha nu turunamun etserkarmiayi .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Tura nuwa irunu tinaun antukariat , Jesúsa nuiniatiri ainau nekasampita tutsuk : Nangkamiar waurinak tinatsuash , tu nintimrarmiayi .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Antsu Pedro jiinki iwiarsamunam ampuki wemiayi . Tura nuni jea tekena jiikma tarachik tepaun wainkamiayi . Tura wainak nukap nintimiar jeanam waketkimiayi .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Nu kintati Jesúsa nemarnuri jimiar Emaús yaktanam wearmiayi . Nu yakat Jerusalénnumia once ( 11 ) kilómetros ayayi .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Tura jinta weenak mai nuwamtak Jesús turunamun pachisar chichaarmiayi .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Tura chichakiar weenai , Jesús wantintuk nuni pachinak nijai tsanias wekaasamiayi .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Tura Jesús wantinkaun ni namangkencha paan waininayat , Jesúsapita tusarka nekaacharmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Tura nekaacharam Jesús nijai tsanias jinta weak chicharak : — ¿ Jinta weakrumsha , warí chichakrumsha wearme ? ¿ Tura waruka timiá wake mesekrumsha wearme ? — timiayi .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Tu iniam aints Cleofas naartin ayaak : — Jerusalénnum turunamunka aints ainau mash nekainawai . ¿ Amekek nu chicham antichumka pachitkam ? — timiayi .

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Tamati Jesús chicharak : — ¿ Waruka ? ¿ Warí chichama awa ? — timiayi . Tu iniam aiminak : — Iikia Nazaretnumia Jesúsa turunamuri taji . Nisha Yuse chichame etserin asa , Yuse kakarmarijai chichauyayi . Tura Yus wainmamunmasha tura aints mash wainminamunmasha wainchatai takatan takauyayi .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Tura waininayat sacerdote juuntri ainau , tura judío juuntri ainausha chichainak : Tunau takasu asamtai jakati tusar , tura numi winangmanum maawarti tusar , romano apurin surukarmayi . Tura ni maamuri yamaikia kampatam kinta nangkamari . Antsu iikia Israel ainautin uwemtikramrashtajiash tu nintimrarmiaji .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Antsu nuwa ainau iijai iruntrar pujuina nuka yamai kashik iwiarsamunam wear , Jesúsa namangken wainkartatkamawar wainkachari . Tura wainkacharu asar , ii pujamunam taar chichainak : Iikia iwiaayatrik karanma nunisrik Yuse awemamuri wainkaji . Tura nuka : Jesúska iwiaakui tusa ujatmakji . Nuwa tu ujatminamtai iisha shamkamji .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Tu etserkaru asaramtai , iijai iruntrar pujuinausha iwiarsamunam wear , nuwa tiarmia nunisarang wainkari . Antsu Jesúsnaka wainkachari , — tiarmiayi .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Tu tinam Jesús chicharak : — Nintinchau ainautiram ¿ yaanchuik Yuse chichame etserin ainau tiarmia nusha waruka nekasampita tutsuksha pujarme ?

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: ¿ Mesíasan pachisar aararmia nuka nekaschaukai ? Yus akupkamutiat nayaimpinmaka watsuk ¿ nekas wait wajakchatnukai ? — timiayi .

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Tura Moisés niin pachis aarmia nuna nangkamsang , tura Yuse chichamen etserin aararmia nusha taku tiarmiayi tusa , Jesús Yuse chichamen niin pachisar aararmia nunaka mash nekamtikiamiayi .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Tura chichaa chichaaka nu yaktanam jearmiayi . Tura Jesúska nangkamaki wetaj tusa wajamiayi .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Tura waininayat nu jimia aints chicharinak : — Atsa , nangkamakip . Iijai pujusta . Tsaa yanchuk nungká wajasi , — tiarmiayi . Tu tinam Jesús ayu tusa , nijai pujustas jeanam wayaamiayi .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Tura nijai iruntrar jeanam pujus , pangkan achik Yusen sea : Maaketai tusa , puurak niincha susamiayi .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Turamtai ni jii uranua nunisarang : Nekasampi Jesúsaita tusar paan nekaawarmiayi . Paan nekaawaram Jesúska mengkakamiayi .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Tura mengkakamtai mai nuamtak chicharnainak : — Ii jinta winarin , Yuse chichame tu awai tusa iin ujatmamtai , ii ninti kapaawa nunisrik tsuwer nekapmamramji . ¿ Nuka nekaschaukai ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Tura arutsuk wajakiar jeanmaya jiinkiar , wári Jerusalénnum waketkiarmiayi . Tura waketkiar , Jesúsa nuiniatiri once ( 11 ) ainau chikich nemarnuri irunujai iruntrar pujuinaun wainkarmiayi .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Tura wainaikiar jeanam pujuarmia nuka yamai wininaun chicharinak : — Ii Apuri nekas nantaki . Tura Simónkan wantintuki , — tusar ujakarmiayi .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Tu ujainam nisha chichainak : — Iisha waketkur jinta weakur nekasar Jesús wainkamji . Tura pangkan achik puurtamak iin suramsamtai , nekas Jesúsapita tusar nekaamji , — tiarmiayi .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Tu chichainak pujuinai , Jesús aneachmau japen wajas : — Pengker nintimsaram pujustaram , — timiayi .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Tamati nuna antukar shaminak : — ¿ Wakanchawashi ? — tu nintimrarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Tu nintiminamtai Jesús chicharak : — ¿ Waruka shamrarme ? ¿ Waruka winasha wakanchawashi tuusha nintimrutrume ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Jiirsataram . Wiitjai . Tura uwejrusha tura nawersha takarsaram jiirsataram . Wakankia nekas namangtichuitai . Tura ukunchtichuitai , — timiayi .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Nuna tii ni uwejencha , tura mijiarincha inakmasmiayi .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Turamtai ijiumurin wainkar warainayat timiá shamkaru asar , nekasampita tichamin nekapiarmiayi . Tu nintiminamtai Jesús iniak : — ¿ Juni yuta awak ? — timiayi .

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Tamati namak inaramun yuwati tusar susarmiayi .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Tura susaram Jesús nuna achik , ni nuiniatiri jiimia wajainai yuwamiayi .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Tura yuwa umis Jesús ataksha chichaak : — Wi atumjai pujusan timiajrume nuka mash turunayi . Tura wína pachitas Moisés aarmia nusha uminkayi . Tura Yuse chichame etserin aararmia nusha , tura papi Salmonam aarmawa nusha mash uminkayi , — timiayi .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Nunia Yuse chichame niin pachis aarmaunasha Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainaun nekamtikiamiayi .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Tura ataksha chichaak : — Yuse chichame tu aarmawaitai : ‘ Mesías Yus akupkamutiat jakatnuitai . Tura kampatam kinta jaka tepayat nantaktinuitai , ’ tu aarmawa nuka wína pachitas aarmawaitai .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Tura aints ainau ni nintimaurin yapajiawar , ni tunaarin inaisaramtai , Yus ni tunaarincha mash sakartinuitai , tusar wína naarun pachitsar Jerusalénnumia nangkamawar mash nungkanam etserkartin ainawai .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Tura atumsha wi turunamur mash nekau asaram etserkatnuitrume .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Tura wína Apaachir : Wína Wakantrun akuptuktatjarme tinu asamtai , nuka nayaimpinmaya taatsaing , juni Jerusalénnum pujustaram . Tura taa ni kakarmarin suramsatatrume , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Nunia mash etserak umis , ni nuiniatiri ainaujai iruntrar Betania yaktanmanini wearmiayi . Tura nuni wear , Jesús wajas ni uwejen takui : “ Yamaikia pujustaram . Yus yainmakarti , ” timiayi .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Tura uwejen takui kanák wajas nayaimpinam wakamiayi .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Turamtai ni nuiniatiri ainau : Ameketme Yusem tusar nukap warasar Jerusalénnum waketkiarmiayi .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Tura nuni jear , kintajai metek Yus seatai juun jeanam wayaawar : Yus juuntapita tiarmiayi . Maaketai .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Nu nangkamtaik Yus mash aa nuna najantsaing , Yuse Chichamengka tuke ayayi . Nu Chichamka tuke Yusnum pujuyayi . Tura asa Yuseyayi .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Nuka nu nangkamtaik Yusjai tuke pujuyayi .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Ningki najanamuka pengké atsawai , antsu Yus ni Uchirijai mash najanamiayi .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Nuka tuke iwiaaku pujau asa , aints ainaun tuke pujustinun suyayi . Tura tuke pujutan sukartin asa , paaniunam pujus , aints ainau nekasar paan nintimrarti tusa chichaman nekamtiknuyayi .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Tura aints ainaun tuke paan nintimtikin asa , aints teenam pujuinauka paan nintimrarti tusa tuke nintimtikui . Tura Yusen umirtan nakitinauka teenam pujuinau asar , nu paaniunam pujaunaka nepetkartatkama pengké tujinkarmiayi .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Cristo wantintsaing Yus Imiakratin Juankun akupkamiayi .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Turamtai aints ainau ni chichaamun antukar nekasampita tiarat tusa , Juan nu paaniunka pachis chichaman etserkatas tamiayi .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Juanka mash aints ainaun paan nintimtiknuka achayayi . Antsu nu paaniun pachis etserkat tusa , Yus akupkamuyayi .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Nu paaniun nintimtiknuka chikichaitai . Nuka aints ainaun mash paan nintimtikrartas ju nungkanam tamiayi .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Tura ni chichamen nekamtikiartuktas , ju nungkanam taa akiinamiayi . Tura ju nungkan najanau waininayat , ju nungkanam pujuinauka nuwaapita tusar nekaacharmiayi .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Ju nungkanam ni weari pujuinamunam tamiayi . Tura waininayat , ni wearisha niin pachischarmiayi .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Tura ni weari pachischaram , chikich ainau niin nekasampita tusar nintimtinauka Yuse uchiri arti tusa tsangkamkamiayi .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Junia aints akiinawarua nunisarang ataksha akiinawaruka ainatsui . Tura junia aints uchin yajutmarua nunisarang ataksha yajutmarmauka ainatsui . Antsu Yus yajutmarmawa nunisarang Yuse uchiri ainawai .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Nu Chichamka ju nungkanam akiina aints wajakmiayi . Tura iijai pujuyayi . Nuni iisha ni kakarmari waitnuyaji . Yuse Uchiri kichik aa nu ni Apaachiriya nunisang tuke puju asamtai , ni nekas chichame anturnuyaji . Tura ni anengkratairisha nekarnuyaji .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Tura Juan Criston pachis chichaak : — Juwaitai wi timiaja nuka : Wikia atsai tuke puju asa , wina ukurun winayat wina nangkaatukuitai , — timiayi .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Cristo timiá anengkratin asa , mash pengker aa nuna tuke inaitsuk sukartinuyayi .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Yaanchuik Yus Moisés umirkatin chichaman akatramiayi . Antsu Yuse anengkratairinkia , tura nekas chichamnasha Jesucristo iin nekamtikramnuyaji .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Aints kichkisha Yusnaka pengké wainkacharu ainawai . Antsu ni Uchiri , nekas kichik aa nuka tuke nijai tsanias puju asa : Yus tu awai tusa , iincha paan nekamtikramamiaji .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Judío juuntri ainau Jerusalénnum pujuinau asar , sacerdote ainaun tura sacerdote inatiri ainauncha akatrar akupinak : — Atumka Juannum werum , nekas Mesíaschawashi tusaram nekaataram , — tiarmiayi . Tinamtai nuka ayu tusar , Juannum wearmiayi .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Tura Juannum wear tu iniinam , Juan aimiak : — Atsa , wikia Mesíaschawaitjai , — timiayi .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Tamati ataksha iniinak : — ¿ Tura warí aintsuitme ? ¿ Yaanchuik Yuse chichamen etserin Elíaskitam ? — tu iniinam , Juan aimiak : — Atsa , nuchawaitjai , — timiayi . Tamati ataksha iniinak : — ¿ Tura Yuse chichame etserin tatinua nukítam ? — tiarmiayi . Tinamaitiat ataksha : — Atsa , nuchawaitjai , — timiayi .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Tamati pengké tujinkar : — Tura amesha nuwaitjai tusam , paan ujakratkata . Iin akuptamkaji nu warintuk ujaktaij tusar , paan nekaatasar wakeraji , — tiarmiayi .

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Tinamtai Juan ayaak : — Yaanchuik Yuse chichamen etserin Isaías naartin wína pachitas papinum aak : ‘ Aints numi atsamunam wekaas kakar chichaak : Apu wekaasati tusar , aints jintan tupin iwiarina nunisrumek atumi ninti iwiarataram , ’ tímia nuwaitjai , — timiayi .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Tamati Juanjai chichainauka fariseo akupkamu asar ,

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: ataksha iniinak : — Tura Mesíaschawaitiatmesha , tura Elíaschawaitiatmesha , tura Yuse chichamen etserin tatinua nuchawaitiatmesha ¿ waruka aints ainausha imiaame ? — tiarmiayi .

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Tu tinam Juan ayaak : — Wikia aints ainaun aya entsanmak imiaajai . Antsu yamai atum pujamunam chikich aints pujawai . Tura nuwaapita tusarmeka nekatsrume .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Nuka wína nangkatusang tuke iwiaaku pujuwitiat , wína ukurun winitatui . Wikia nekasan mianchau asan , tsuntsumruan ni sapatrin jingkiamun atitataj tayatun , natsaamakun turachminuitjai , — timiayi .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Betania nungkanam Jordán entsa tumajin Juan aints ainaun imiaamunam nunaka timiayi .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Nunia kashin tsawaar Juan Jesús winaun wainak aints ainaun chicharak : — Jiistaram . Juka Yus akupkamu asa , uwija uchiriya nunisang mash nungkanmaya ainau tunaarin sakartas jakatnuitai .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Ju wina ukurun winitatui timiaja juka tuke iwiaaku puju asa , wina nangkatukuitai tusan ujakmajrume nuwaitai .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
