text2: Juka wantintsaing , Yus akupkamuitai tusanka nekaachmiajai . Antsu ju wantinkamtai , Israel ainau nuna mash paan nekaawarat tusan , aints ainaun imiainiartasan tamajai , — timiayi .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Nunia Juan ataksha chichaak : — Wína akuptuku chichartak : ‘ Yuse Wakani yampitsa tumau yakiya nanaaki taa aintsnum ketu wainkatatme . Turamtai juwaapita aintsu nintin Yuse Wakani engkemtuatnua tusam nekaatatme , ’ wína turutmiayi . Nuna wainchaknaka yáki tusancha nekaachmiajai . Turayatun Yuse Wakani yampitsa tumau nayaimpinmaya tara , aintsnum ketu wainkau asan , nuniangka juwaapita tusan nekaamjai .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Tura nuna wainkau asan , juka nekas Yuse Uchirintai tusan paan etserjai , — Juan timiayi .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Kashin tsawaarar Juan ni jimiar nuiniatiri ainautijai iruntrar wajasmiaji .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Tura Jesús nangkaamaun wainak , Juan iin chichartamak : — Jiistaram . Juwaitai Yus akupkamuitai . Juka nekas uwija uchiriya tumawaitai , — turammiaji .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Turammatai nu antukar ni nuiniatiri jimiar ayatrik , Juanka ukukir Jesús nemarkamiaji .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Tura asakrin Jesús pajas jiimias : — ¿ Atumsha yaachia earme ? — turammiaji . Turammatai iisha : — Nuikiartinu ¿ tunia pujame ? — tu iniasmiaji .

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Tu iniam Jesús chichartamak : — Watska , iijai wemi . Tura wi pujamur wainkamniuram , — turammiaji . Turammatai ayu tusar , nijai weri Jesúsa pujamuri wainkamiaji . Tura tsaa nungka wajasu asamtai , iisha nuni wayaar kintamramiaji .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Iikia jimiarchitak Juanku chichame antuku asar , Jesús nemarkamiaji . Wijai tsanias nemarkamiaji nuka Andrésuyayi . Nuka Simón Pedro yachí ayayi .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Andréscha Jesúsan wainkau asa , chikich aintsun ujatsuk , niyá eemak ni yachiin Simónkan eaktas wemiayi . Nunia wainak : — Mesíaska wainkaji , — tusa ujakmiayi . Mesías ta nuka Cristoitai , Yus akupkamuitai taku tawai .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Nunia Andrés ni yachiin Simónkan juki , Jesús pujamunam jeemiayi . Turamtai Jesús Simónkan wainak : — Ameka Simónkaitme . Juanku uchirinme . Yamaikia ami naarmeka Cefas atatui , — timiayi .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Kashin tsawaar , Jesús Galileanam wetas wakerimiayi . Tura Felipen wainak : — Nemartusta , — timiayi .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Nu Felipeka Betsaida yaktanmaya aintsuyayi . Andréscha , tura Pedrosha nu yaktanmayang iruniarmiayi .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Nunia Felipeka Jesúsa chichamen antuku asa , Natanaelan eaktas wemiayi . Tura wainak chicharak : — Yaanchuik Moisés chichaman aak : ¿ Yus akupkatnuka tatinuitai tu aarchamukai ? Tura yaanchuik Yuse chichamen etserin ainau Yus akupkatnun pachisar aararmia nu aintska iikia nekasar wainkaji . Nuna naaringkia Jesúsaitai . José uchirintai . Nazaretnumia aintsuitai , — timiayi .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Tamati Natanael ayaak : — ¿ Nazaretnumiangka pengke aints kichkisha aminkai ? — tamati , Felipe chicharak : — Watska , iijai wemi . Amesha wainkamnium , — timiayi .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Tamati Natanael ayu tusa , Felipejai wemiayi . Turamtai Jesús Natanaelan winaun wainak : — Jiistaram , juka nekas Israela wearintai . Juka pengké anangkartichuitai , — timiayi .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Tamati Natanael chicharak : — ¿ Tunia winasha waitkamame ? — tu iniam Jesús ayaak : — Felipe amin untsurmatsaing , numi higuera nantujen pujamin nekaamjame , — timiayi .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Tamati Natanael chicharak : — Nuikiartinu , ameka nekasam Yuse Uchirinme . Israel ainautin apurinme , — timiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Tamati Jesús chicharak : — Wi amin higuera numi nantujen pujamin nekaamjame tamau asam , ¿ ameka nekasampi Yuse Uchirinme turutmek ? Antsu wi taja nuna nangkamasmek wainchati takat turamusha wainkatnuitme tajame , — timiayi .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Nunia ataksha chicharak : — Nekasan tajame : Yus nayaimpin uraamtai , wikia aints ayatnak Yus akuptuku asamtai , atumsha Yuse awemamuri nayaimpinmaya wi pujamunam tarutiar , nunia nayaimpinam waketinau wainkatnuitrume , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Kampatam kinta nangkamaramtai , Galilea nungkanam Caná yaktanam nuwa nuwatmau fiesta amiayi . Turamtai Jesúsnasha , tura ni nuiniatiri ainautincha untsurmakaru asaramtai , iisha nuni wemiaji . Tura Jesúsa nukurisha nuni pujumiayi .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Tura umuti vino tutai amukamtai , nukuri Jesúsan chicharak : — Vinoka mash amukayi , — timiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Tamaitiat Jesús aimiak : — Nukuachi ¿ warukaya winasha turutme ? Wi wainchatai takat turatnuka jeatsui , — timiayi .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Tamati Jesúsa nukuri vino surin ainaun chicharak : — Au inatmamtaisha miatrusrumek umirkataram , — timiayi .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Tamati muits kaya najanamu nekas juun seis armia nuna judío ainau jeanam wayaawar nu muitsnum yumin yarakar uwejencha , tura nawencha nijau armiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Tura asamtai , Jesús vino surin ainaun chicharak : — Ju muits irunuka yumi shikikrum , met met pintrataram , — timiayi . Tamati miatrusarang met met pintrarmiayi .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Tura pintraramtai Jesús chicharak : — Yamaikia jumchik shikikrum jeentin susataram , — tamati shikikiar jeeniun susarmiayi .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Tura vino surin ainau : Yumiapi yarakmaji tusar nekarmiayi . Antsu fiestanam untsumakuka yumi vino najanamun nekapsatas umusa jiis : — ¿ Jusha tunia itamuita ? — tusasha nekatsuk shiirman nekapramiayi .

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: Tura asa yamai nuwan nuwatkaun untsuk chicharak : — Ii nungkarin fiesta najankurkia , nu nangkamtaik nekasar vino pengker tuke suaji . Tura nukap amuraramtai , nuniangka mianchaun suaji . Antsu ameka nuka turutsuk , vino pengker aa nu ukusu asam sukartame , — timiayi .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Jesús nu nangkamtaik Galilea nungkanam Caná yaktanam nu wainchatai takatnaka turamiayi . Tura nu turamujai ni kakarmarin paan inakmasmiayi . Turamtai ni nuiniatiri ainautisha nu wainkau asar : “ Juka nekas Yus akupkamuitai ” timiaji .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Nunia Jesús ni nukurijai , tura ni yachí ainaujai , tura ni nuiniatiri ainautijai Capernaum yaktanam wemiaji . Tura nuni jear , jumchik kinta pujusmiaji .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Judío fiestari , Pascua tutai jeatak wajasamtai , iikia Jesúsjai Jerusalénnum wemiaji .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Tura nuni jear , Yus seatai juun jeanam wayaar , aints waakan surinau , tura uwijan surinau , tura kayuk suwencha surinau wainkamiaji . Tura aintsu kuikiarin yapajinausha wainkamiaji .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Tura Jesús nuna wainak , chapikian chapikmar umis , nujai waaka ainaun , tura uwija ainauncha awatar jiikmiayi . Tura kuikia yapajinau misarincha ayantur , kuikiarin nungka ujuntramiayi .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Tura kayuk suwen surin ainaun chicharak : — Juka mash jiiktaram . Wína Apaachiru jeenka surutai jeaka najanawairap , — timiayi .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Tamati ni nuiniatiri ainautisha Jesúsa turamuri nintimsar , Yuse chichamen etserin yaanchuik aarmauri nintimramiaji . Nu aarmauka Yuse jeen pachisar tu aarmawaitai : “ Ami jeemka nekas pengker asamtai , kakarman kasmatnuyajai , ” tu aarmawaitai .

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Jesús turamtai , judío juuntri ainau iniinak : — ¿ Ameka ju turata tusang Yuska aminka akuptamkamia ? Watska , Yus akupkamuitkumka , ¿ Yuse kakarmarijai warí wainchati takata turatatme ? — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús chicharak : — Wi ju jea pujaja juna yumpungkakrumnisha , wikia ataksha kampatmachik kintajai jeamkainjai , — timiayi .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Tamati judío juuntri ainau chicharinak : — ¿ Ju jeaka cuarenta y seis ( 46 ) musach jeamkamua juka kampatam kintajaingkiash jeamkaintam ? — tiarmiayi .

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Tinamaitiat Jesús nekas jean pachiska tichamiayi , antsu ni namangken pachis : Wi kampatam kinta jakan tepayatun ataksha nantaktinuitjai , taku timiayi .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Tu tinu asamtai Jesús ukunam jakamunmaya nantakiamtai , ni nuiniatiri ainautisha ni timiauri nintimrar nekasampita timiaji . Tura Yuse chichamen etserin ainausha yaanchuik Jesúsan pachisar tu aararu asaramtai , nusha ukunam nimtimrar nekasampita timiaji .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Nunia Jesús Pascua fiestan inangkartaj tusa , Jerusalénnum pujus , wainchati takat ainaun turamtai , aints untsuri nuna wainkar : Nekasmeapi Yus akupkamuitme tiarmiayi .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Tinamaitiat Jesús mash aints ainau nintimaurin nekau asa , wína miatrusarka nintimturinatsui tusa nekaamiayi .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Tura aints ainau nintin ningki paan nekaru asa , chikich ainaun pachiska wína ujatkarat pengké tichamiayi .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Fariseo aints Nicodemo naartin judío apuri ayayi .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Tura Jesúsan kashi weri chicharak : — Nuikiartinu , aints Yusjai pujachuka , ame wainchati takat turame nunaka kichkisha turachminuitai . Tura asamtai Yus amin aints ainaun nuiniarat tusa akuptamkawaitai tusar nekaji , — timiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Tama Jesús ayaak : — Nekasan tajame : Aints ataksha yakiya akiinachuka Yuse pujutirin waintancha pengké wainkachartinuitai , — timiayi .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Tamati Nicodemo iniak : — ¿ Aints timiá juuncha itiur ataksha akiinating ? ¿ Aints ataksha akiinatas ni nukuri ampujen engkematnukai ? — timiayi .

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Tu iniam Jesús ataksha ayaak : — Atsa , nuka turunashtinuitai . Aintsnumia akiina nuka aintsuitai . Antsu Yuse Wakani aintsun engkemtuamka nuka Yusnumia akiinui . Tura asamtai nekasan tajame : Aints Yuse Wakanijai akiinachuka Yus pujamunmaka pengké jeashtinuitai .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Wi amin chicharkun : ‘ Ataksha yakiya akiinatnuitme , ’ tajame nuka ¿ itiurkamnaukai ? tuuka nintimraip .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Nase nintimrata . Nase ningki wakerak nasentui . Tura nase uutmausha antayatmek ¿ tuniang winá ? tura ¿ tuki wea ? tusamka nekatsme . Yuse Wakani naseya nunisang wainchati asamtai , Yuse Wakanijai akiinausha tuyapi akiinua tusamka nekaashtinuitme , — timiayi .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Tama Nicodemo ataksha iniak : — ¿ Ame tame nusha itiurkamnawaita ? — timiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Tu iniam Jesús ayaak : — ¿ Ameka Israel ainau nuinichukitam ? ¿ Turayatmesha waruka wi taja nuka nekatsme ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Nekasan tajame : Iikia ii nekamu chichaaji . Tura ii wainmau etserji . Tura ii etserji nuka antayatrum nekasampita tu weatsrume .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Wikia ju nungkanmayan pachisan chichaamtai , nekasampita tachakrumka ¿ itiur nayaimpinmayan pachisan etsermausha antukrum nekasampita titarmek ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: “ Ju nungkanmaya aints kichkisha nayaimpinam wakaar ataksha tarauka ainatsui . Antsu wikia aints akiinayatun Yus akupkamu asan , nayaimpinmaya taramiajai .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Yaanchuik entsa atsamunam aints ainau napi esaim kajiinamtai , uwemrarat tusa Moisés napin jirun najana yakí takuimiayi . Tura asamtai wisha nunisnak aints akiinayatun Yus akupkamu asan , aints ainaun uwemtikratasan numinam yakí nemaatnuitjai .

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: Tura asamtai aints ainau nintimtursar : Nekasampi wina uwemtikrurtatua turutinauka jiinum wetsuk , antsu tuke iwiaaku pujusartin ainawai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Yus mash nungkanmaya ainautin timiá anengkratu asa , ni uchirin kichkinak akupturmakmiaji . Tura asamtai mash nekasampita tusar , nintimtin ainauka tukeka mengkakachartin ainawai , antsu tuke Yusnum iwiaaku pujusartin ainawai .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Yuska aints ainautin mengkaakarti tusangka ni Uchirinka akupturmakchamiaji . Antsu mash aints ainautin uwemtikramratas ni Uchirin akupturmakmiaji .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Yuse Uchiri nekasampita tusar nintimtinaunka ji kajintrashtinnumka pengké akupkashtinuitai . Antsu Yuse Uchiri kichik aa nuna nekasampita tusar nintimtinachu ainauka niin nekasampita tichau asar mengkaakartinuitai .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Yuse Uchiri ju nungkanam tara , aints ainau tunaarin paan nekamtikiamiayi . Turamaitiat aints ainau tunau turin asar , paaniunmaka pujutan nakitinak , antsu tuke teenam pujustasar wakerinau asar tuke mengkaakartin ainawai .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Tunau takau ainauka mash paaniunam pujutnaka nakitinawai . Tura ni turamurin nekarawarai tusar paaniunka yupitinawai .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Antsu nekas chichaman umirinauka Yuse wakeramurin tuke turinau asar , chikich aints ainau ni turamurin wainkarti tusar paaniunka yupitinatsui .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Nunia Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainautijai Judea nungkanam weri nuni pujusar , aints ainau imaimiaji .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Juansha Enón yaktanam Salimnum jeatak wajas aints ainaun imiaak pujumiayi . Nuni entsa nukap au asamtai , aints ainau wininaunka imaimiayi .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Nunaka Herodes niin kársernum engkeatsaing turamiayi .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Tura Juanku nuiniatiri ainau judío ainaujai chichainak : — ¿ Yana imiakratmauriya timiá pengkeraita ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Tura nunia Juankun iniasartas wear chicharinak : — Nuikiartinu , ame nuwik Jordán entsa amajin pujusam , amijai nuni pujuma nu pachisam : Wína ukurun winitatui timiame nuka yamaikia aints ainaun imiaawai . Tura asamtai mash niin nemarinawai , — ningki nintimsar tiarmiayi .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Tinamtai Juan aimiak : — Yus ni kakarmarin akupkachamtaikia , aints kichkisha nunaka pengké jukicharminuitai .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Atumka antarmin : ‘ Wikia Cristochuitjai , antsu eemak jintan iwiaratnua nunisnak akupkamuitjai , ’ wi timiaja nusha paan antukmarume .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Nintimrataram . Aints yamai nuwan nuwatmatai , ni amikrisha taa , nu mai tsaniasar wajainaun wainak , tura ni amikri etsermaun antuk nukap waraawai . Atumsha Jesús pachisrum etseru wearme nuna antukan , wisha nunisnak nekasan nukap waraajai .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Niisha mash aints ainaun nangkamasang juuntaitai tuke tiartinuitai . Antsu wikia nuna nangkamasnak tuke mianchau atinuitjai , — Juan timiayi .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Nunia ataksha Juan chichaak : Yakíya taramia nuka mash nangkamakuitai . Tura nungkanmaya ainautikia ju nungkanmaya asar , ju nungkanam aa nuke pachisar chichaaji . Antsu nayaimpinmaya taramia nuka mash ainia nuna nangkamakuitai .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Tura asa ni wainkamia nuna , tura antukmia nuna mash etserui . Tura waininayat ni chichamenka anturinatsui .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Antsu yakiya taramia nuna chichamen juwinak nekasampita tinauka Yus ta nuka nekasaintai tinawai .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Yus ni Wakanin surittsuk susamu asa , Yus akupkamuka ni chichamen tuke etserui .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Yus ni Uchirin aneau asa , ninu aa nuna mash inarti tusa akupkamiayi .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Aints Yuse Uchirin nekasampita tinauka Yusnum tuke pujusartin ainawai . Antsu Yuse Uchirin nintimtichu ainauka Yusnumka tukeka pujuschartin ainawai . Nunia Yusen umirtan nakitinau asaramtai , Yuska tuke wait wajaktinnum akupkatnuitai , — timiayi .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Aints ainau untsuri Jesúsa chichamen antukar niin nemarkartas mainiartas wakeriarmiayi . Tura wainiat Jesús nu aints ainaunka imiaichmiayi , antsu ni nuiniatiri ainauti aints ainau imaimiaji . Turakrin fariseo ainau iin pachitmasar : Jesúsa nuiniatiri Juankun nangkamasarang aints timiá untsurin imiainawai , tiarmiayi .

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús nuna nekau asa : Ataksha iijai Galilea nungkanam waketkimi tamati , iikia Jesúsjai tsaniasar Judea nungkanmaya jiinkimiaji .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Tura jiinkir Samaria nungka japen nangkamaktin amiaji .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Tura Samaria nungkanam weakur , yakat Sicar tutainum jeatak wajasmiaji . Nu nungkaka yaanchuikia Jacobo nungkari ayayi , tura asa ni uchiri Josén susamuyayi .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Nu nungkanmasha yaanchuik Jacob yumi shikitin nungka chingkiakmau asamtai , nuwa ainau nuni yumin shikiu armiayi . Tsaa tupin wajasai , Jesús weka wekaaka pimpikin asa , yumi shikiti nungka taimunam ayamas keemsamiayi .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Turamtai ni nuiniatiri ainautikia yaktanam yurumak sumaktasar wemiaji . Turakrin Jesús ningki juwakmiayi . Tura juwakamtai Samarianmaya nuwa yumin shikiktas tamiayi . Tura taamtai Jesús chicharak : — Yumi shikikiam surusta , — timiayi .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Tu seam nu nuwaka ayaak : — ¿ Waruka Samarianmaya nuwa aisha , ame judíotiatmesha winasha yumi umurtincha seatme ? — timiayi . Judío ainauka Samarianmaya ainaujai pengké aujnaichau asaramtai nunaka timiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Tamati Jesús ayaak : — Yus amin yumi umurtinun suramsatas wakera nu nekakmeka , tura yumi surusta tusa seatma nusha nekakmeka , nekasam wína seatinuitme . Turakmin wikia tuke yumi iwiaaku pujustinun sukartin asan , amin susamnawaitjame , — timiayi .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Tama nuwasha ayaak : — Amesha yumi shikitisha takaktsume . ¿ Tura yumi shikiti timiá nitkasha tuniang yumi tuke pujutan sukartincha surustame ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Ii yaanchuik juuntri Jacob ju yumi shikitin chingkiamu asamtai , niisha tura ni uchiri ainausha , tura ni waakari ainausha mash juni umin armiayi . Nunia chikich ainausha umurarti tusa junaka ukurtamkimiaji . ¿ Amesha ii juuntri Jacob nangkakaukitam ? — timiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Tu iniam Jesús ayaak : — Ju yumin umauka ataksha kitaartinuitai .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Antsu wi yumin susatatja nuna umauka ataksha pengké kitaarchatnuitai . Tura nu yumin wi suamka aintsu nintin entsa pukunia nunisang aintsun pujut nangkankashtinun susatasan pajamturtinuitjai , — timiayi .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Tamati nu nuwaka ayaak : — Winasha nu yumikia surusta . Wisha nuna umuran , pengké kitamchau ami . Tura asan yumin shikiktasnasha juningkia winichu ami , — timiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Tamati Jesús chicharak : — Aishrum untsukam nijai juni tata , — timiayi .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Tamati nuwasha aimiak : — Wína aishruka atsawai , — timiayi . Tamati Jesús ayaak : — Ame : Aishruka atsawai tame nuka nekasam tame .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Ame cinco ( 5 ) aints tsanirmam pujuyame . Tura yamaisha tsanirmam pujame nuka aishrumchawaitai . Tura asamtai : Aishruka atsawai tame nuka nekasam tame , — timiayi .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Tama nu nuwaka aimiak : — Apuru , wikia Yuse chichame etsernua nunin jiajme .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Ii juuntri ainau ju muranam wakaar Yusen : Ameketme juuntam tinu armiayi . Turayatrum judíotirmeka : Jerusalénnum Yusen ameketme juuntam tiartinuitai tuwearme , — timiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Tamati Jesús ataksha ayaak : — Nuwachi nintimrata . Kinta jeatak wajasi , atumka ju muranmaka tura Jerusalénnumsha ii Apaachiri Yus : Ameketme juuntam titasrumka wechamnawaitrume .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Atumka Yus nekachiatrum : Ameketme juuntam tarume . Antsu mash aints ainau uwemtikratin judíonmaya tatin asamtai , judíotikia : ¿ Yus yaachita ? tusar nekau asar nekasar : Ameketme juuntam taji .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Kinta jeatata nuka yamaikia jeayi . Aints ainau ii Apaachiri Yusen nekasar : Ameketme juuntam tiartas wakerinauka , tuke nintijai Yusen nekasar nintimrartinuitai . Antsu aints ainau niin nekasar tuke nintijai : Ameketme juuntam turutiarat tusa Yuska wakerawai .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Yuska nekas Wakanitai . Tura Yusen nekasar : Ameketme juuntam tiartas wakerinauka Yuse Wakani wakera nunisarang tupin nintimsar : Ameketme juuntam tiartinuitai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Tamati nu nuwa chicharak : — Mesíaska chikich ainau Cristo tu weena nuka tatinuitai . Wisha nunaka nekajai . Tura ni taa , mash aa nunaka iin paan ujatmaktinuitji , — timiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Tamati Jesús ayaak : — Ame wína pachitsam chichaame nuka wiitjai , — timiayi .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Nu nuwajai chichaak pujai , ni nuiniatiri ainautisha tamiaji . Tura nu nuwa wainkar nukap nintimturmiaji . Turayatur : ¿ warí pachismea aujaisha chichaame ? tura ¿ waruka chichaame ? tusarkia , kichkisha iniaschamiaji .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Nuniangka nu nuwaka yumi shikitirin japa ukuki , yaktanam waketki aints ainaun ujaak :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: — Atumsha werum , aints wi turunamurun mash wina turuta nu jiitaram . ¿ Nuka Yus akupkatin ii nakaji nuchaukai ? — timiayi .

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Tamati nuna antukaru ainauka yaktanmaya jiinkiar , Jesús pujamunam wearmiayi .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Nu nuwa yaktanam weamtai , ni nuiniatiri ainauti Jesús chicharkur : — Nuikiartinu , amesha yuwata , — timiaji .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Tamaitiat Jesús iin airmak : — Wína yutairuka atum nekachmau awai , — turammiaji .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Turammatai iisha ininiakur : — ¿ Chikich aints ni yuwatniurinka itarcharmasha ? — tunaimiaji .

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Tunaiyakrin Jesús chichartamak : — Wína akuptuku wakeramurin miatrusnak umiakun , tura ni takatrin miatrusnak takakmakun , yutan yuwina nunisnak kakartinuitjai .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Atumka chichaakrum : Cuatro ( 4 ) nantu nangkamaramtai , árak juuktin jeatatui , tarume . Antsu wikia tajarme : Pangkairam jiimsaram aints winina au jiistaram . Arak juuktin kinta jeachu wainiatrumek , árak tsamakua nunisarang aints untsuri uwemtikratnuka yanchuk jeayi .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Aints arakan juwiinaunaka akiinawai . Tura arakan araamia nujai metek warainawai . Tura uwemratin chichaman antukaru ainau nu árak juwaamua nunisarang artinuitai . Yuse chichamen etserin ainau arakan araina nunisarang , tura arakan juwiina nunisarang mai metek takakminau asar , mai metek nayaimpinam warasartin ainawai .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Tura asamtai yaanchuik juun ainau chichainak : ‘ Chikich aintska arakan araawai , tura chikichka juwaawai , ’ tu tinu armia nuka nekasaintai .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Atumsha nunisrumek Yuse chichamenka etserchau arumning , aints ainau irurtaram tusan akupajrume . Chikich aints ainau arakan arainawa nunisarang Yuse chichamen yaanchuik etserkarmiayi . Turinamtai ukunmasha atum aints ainau Yuse chichamen nekasampita tiarat tusaram nekamtikiatnuitrume , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Ni nuiniatiri ainautin chichartamak pujai , nu Samarianmaya nuwa waketki , ni yaktarin pujuinaun ujaak : “ Wi turunamurun mash ujatkayi , ” tinu asamtai , nu nuwa etsermaun antukaru ainau untsuri Jesús nekas Yus akupkamuitai tiarmiayi .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Tura asar Samarianmaya ainau Jesús pujamunam taar : “ Ii yaktarin winitaram , iijai pujusmintrum , ” tinamtai iisha ayu tusar , nu yaktanam jear jimia kinta kanurmiaji .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Turakrin chikich aints ainausha Jesúsa chichamen antukar , nekasampita tiarmiayi .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Tura asar nuwan chicharinak : — Yamaikia ame chichaamu nuke antuku asar , nekasampita tatsuji , antsu iik ni chichame anturkau asar : Juka nekas mash nungkanmaya ainaun uwemtikratnuitai tusar nekaji , — tiarmiayi .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Nunia Jesús Samarianam jimiaran kanur , nunia jiinki Galileanam wemiayi .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Tura ni nungkarin waketki ai , ukunam atiniun pachis chichaak : — Yuse chichame etsernun ni nungkarin pujuinau pachinatsui , — timiayi .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Tura Galilea nungkanam jeamtai , nunia aints ainau Pascua fiestan inangkartas Jerusalénnum wearu asar , nuni pujusar , Jesúsa turamurin wainkaru asar , Jesúsan pengker awajsarmiayi .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Tura asamtai Galilea nungkanam pujau ataksha Caná yaktanam waketkimiayi . Nu yaktanam yaanchuik vino najanamia nuni Jesús jeai , chikich yaktanam Capernaum tutainum apu uchiri jaak tepemiayi .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Tura asamtai Capernaumnumia apu : Jesús Judea nungkanmaya jiinki , Galileanam tayi , tamaun antuk , Jesúsan werimiayi . Tura jeari chicharak : — Uchir pengké jatanak wajasun ukukjai . Wait aneasam jearun winim uchir tsuwatrita , — timiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Tama Jesús ayaak : — Atumka wi wainchati takatan takai wainchakrumka , nekasampita turutsurme , — timiayi .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Tamaitiat apu ayaak : — Apuru , wait aneasam uchir jatsaing , wári winitrita , — timiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Tamati Jesús apun chicharak : — Jeemin waketkita . Uchirmeka pengker wajasi , — timiayi . Jesús tamati , Capernaumnumia apu nuna antuk : Nekasampita tusa waketkimiayi .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Tura waketki ni jeen jeatak wajasai , ni inatiri ainau jeanmaya jiinkiar ingkiungkar ujainak : — Uchirmeka pengker wajasi , — tiarmiayi .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Tinamtai apu ni inatirin iniak : — ¿ Tsaa tuni ketia pengkersha wajasma ? — timiayi . Tu iniam ni inatiri aiminak : — Yau tsaa yantanti michatrami , — tiarmiayi .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Tinamtai apu nintimias : Tsaa yantanti Jesús : Uchirmeka pengker wajasi , tu ujakmau asa , ni aintsrijai mash Jesúsan nekasampita tiarmiayi .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Jesús nu apu uchirin tsuwaru asa , Galilea nungkanam ni kakarmarin jimiaran inakmasmiayi . Tura nu wainchati takatnaka Judea nungkanmaya jiinki turamiayi .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Nuniangka judío ainau fiestan najanawaramtai , Jesús ataksha Jerusalénnum waketkimiayi .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Jerusalénnum Uwija Waiitiri tutainum nuni ayaamas maati amiayi . Nu maati naaringkia hebreo chichamejai Betesda tinu armiayi . Nu maati yantamen cinco ( 5 ) jea jeamkamunam jau ainau tepetiri armiayi .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Tura jau ainau , tura wainmichu ainausha , tura wekaichau ainausha , tura kijiru ainausha untsuri nuni tepearmiayi .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Tura asar Yuse awemamuri aneachmau entsan tamparmamtikmatai , aints ainau : Wiyá ayangnaka pengker wajasainjapi , tu nintimsar : Entsa miartukat tusar maatinam nakasarmiayi .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Nuni nakainak pujuinamunam aints treinta y ocho ( 38 ) musach tuke najaimiak tepeu pujuyayi .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Tuke nunisang tepeu asamtai , Jesús nu aintsun wainak , tura timiá musach najaimiak tepeu nekau asa chicharak : — ¿ Ame pengker wajastasam wakeramek ? — timiayi .

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Tu iniam jau aimiak : — Ja ai , natsa , antsu entsa miartamtai , aints wina imiatminka atsau asamtai , wikia maatsaing chikitcha eemkar maa weenawai . Tuminau asaramtai wikia juni tsaatsuk tuke tepajai , — timiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Tamati Jesús chicharak : — Nantakim tepetiram jukim weta , — timiayi .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Tama nu chichaamujai metek nu aintska pengker wajasmiayi . Tura nantaki tepetirin juki wemiayi . Tura ayamtai kinta asamtai ,

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: judío juuntri ainau nu pengker wajasun chicharinak : — Ju kintaka ayamtai asamtai , tepetiram jukichminuitme , — tiarmiayi .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Tu tinam nu aintska aimiak : — Wína tsuwarauka chichartak : ‘ Tepetiram jukim weta , ’ turutin asamtai aitkajai , — timiayi .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Tamati iniinak : — ¿ Yaachia tepetiram jukim weta turamiaj ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Tu tinamaitiat nu aintska aimkatatkama tujinkamiayi . Aints untsuri nuni wekajinamunam Jesúscha wári jiinki weau asamtai , nu tsuwaarama nusha yáki tusangka nekaachmiayi .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Tura jumchik arus Yus seatai juun jeanam wayaamtai , Jesús niin wainak chicharak : — Antukta . Yamaikia pengker wajasume . Tura asam ame najaimiame nuna nangkamasmek jatan jurumaki tusam , yamaikia ataksha tunau turuwaip , — timiayi .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Tama nu aintska judío juuntri ainamunam we : — Wína tsuwarauka Jesúsaitai , — tusa etserkamiayi .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Tu ujaam , ayamtai kintati turau asamtai , judío juuntri ainau : ¿ Jesús itiurkarik maawaintai ? tu nintimrarmiayi .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Tu nintiminamtai Jesús nuna nekaa chichaak : — Wína Apaachir ju kintatisha tuke takakmasu asamtai , wisha nunisnak takakmajai , — timiayi .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Tamati judío juuntri ainau nuna nekaawar : “ Ayamtai kintan pachiatsui , tura Yus wína Apaachiruitai tinu asa , Yus wijai metekaitai , tu nintimias pujatsuash , ” tusar Jesúsan nuna nangkamasarang kajerkar maawartas wakeriarmiayi .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Tuminamtai Jesús chicharak : — Nekasan tajarme : Wi Yuse Uchiri asan , wiki nintimsanak nunaka kichkisha turachminuitjai . Antsu wína Apaachir tura nuna wainkan nunaka turatnuitjai . Wína Apaachir tura nunaka wisha nunisnak mash turajai .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Wína Apaachirka wínaka anentui . Tura winasha ni tura nunaka mash nekamtikrawai . Tura nuna nangkamasang aints wainchati takatnasha winaka inaktursatatui . Tura asamtai atumsha nu wainkarmeka shamkaram nintimratatrume .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Wína Apaachirka jakau ainau tuke iwiaaku pujusarat tusa inankitin asamtai , wisha nunisnak wi wakeraknaka nunasha turamnawaitjai .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Wína Apaachirka aints ainaun pachis : Nu aintska pengkeraitai , tura nu aintska paseetai tatsui . Antsu wina Apaachirka : Aints ainau mash jiisam : Juka paseetai , tura juka pengkeraitai tusam mash nekaata turutmiayi .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Tura asa aints mash wína Apaachirun pengker awajinauka winasha nunisarang mash pengker awajtustin ainawai . Wína Apaachir akuptuku asamtai , wína pachitinachuka wína Apaachirnasha nunisarang pachinatsui .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: “ Nekasan tajarme : Wína chichamrun antukaru ainau wína akuptukmia nuna nekasampita tinu asar , pujut nangkankashtinun juwinawai . Tura jinam wait wajaktinnumka wechartinuitai , antsu yaanchuik jakawa nunisarang pujuinayat , pujut nangkankashtinun jukin asar , Yusnum tuke iwiaaku pujusartin ainawai .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Nunasha nekasan tajarme : Uwemratin kinta jeatatui timiaja nuka yanchuk jeayi . Nu kinta jeau asamtai , wi Yuse Uchiri asan ataksha winamtai , wina untsummaurun antukartin ainauka jakaru ainayat , tuke iwiaaku pujusartin ainawai .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Wikia ni Uchiri asamtai , wina Apaachirka tuke iwiaaku pujau asa , aints ainau tuke pujut nangkankashtin susata tusa tsangkatrukmiayi .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Tura wikia aints ayatun Yus akupkamu asan , aints ainaun pachisan : Nu aintska pengkeraitai , tura chikich aintska paseetai tusa nekaatnun wína Apaachirka surusmiayi .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Ju chichamka itiurkamnawaita tuuka nintimrairap . Jakamunmaya nantakiartin kinta nekas jeatnuitai . Nu kinta jeamtai , jakaru ainau mash wi untsumaurun antukar ,

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: iwiarsamunmaya jiinkiartinuitai . Aints pengker aa nuna takasaru ainauka pujut nangkankashtinnum weartas nantakiartinuitai . Antsu tunau takasaru ainauka jinam tuke wait wajakartinnum weartas nantakiartinuitai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: Nunia Jesús ataksha etserak : — Wiki wakeraknaka pengké turachminuitjai . Antsu wína Apaachir turata turutin asamtai , wikia miatrusnak umiajai . Tura wína Apaachir wína akuptuku asamtai , wi wakeraja nunaka nintimtsuk pujau asan , ni wakeramurinak turajai . Tura asan wi turaja nuka nekas pengkeraitai .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Wiki nintimtumasan etsertumamtaikia , aints ainau : Nangkami tawai turutiartinuitai .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Tura chikich wína pachitas etserturkatnuka awai . Ni wína pachitas etsera nunaka nekasaintai tusan nekajai .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Atumsha wína pachitsaram chicham nekaatasrum aints ainau Juankun iniasarat tusaram akupkamiarume . Turakrumin Juan tímia nuka nekasaintai .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Juan ji kapawa nunisang ¿ aints ainau ninti itiur ainawak ? tusa chichaman paan etsermiayi . Tura asamtai atumsha jumchik kinta ni chichame antukrum warasmiarume . Tura wainiatun aints wina pachitsar tina nunaka wikia pachiatsjai . Antsu Yuse chichame nintimkuram uwemrataram tusan nunaka tajarme .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Juan wína pachitas etsermia nuka nekasaintai tusaram nekaratnuitrume . Tura nuna nangkamasrumek wína Apaachir Yus akupkamuitai tusaram nekaratnuitrume . Ni turata turutin asamtai , wi turaja nu wainkuram : Nekasampi Yus akupkamuita tusaram nekaratnuitrume .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Tura wína Apaachirka wína akuptuku asa , wína pachitas : Wiitjai tusa paan nekamtikruamiayi . Tura wainiatrumek atumka ni chichamengka pengké anturchau ayarume , tura wina Apaachirsha waintasha wainchawaitrume .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Nunia wína Apaachir akuptuku waitiatrum , nekasampita turutchau asaram , wína Apaachiru chichamengka atumi nintijaingkia juwatsrume .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Atumka Yuse chichamen etserin yaanchuik aararmia nu aujkuram : Nuna aujsanka nekasan tuke iwiaaku pujusjainjapi tusaram nangkamrum tu nintimrume . Antsu nu aarmau ainauka wína pachitsar aarmau ainawai .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Tura wainiatrumek wini winiram nekasrum pujut nangkankashtin jutaka nakitarme .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: “ Aints wína pengkeraitme turutinamtaisha wikia pachiatsjai .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Maj , atumka Yus aneatsrume tusan wikia nekajrume .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Wína Apaachir akuptuku asamtai , ju nungkanam taawitjai . Turai waitiatrumek winaka nakitrarme . Antsu chikich aints ningki nintimsar chichaman etserkartas wininamtaikia , nuna chichamengka anturkatatrume .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Atumka mai nuwamtak : Pengke aintsuitme turutiarat tu nintimsaram pujayatrum Yuska pachiatsrume . Tura asaram ¿ winaka itiurak nekasampita turutiaram ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Atumka wína pachitsaram : Ii tunaari ii Apaachirin ujatramkatatji , tuuka nintimsairap . Wikia nunaka turashtatjai . Atumka : Moisésa chichamen umirkan uwemratatjapi tayatrumek , Moisésa chichame umichu asakrumin , Moisés atumi tunaarin pachis paan aarmiayi .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Tura Moisés wína pachitas aaru asamtai , Moisésa aarmauri nekasampita tusaram , winasha nekasampi Yus akupkamuitme tusaram nintimtursatnuitrume .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Tura Moisésa aarmauri nekasampita tichau asaram ¿ wína chichamrusha itiurak nekasampita titaram ? — Jesús timiayi .

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Nuna tusa ukuki , Jesús Galilea kucha tumajin katingmiayi . Nu kuchanka chikich aints ainauka Tiberias kucha tu weena nuwaitai .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Tura jau ainaun tsuwarchamniaun wainiat , Jesús tsuwaru asamtai , chikich aints untsuri nuna wainkaru asar Jesúsan nemariarmiayi .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Judío ainau fiestari , Pascua tutai jeatak wajasamtai , Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainautijai muranam wakaar , nuni pujusmiaji .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Tura nuni pujarin , Jesús pangkai jiimkama aints untsuri wininaun wainak Felipen chicharak : — Aints timiá untsuri yuratasrisha ¿ tuniang yurumkasha sumaktaij ? — timiayi .

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Jesúska ni turatnurinka ningki nekayat ¿ Felipe warintuk aimkain ? tusa timiayi .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Tu iniam Felipe ayaak : — Jimia pachak kuikiajai pang sumakrisha , kichik kichik aints jumchik suwamsha jeachminuitai , — timiayi .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Tamati chikich nuiniatiri Andrés , Simón Pedro yachí , Jesúsan chicharak :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: — Juni uchi pang sebadajai najanamun cinco ( 5 ) takakui , tura namaknasha jimiarchik takakui . ¿ Tura aints timiá untsurisha itiurak mashcha yuratai ? — timiayi .

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Tamaitiat Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainautin chichartamak : — Aints ainau mash pujustaram titaram , — turammiaji . Turammatai chirichri nukap amaunum pujusar , mash irumram cinco mil ( 5 , 000 ) aints iruntrarmiaji .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Mash iruntraramtai , Jesús pangkan takus , Yusen maaketai tusa , ni nuiniatiri ainautin suramsamtai , iisha nuni pujuinau mash susarmiaji . Tura namaknasha pachitsuk yuwarti tusar susarmiaji .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Tura aints ainau mash tutuararamtai , Jesús ni nuiniatiri ainautin chichartamak : — Nangkamiar japawarai tusaram , ampirmau jukitaram , — turammiaji .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Turammatai pang cinco ( 5 ) amia nuna ampintramuri doce ( 12 ) changkin chumpiamiaji .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Tura Jesús nu wainchati takatan turau asamtai , aints nuna wainkar chicharnainak : — Juka nekas Yuse chichamen etserin ju nungkanam tatinuitai tinu armia nuwaapita , — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Tura ii apuri ati tusar , Jesúsan jukiartas wakerinam , Jesús nuna nekaa ataksha ningki muranam wakamiayi .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Tura kintamramtai Jesúsa nuiniatiri ainauti kuchanam wemiaji .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Kashi Jesús taachmatai , juun kanunam engkemar , Capernaum yaktanam waketkimi tusar katimiaji .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Turarin nase kakar nasenmatai , kucha tamparamuri kakar tamparimiayi .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Tumamtai iikia kuchanam kawinmakir seis ( 6 ) kilómetron wearin , Jesús kuchanam nungkanma nunisang wekaaki winau wainkamiaji . Tura wainkar shamkamiaji .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Tumakrin Jesús chichartamak : — Wiitjai , shamrukairap , — turammiaji .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Turammatai iikia pengker nintimsar Jesús engkear jukir , kakarmachu ii weamunam nujamkamiaji .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Kashin tsawaarar aints tumajin juwakaru ainau kanu atsau wainkar : Ni nuiniatiri ainau Jesúsnaka ayacharmapi tu nintimrarmiayi .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Nuni iruntrar chichainai , Tiberias yaktanmaya ainau chikich kanujai taarmiayi . Tura yau Jesús Yusen maaketai tusa , pangkan aints ainaun yuramia nuni arakchichu nujamkaramtai , aints nuni juwakaru ainau Jesúsnasha waintsuk , tura ni nuiniatiri ainautincha waitmakchau asar , nu kanunam engkemawar : Jesús eaktai tusar , Capernaum yaktanam wearmiayi .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Tura kucha tumajin katingkiar , nuni Jesúsan wainkar iniinak : — Nuikiartinu ¿ warutia junisha katingmame ? — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús ayaak : — Nekasan tajarme : Atumka yau pang yuwaram tutuaru asaram , wína eatrume . Turayatrum wainchatin turaja nuka nintimtsurme .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Junia nungkanam yurumak kaurtin aa nuke nintimsaram pujuirap . Antsu nekasrum : ¿ Itiurak tuke Yusnum pujusaintaj ? tusaram , yuta tuke kaurchatin aa nu nintimrau ataram . Apaachir Yus : Ameka nu turata tusa , wína inatrau asamtai , wikia aints ayatnak , nu yutanka susatnuitjarme , — timiayi .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Tamati aints ainau iniinak : — ¿ Yus wakeramu umiktasrisha warí itiurkatnuitji ? — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús ayaak : — Yus wakeramuka nuwaitai : Yus wína akuptuku asa , aints ainau mash wína nimtimtursarat tusa wakerawai , — timiayi .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Tamati ataksha iniinak : — ¿ Tura amesha warí wainchati takatcha turame ? Iikia nu wainkar : Nekasmeapi Yus akupkamuitme tusar , iikia nu nintimsar pujustinuitji . Tura asar ¿ warí wainchati takatcha turame ? tusar iikia nekaatasar wakeraji .

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Yuse chichame tu aarmau asamtai , ii yaanchuik juuntri ainau aints atsamunam yurumak maná tutain yuwarmiayi . Nu aarmauka nuwaitai : “ Aints ainaun yuratas Yus nayaimpinmaya yurumkan akupkamiayi , ” — tiarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús aimiak : — Wi taja nuka nekasaintai . Moiséska atumi juuntri ainaun nayaimpinmaya yurumkanka susachmiayi . Antsu wína Apaachir nayaimpinmayan yurumak nekas aa nuna suramrume .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Yus nekas yurumkan nayaimpinmayan akupak , mash nungkanmaya aints ainaun pujut nangkankashtinun susatnua nuwaitai , — timiayi .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Tamati chicharinak : — Apuru , nu yurumak pujut nangkankashtinun sukartin tame nuka tuke sukartusta , — tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús aimiak : — Wikia tuke pujutan sukartin asan atumi yurumkaria tumawaitjai . Tura asamtai wini wininauka tuke yapartsuk pujusartinuitai . Tura wína nekasampita turutinauka tuke kitamtsuk wijai pujusartinuitai .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Antsu wi atumin timiaja nunaka ataksha tajarme : Wina waitkayatrum : Nekasam Yus akupkamuitme turutsurme .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Aints ainaun wína Apaachir : Nuka aminu arti timiau asar , nuka wína aintsur artinuitai . Tura asaramtai wini wininaunka pengké nakitrashtinuitjai .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Wikia wína wakeramurun turatasnaka nayaimpinmayangka tachawaitjai , antsu wína akuptuku wakeramurin najanatasan taawitjai .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Wína Apaachir wína akuptuku asa : Aints ainaun wína surusmia nunaka kichkisha mengkatsuk , antsu nungka amukatin kinta jeamtai , inankita tusa wakerawai .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Aints ainau wína nekasampi Yuse Uchirinme turutinauka mash tuke iwiaaku pujusartinuitai . Tura nu aints jakaramtai , nungka amukatin kinta jeamtai , wi inankitnuitjai . Nuwaitai wina Apaachiru wakeramuringkia , — Jesús timiayi .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Jesús : “ Wiitjai yurumak nayaimpinmaya akupkamunka , ” tinu asamtai , judío ainau Jesúsan pachisar pasé chichatan nangkamawarmiayi .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Tura chicharnainak : — ¿ Juka Jesúschaukai ? ¿ José uchiria nuchaukai ? Iikia juna aparisha tura nukurisha wainiaji . Nuna uchirintiat ¿ warukaya nayaimpinmaya taawitjai tawa ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Tu tinamtai Jesús chicharak : — Tuuka aujmatrutsuk asataram .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Wína Apaachir wína akuptukmia nuka aints ainaun nintimtikchamtaikia , aints kichkisha winingkia winichartinuitai . Tura nungka amukatin kinta jeamtai , wini wininaunka jakamunmayan inankitnuitjai .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Yaanchuik Yuse chichame etserin tu aarmiayi : “ Yus mash aints ainaun nuiniartinuitai , ” tu aarmau asamtai , wina Apaachiru chichamen antukar nuimiaru ainauka wini wininawai .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: “ Wína Apaachirun aints kichkisha wainkacharuitai . Antsu wiki Yusnumia tau asan , Apaachirun wainkawaitjai .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: “ Nekasan tajarme : Wína nekasar nintimtursar pujuinauka pujut nangkankashtinun jukiartin ainawai .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Wikia tuke pujutan sukartin asan , yurumkaria tumawaitjai .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Nintimrataram . Yaanchuik atumi juuntri ainau aints atsamunam yurumak maná tutain yuwariat mash jakarmiayi .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Antsu yurumkan nayaimpinmayan pachisan taja nuka wiitjai . Aints yurumkan yuwa nunisarang nekasampita turutinauka tuke jakachartin ainawai .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Nayaimpinmaya yurumkan tuke pujutan sukartinnaka wiitjai . Tura asamtai nu yurumkan yuwinauka tuke iwiaaku pujusartin ainawai . Mash nungkanmaya ainau pujut nangkankashtinun jukiarat tusan jakatnuitjai . Tura asan wi yurumkaitjai taja nunaka wína namangkrun pachisan tajai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Tamati judío mai nuwamtak chicharnainak : — ¿ Juka itiurak yurumak yuwataram tusasha ni namangkencha sukartusminuita ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús chichaak : — Nekasan tajarme : Wikia aints akiinayatun , Yus akuptuku asamtai , wína namangkur yuwachkurmeka , tura wina numpar umachkurmeka nekasrum pujut nangkankashtinka jukishtinuitrume .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Aints wína nekasampita turutuka wína namangkrun yuwawa tumawaitai , tura wína numparun umawa tumawaitai . Tura asa pujut nangkankashtinun jukin asamtai , nungka amuamunam nu aintsnaka inankitnuitjai .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Wina namangkruka nekas yuta tumawaitai . Tura wina numparsha nekas umutiya tumawaitai .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Wína namangkrun nintimias yuwauka , tura wína numparun nintimias umauka wijai tuke tsanias pujawai . Tura asamtai wisha nijai tuke tsaniasan pujajai .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Wina Apaachirka tuke puja nuka wína akuptak tuke pujustinun surusu asamtai , wína namangkrun nintimsar yuwinauka wi pujaja nunisarang wijai tuke iwiaaku pujusartinuitai .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Yus yurumkan nayaimpinmayan akupkamia nuna pachisan chichaajai . Yaanchuik atumi juuntri nayaimpinmayan yurumak akupkamun yuwariat jakarmiayi . Antsu yamaram yurumkan yuwinauka tuke iwiaaku pujusartinuitai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Pujut nangkankashtinun pachis : Wikia yurumka tumawaitjai tusa , aints ainaun Capernaum yaktanam iruntai jeanam Jesús tu nuiniarmiayi .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Jesúsa nemarnuri untsuri nu chichaman antukaru asar , mai nuwamtak chicharnainak : — Ju chichamka nekas yumtinuitai . ¿ Yáki junasha antukat ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Tu tinamtai Jesús ni tunaiyamun nekaa chicharak : — ¿ Waruka wi taja nuka napchawaitai ? tarume .

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Wi aints ayatun , Yus akupkamu asan , yaanchuik pujumiaja nuni waketkiamtaikia ¿ warukawaintrumek ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Yuse Wakani nuke pujut yamarman sukartawai . Antsu aintsu namangkengka tuke iwiaakuka pengké pujuschamnawaitai . Wi taja nunaka Yuse Wakani nekamtikramat tusan , tura nekas pujut yamarman suramsarat tusan atumin ujaajrume , — Jesús timiayi .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Tura Jesús niin nintimtichu ainaun , tura niin suruktinua nunasha nu nangkamtaik nekau asa , ni nemarnuri ainautin chichartamak : — Atumjai iruntrar pujuinau winaka mashka nintimturinatsui .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Tura asakrumin wikia atumin chicharkun : Wína Apaachir aints ainaun wini winiarat tusar nintimtikchamka , aints kichkisha wini winichartinuitai timiajrume , — timiayi .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Tu tama ni nemarnuri untsuri Jesúsan ukukiar niin nemartan inaisarmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Tuminamtai Jesús ni doce ( 12 ) nuiniatiri ainautin ininmak : — ¿ Atumsha nunisrumek jiinkiram wetasrum wakerarmek ? — turammiaji .

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Turammatai Simón Pedro aimiak : — Atsa Apuru ¿ yanumak wetaij ? Ami chichamijai tuke iwiaaku pujustinuitji . Amek nu chichamka etseru weame .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Iikia nekasampi Yus Akupkamuita , tu nintimsar pujau asar nuka nekaji , — timiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Tamati Jesús aimiak : — Wi doce ( 12 ) aints ainautirmin wina nuiniatir ataram tusan inaikiamiajrume . Turayat atumnia kichik iwianchrintin pachitkawai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Ni tímia nuka Judas Iscarioten Simónka uchirin taku timiayi . Judascha ni nuiniatirintiat ukunam Jesúsan anangka surukmiayi .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Nunia Jesús Galilea nungkanam wekaimiayi . Tura Judea nungkanam judío juuntri Jesús maatai tinau asaramtai , nuni wetan nakitmiayi .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Tura judío fiestari , Aakmakmau Fiesta tutai jeatak wajamtai ,

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: ni yachí ainau Jesúsan chicharinak : — Ami nuiniatiram Judea nungkanam pujuinau ami wainchati takatrumin wainkarat tusam , junia jiinkim nuni weta .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Chikich aints ainau : Wina turamurun wainkarat tusar wakerinauka uukarka turinatsui . Ame wainchati takat takaakmeka , mash aints ainau wainminamunam turata , — tiarmiayi .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Ni yachí ainausha : Nekasmeapi Yus akupkamuitme , tinachu asar nunaka tiarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús chicharak : — Wi fiestanam wetin kintarka jeatsui . Antsu atumka pachitsuk weminuitrume .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Ju nungkanmaya ainau atumnaka kajertaminatsui . Antsu wikia ni tunau takasmaurin nekamtikmau asar , winaka kajertu weenawai .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Atumek fiestanam wetaram . Antsu wína kintarka jeachu asamtai , wikia weatsjai , — timiayi .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Nuna tusa ukuki Galileanam juwakmiayi .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Turamtai ni yachí jiinkiar fiestanam wearmiayi . Antsu Jesús juwakiat ukunam Jerusalénnum wemiayi . Tura aints ainau nekarawarai tusa uumak wemiayi .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Judío juuntri ainausha fiesta irunmaunum Jesúsan eainak : — ¿ Nusha tuning puja ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Nu fiestati iruntrar aints untsuri Jesúsan pachisar chichainak : — Nu aintska nekas pengkeraitai , — tunaiyarmiayi . Tinamtai chikich ainau : — Atsa , nuka paseetai . Aints ainaun anangkatas wekainuitai , — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Tura judío juuntrin shaminau asar , paan antukarai tusar chichakcharmiayi .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Fiesta japen wajasai , Jesús Yus seatai juun jeanam waya , Yuse chichamen nuikiartutan nangkamamiayi .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Turamtai judío ainau ni chichamen antukar nukap nintimrar : — Jusha papin nuimiarchau ayatcha ¿ itiurak nunasha nekawa ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Nuna antuk Jesús chichaak : — Wi nuikiartaja juka wína chichamruchuitai . Antsu wína akuptuku chichamentai .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Aints Yuse wakeramurin umirkartas wakerinauka : Wi chichaman nuikiartaja nuna Yusnawaitai tusar paan nekaawartin ainawai . Tura wiki nintimsanak chichaamtaisha , nunasha paan nekaawartin ainawai .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Aints ningki nintimias chichaman etseruka , aints ainau wina pengker nintimtursarat tusa chichaman etserui . Antsu chikich aints niin akupkamia nunak pengker awajsatas wakerakka , aints ainaun anangtsuk nekas aa nunak ujaawai .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Yus umiktin chicham umiktaram tusa , Moisés suramsau wainiatrumek , kichkitirmesha nu chichamka umirtsurme . ¿ Waruka winasha mantuatasrumsha wakerutarme ? — Jesús timiayi .

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Tamati aints ainau aiinak : — Waurkum nuka tame . ¿ Yaachia amincha mantamatascha wakerutminawa ? — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús aimiak : — Wi ayamtai kintati aintsun kichik tsuwaru asamtai , mash ¿ waruka aitkawa ? tusaram nukap nintimrarume .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Tura wainiat Moisés chichaman akupturmak : Uchi aishmang akiinamtai , nuwapchiri charutkataram , atumin turamin asamtai , atumka ayamtai kinta au wainiatrumek tuke turin ainiarme . Antsu Moiséska nu turatnunka nangkamachuitai , antsu yaanchuik atumi juuntri ainau nu turatnunka nangkamawarmiayi .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Tura Moisésa aarmaurin miatrusrumek umirkuram , ayamtai kintatisha uchi nuwapchirin charutnuitiatrumsha , wi ayamtai kintatin kichik aintsun tsuwaraisha ¿ waruka kajertarme ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Tenap nekartsuk aints ainaun pachisrum : Tunau turayi tiirap . Antsu nekasashi tusaram , inintrusrum tenap nekaataram , — Jesús timiayi .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Tamati Jerusalénnumia aints ainau chicharinak : — ¿ Maatai tina auchukai ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Jiistaram . Mash antinamunam chichau waininayat apu ainauka pachinatsui . ¿ Nekasash Yus akupkamui tuuyash nintiminaj ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Iikia ju aintska tuniayainta tusar paan nekaji . ¿ Antsu Yus akupkamu tatinua nusha tuniang winitnui ? tusarsha aints kichkisha nekainatsui , — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús Yus seatai juun jeanam nuikiartak pujau , nuna antuk kakar chichaak : — ¿ Wi tuniaya winaja nusha paantak nekaram ? Wína wakeramurun takastasnaka tachawitjai . Antsu wína nekas akuptukuka yaachita tusarmesha nuka nekatsrume .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Antsu wína akuptuku asamtai , wikia nijai pujayatun juni tau asan , wína akuptukunka paan nekajai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Tamati aints ainau : “ Watska , achikiar kársernum engkeatai , ” tinayat ni achiktin kintari jeachu asamtai achikcharmiayi .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Tura aints untsuri : Nekas Yus akupkamuapita tusar chichainak : — Mesías tatinuitai tina nu winakka , wainchatai takatan ju aintsun nangkamasang untsuri turashtinuitai , — tiarmiayi .

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Fariseo ainau Jesúsan pachisar chichainaun antukar , sacerdote juuntri ainaujai iruntrar chichainak , Yus seatai jean wainin ainaun untsukar : Jesús achiktaram tusar akupkarmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Turinamtai Jesús nuna nekaa aints ainaun chicharak : — Wikia atumjai jumchik kinta pujustatjai . Tura nunia ataksha wina akuptuku pujamurin waketkitatjai .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Tura wi waketkiamtai , atumka eatkatatrume . Tura wi wetatja nuni winichmin asaram , winaka waitkashtinuitrume , — timiayi .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Jesús tamati judío mai nuwamtak iniininak : — ¿ Ausha tu weamtaik iisha wainkashtai ? ¿ Judío ainau arák griego ainaujai pachinkar pujuinamunam wetinun nu aints ainaun nuiniartas tatsuash ?
