text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: Au iincha chichartamak : “ Wina eatiatrumek , wi weaja nuni wechamin asaram , winaka waitkashtinuitrume , ” ¿ iin turamji nunasha warina takua tawa ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Fiesta amuamu kinta timiá pengker kinta asamtai , Jesús nu kintati wajaki kakar chichaak : — Aints ni nintin kitamawa nunisang pujakka , nintir kitamachua nunisang ati takungka wini winiti .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Tura wína nekasampi Yus akupkamuitme turutuka Yuse chichame aarmawa nunisang ni nintinia entsa pukunia nunisang aints kitaminawa nunisarang pujuinaunka tuke iwiaaku pujusarti tusa yaingkiartinuitai , — timiayi .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Kitaminawa nunisarang Jesúsan nekasampita tinu ainauka Yuse Wakani jukiartinuitai , nuna taku timiayi . Yuse Wakaningkia taachu asamtai , tura Jesús nayaimpinam weachu asa , ukunam atiniun pachis nunaka timiayi .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Tamati aints ainau Jesúsa chichamen antukar chichainak : — Nekas Yuse chichamen etserin tatinuitai tiarmia nuka juwaitai , — tiarmiayi .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Tu tinamtai chikich ainausha chicharinak : — Atsa , antsu Mesías tu weena nuwaitai , — tiarmiayi . Tu tinamaitiat chikich ainau aiminak : — Atsa ¿ Mesíaska Galileanmaya tatinkai ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Mesíaska ii juuntri Davidta weari asa , Davidcha Belénnum akiinau asamtai , nisha nunisang Belénnum akiinatnuitai , — tiarmiayi .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Tu tinau asaramtai , aints ainau metekchau nintimrar kanararmiayi .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Tuminai chikich ainauka Jesúsan achikiar jukiartas wakerinayat achikcharmiayi .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Tura Yus seatai jean wainin ainau Jesúsa chichamen anturkar waketkiar fariseo ainauncha , tura sacerdote juuntri ainauncha ujakaram inintrinak : — ¿ Waruka juni itachurme ? — tiarmiayi .

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Tu tinam nuka aiminak : — Nu aints chichaa nuniska aints kichkisha chichachu armayi , — tiarmiayi .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Tu tinam fariseo ainau chicharinak : — ¿ Atumnasha anangkramarume ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: ¿ Judío apuri ainausha , tura fariseo ainautisha kichkisha nu aints pachisar nekasampita tinajiash ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Antsu Moisésa aarmaurin nekachu ainauka Jesúsan nekasampita tinu asar , yumingkramu ainawai , — nangkamiar tiarmiayi .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Tinamtai Nicodemo nuwik Jesúsan kashi jearmia nuka fariseotiat chichaak :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: — Ii umirkatin chicham tu aarmau asamtai , aintsu chichaamuri anturtsuk , tura ni turamurisha tenap nekartsuk pujakrikia , wait wajaktintri tu atinuitai pengké tichamnawaitji . ¿ Nekaschaukai ? — timiayi .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Tamaitiat Nicodemon jiyainak : — ¿ Amesha Galileanmaya aintskitam ? Galileanmaya aints Yuse chichamen etsernuka pengké atsutnuitai . Amesha Yuse chichame tenap aujsam nekaata , — tiarmiayi .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Tu tinu asar , kichik kichik ni jeen waketkiarmiayi .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Fariseo ainau ni jeen waketkiaramtai , Jesúska Olivo muranam wakamiayi .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Tura kashin tsawaar ataksha Yus seatai juun jeanam jeamtai , aints ainau untsuri niin kautkarmiayi . Tura kautkaram , Jesús keemas nu aints ainaun nuiniarmiayi .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Tura nuikiartak pujai , Moisésa chichame nuikiartin ainau , fariseo ainausha nuwan chikich aintsjai tepaun wainkar jukiar , Jesús pujamunam itaarmiayi . Tura aints iruntramunam japen awajsar ,

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Jesúsan chicharinak : — Nuikiartinu , ju nuwaka chikich aintsjai tepau wainkaji .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Moisés iin chichaman akupturmak : Nuwa tumauka kayajai tukur maatnuitai , tu aatramramiaji . ¿ Tura amesha warinme ? — tu iniasarmiayi .

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Nunaka : ¿ Ni warinting ? nunia chicham najanami tusar nekarawartas tiarmiayi . Tinamaitiat Jesús aimtsuk tsuntsumaj ni uwejejai nungkan aak pujumiayi .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Jesús aak pujamtai , tuke itattsuk iniinam , wajaki chicharak : — Ayu , watska , aints tunaun pengké turichu akungka , kayan achik ju nuwanka eemak tukuti , — timiayi .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Nunia ataksha tsuntsuma nungkan aak pujumiayi .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Tu pujau asamtai , ni chichamen antukaru ainau ni tunaarin nintimrar , juun ainau nuwá eemkar jiinkiar , nunia chikich ainausha mash kichik kichik jiinkiar wearmiayi . Mash jiinkiaramtai , Jesús ningki nu nuwajai juwakmiayi .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Nuniangka Jesúscha wajaki nuwanak wainak : — Nuwachi ¿ aints amin jakati turamina nusha warukawarma ? ¿ Kichkisha juwakcharik ? — timiayi .

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Tu iniam nu nuwaka aimiak : — Ja ai Apuru , kichkisha juwakchari , — timiayi . Tamati Jesús chicharak : — Ayu , wisha mantamawarti tichatatjame . Yamaikia jeemin waketkim nuniangka tunau turuwaip , — timiayi .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Aints ainau ataksha iruntraramtai , Jesús chicharak : — Wikia paaniua nunisnak mash nungkanmaya aints ainaun paan nintimtikratnuitjai . Tura asamtai wína nemartinauka teenmaka pujuschartinuitai , antsu pujut nangkankashtinun jukiartin asar , tuke paaniunam pujusartinuitai , — timiayi .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Tamati fariseo ainau chicharinak : — Ameka amek nintimtumasam chichaame . Tura ame tame nuka nekaschawaitai , — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — Wikia tuniaya winaja , tura tuwa weaja tusancha nekajai . Tura asan wiki nintimtumasan chichayatnak , wi taja nuka nekasaintai . Antsu atumka tuniaya winaja , tura tuwa weaja nuka pengké nekartsurme .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Atumka ju nungkanmaya ainau nintimina nunisrumek aujmatru wearme . Tura wainiatun wikia aintsun kichkisha pachisnaka aujmatu weatsjai .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Tura chikich ainaun pachisan : Nuka pengkeraitai , antsu kichka paseetai tayatun , wiki nintimsanak nunaka tatsujai . Antsu wína akuptukmia nusha nunisang nunaka tawai . Tura asamtai wi taja nuka nekasaintai .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Atum umiktin chichamnasha Moisés tu aarmiayi : Jimia aints mai metek ni wainkamurin pachisar tu amiayi tusar etserinamtaikia , nu chichamka nekasaintai titinuitrume .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Tura asamtai wi taja nuka nekasaintai . Tura wína Apaachirsha , wína akuptuku asa , wína pachitas ta nusha nekasaintai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Tamati chicharinak : — ¿ Apaachirmesha tuwaita ? — tiarmiayi . Tu iniinam Jesús aimiak : — Atumka winasha tura wína Apaachirsha nekatsrume . Wína nekarkurmeka , wína Apaachirsha nekaatnuitrume , — timiayi .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Jesús Yus seatai juun jeanam kuik engketi kajurin puusamunam nunaka etserkamiayi . Tura ni kintari jeachu asamtai , aints kichkisha Jesúsan achikcharmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Ataksha Jesús chichaak : — Wikia wetatjai . Tura wi weamtai atum wína eatkatin ainiarme . Antsu wi weamunmaka winichminuitrume . Tura atumka tuke tunaarintin asaram jakatnuitrume , — timiayi .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Tama judío juuntri chicharinak : — Juka wi weamunam winichminuitrume ta nunasha ¿ warina takua tawa ? ¿ Ningki maamatin asa tumamtsuash ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — Atumka junia nungkanmayaintrume . Antsu wikia nayaimpinmayaintjai . Atumka nekasrum ju nungkanmayaintrume . Antsu wikia junianchuitjai .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Tura asan tajarme : Atumi tunaarijai jakatnuitrume . Atumka wína nekasampi Yus akupkamuitme turutchau akurmeka , atumi tunaarijai jakatnuitrume , — timiayi .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Tamati iniinak : — ¿ Tura amesha nekascha warí aintsuitme ? — tiarmiayi . Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — ¿ Warukanak nekasnasha atumjaisha chichastaja ?

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Atumi tunaarin pachisan nukap chichasminuitjai . Turayatun nunaka turashtatjai . Antsu wína akuptukmia nuka nekas chicham aa nunak tau asamtai , wikia ni tamaun antuku asan , mash nungkanmaya ainau nekaawarti tusan nunaka etserjai , — timiayi .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Nuna tau waininayat , ni Apaachiri Yusen pachis nunaapi tawa tusarka pengké nekaacharmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Tura asamtai Jesús chicharak : — Wiki nintimsanak kichkisha turatsjai , antsu wína Apaachir nuiturmia nunak tajai . Wikia aints ayatun Yus akuptuku asamtai , wína yakí numinam takuriaramtai , nuniangka atumka nekasrum : Juka Yus akupkamuapita tusaram nekaratnuitrume .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Wína akuptukmia nuka tuke wijai pujawai . Wikia ni wakeramurin tuke umiku asamtai , winaka ajapruangka ukurtsui , timiayi .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Nuna tamati , aints untsuri niin nekasampita tiarmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Nunia judío Jesúsan nekasampita tiaru ainaun Jesús chicharak : — Wi taja nu miatrusrumek umirkurmeka , nekasrum wína nuiniatir atinuitrume .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Tura nekas chicham aa nuka nekaatnuitrume . Tura nu chicham umirkurmeka , angkan pujustinuitrume , — timiayi .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Tamati Jesúsan nekasampita ticharu ainau chicharinak : — Iikia Abraham weawitji . Tura asar chikich ainau inatiri pengké wajaschamiaji . ¿ Amesha waruka angkan pujustinuitrume tukartame ? — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — Nekasan tajarme , aints tuke tunau takainauka mash tunau inatiri ainawai .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Antsu aintsu inatiri ni uchirinchu asa , nu aintsu jeenka tukeka pujuschamnawaitai . Antsu aintsu uchiri ni apaachiri jeen tuke pujusminuitai .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Tura asamtai Yuse Uchiri atumin angkan awajtamatikia , nekasrum tuke angkan pujustinuitrume .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Atumka Abraham weawitji tarume nunaka nekajai . Tura wainiatrum atumka wi taja nuka antutcha nakitau asaram , wína mantutcha wakerutarme .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Wikia Apaachirjai pujakun , wi wainkamiaja nunaka etserjai . Tura atumsha atumi apaachiri timiauringkia miatrusrumek umirume , — Jesús timiayi .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Tama aiminak : — Ii yaanchuik juuntringkia Abrahamaitai , — tiarmiayi . Tinamaitiat Jesús chicharak : — Atumka nekasrum Abrahama wearinkurmeka , ni turamia nunisrumek turamnawaitrume .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Wikia chicham nekas aa nuna Yusnumia nuimiaru asan , atumin ujayajrume . Tura nu chichamka antuku ayatrumek , wína mantuatasrum wakerutarme . Abrahamka tuuka nintimchauyayi .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Antsu atumka atumi apaachirijai metek turarme , — timiayi . Jesús tamati jiyainak : — Iikia tsanirnumiangka akiinachuitji . Ii aparingkia kichkitai . Nuka Yusketai , — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús chicharak : — Yus nekas atumi Apaachirinmataikia , wikia Yusnumia tau asamtai , winasha anentinuitrume . Wikia wiki nintimsanka juningkia tachamiajai , antsu Yus akuptuku asamtai , juningkia taawitjai .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: ¿ Waruka wi taja nuka timiá nintimtsurme ? Wi taja nu nakitau asaram , wína chichamruka antatsrume .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Atumi aparingkia Satanásaitai . Tura atumka ni uchiri asaram , ni wakera nu turarme . Nu nangkamtaik tuke mangkartin ayayi . Tura nekas aa nunaka nakitau asa , nekas aa nunaka chichaa weatsui . Antsu tuke wait chichaman etserin asa , wait chichaman aparintai . Ni wait chichaman chichau asa , tuke ninu aa nunak chichaawai .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Antsu wikia nekas chichaman etserai waitiatrum , winaka nekasainme turutsurme .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: Wína tunaaruka pengké atsau asamtai ¿ yáki wi tunau takaamurnasha kichkisha nekamtikruati ? Wikia nekas chichaman chichai waitiatrum ¿ waruka wínaka nekasainme turutsurme ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Yusnau ainauka Yuse chichamen antinawai . Antsu atumka Yusnauchu asaram , wi taja nuka antut nakitarme , — Jesús timiayi .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Tamati judío juuntri ainau Jesúsan jiyainak : — Maj , ameka Samarianmaya aints asam , iwianchrinuitme , ii taji nuka nekasar taji , — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — Wína iwianchruka atsawai . Antsu wína Apaachirun pengker awajkun pujajai . Antsu atumka wínaka pengkerka awajtatsrume .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Wikia wiki nintimsanak : Wína pengker awajtusarat tusanka wakeratsjai . Antsu kichka : Aints ainau mash wína pengker awajtusarat tusa wakerawai . Tura nuka mash aintsu turamurin nekau asa , pengkeraitai tura paseetai tusa ningki mash nekawai .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Nekasan tajarme : Wína chichamrun umirtin ainauka tuke jakashtin ainawai , — timiayi .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Tamati judío juuntri ainau Jesúsan jiyainak : — Pai , yamaikia ameka iwianchrinuitme tusar paan nekaaji . Abrahamsha tura chikich aints Yuse chichamen etserin ainausha jakaru wainiatmek , wína chichamrun umirtin ainauka tuke jakashtin ainawai tukartame .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: ¿ Ii yaanchuik juuntri Abraham nangkamasmek juunkitam ? Abrahamsha , tura chikich Yuse chichamen etserin ainausha mash jakarmiayi . Tura asaramtai ¿ waruku asamea nusha tame ? — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — Wikia wiki nintimsanak : Miajuitjai takunka , nunaka nangkamin tiinjai . Antsu wína pachitas : Miajuitai ta nuka wína Apaachiruitai . Atumka nangkamrum ii Yusrintai tarume nuka nuwaitai .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Atum ii Yusrintai tayatrum atumka wainchawaitrume . Tura wikia wainjai . Antsu wainchawaitjai takunka , atumea nunisnak wait chichaman etserin aintjai . Turayatnak niin wainkau asan , ni chichamen miatrusnak umirnuitjai .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Atumi juuntri Abraham yaanchuik jakayat , wi ju nungkanam tatinun wararturas nakarsamiayi . Tura wína waitak nukap warasmiayi , — timiayi .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Tamati judío juuntri ainau Jesúsan iniinak : — Ame cincuenta ( 50 ) musach pujachiatmesha ¿ waruka Abrahaman wainkamiajai tame ? — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — Nekasan tajarme : Abrahamsha akiintsaing , wikia tuke pujuyajai , — timiayi .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Jesús tamati kayan jurukiar : Tukur maatai tinam , Jesús uumak Yus seatai juun jeanmaya jiinki wemiayi .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Nunia ni nuiniatiri ainauti Jesúsjai wekaakur aints akiinamunmaya wainmichu wainkamiaji .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Tura nangkamakur ni nuiniatiri ainauti iniakur : — Nuikiartinu ¿ warukaya juka wainmichusha akiinaya ? ¿ Ni apari tunaarintin asamtaiyash ai akiinaya ? ¿ Turachkusha ningki tunau asayash ai akiinaya ? — tu iniimiaji .

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Tu iniam Jesús iin chichartamak : — Atsa , juka tunaarintin asaya ai akiinachuitai . Tura aparisha , nunia nukurisha tunaarintin ainamtaiya , ai akiinachuitai . Antsu Yus ni kakarmarin inakmastas wakerau asamtai , ai akiinawaitai .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Tsawaikia wína akuptuku takatrin takakmastinuitjai . Antsu tee wajasamtai , aints kichkisha takakmaschartinuitai .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Ju nungkanam iwiaaku pujaknaka , mash nungkanmaya ainau paaniurinjai , — Jesús turammiaji .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Nuna tusa , Jesús nungkanam usukmimiayi . Nunia usukijai nungkan kuta najana , nuna juki wainmichu jiin nujtukmiayi .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Tura chicharak : — Yamaikia entsa maati Siloé tutainum weme jiimi nijarta , — timiayi . Siloésha iiti chichamejaingkia “ Akupkamu ” taku tawai . Jesús tamati wainmichu nuni we , ni jiin nijarmiayi . Tura ni jiin nijar umis , ni jeen waketki paan wainmakmiayi .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Tura paan wainmakamtai , ni irutkamu ainauka , tura niin tuke wainmichu pujaun wainin ainau chicharinak : — ¿ Jinta pujus kuik surustaram tusa seamnia nuchaukai ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Tu tinam chikich aints ainau chichainak : — Ja ai , nuwaitai , — tiarmiayi . Antsu chikich aints ainau chichainak : — Atsa , nuchawaitai , antsu nu aintsua tumawaitai , — tiarmiayi . Tu tunainamtai nu aintska ningki etsertumak : — Ja ai , nuwaitjai , — timiayi .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Tamati iniinak : — ¿ Tura yamaisha itiur jiimme ? — tiarmiayi .

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Tu tinam nuka aimiak : — Nu aints Jesús tu wena nuka ni usukijai nungkan kuta najana nujai jiirun yakatrur : ‘ Entsa maati Siloé tutainum weme jiimi nijarta , ’ turutmatai wi wena jiirun nijaran paan jiimramjai , — timiayi .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Tamati iniinak : — ¿ Nu aintcha tuning puja ? — tiarmiayi . Tu tinam : — Chaj , nekatsjai , — timiayi .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Nunia aints wainmichu tsuwarmaun fariseo pujuinamunam itaarmiayi .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Jesús ayamtai kintati nungkan kuta najana nujai wainmichu aintsun tsuwaru asamtai ,

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: fariseo ainausha nu aintsun ataksha iniinak : — ¿ Yamaisha itiur jiimme ? — tiarmiayi . Tu tinam niisha aimiak : — Nungka kuta najanamujai jiirun yakatruramtai , nunia nijaran paan jiimjai , — timiayi .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Tamati chikich fariseo ainau chichainak : — Ju aintsun tsuwaruka Yuska akupkachmawaitai . Yus akupkamuitkungka , ayamtai kintatikia nunaka turachminuitai , — tiarmiayi . Tinamtai chikich ainau chichainak : — Atsa ¿ tunau aintsuitkungka itiurak nu wainchatai takatnasha turatnuita ? — tunaiyarmiayi . Tura asar metekchau nintimrarmiayi .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Tura yaanchuik wainmichu amia nuna ataksha iniinak : — ¿ Ami jiimin tsuwarmaru nu pachismesha warinme ? — tiarmiayi . Tu tinam nu aintska aimiak : — Wikia Yuse chichamen etsernuitai tajai , — timiayi .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Tamaitiat judío juuntri ainau nu aintsun pachisar : Nekasampi yaanchuik wainmichutiat yamaikia paan jiimua ticharmiayi . Tura asar aparincha tura nukurincha untsukar ,

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: iniinak : — ¿ Atumi uchiri wainmichu akiinamiayi timiarme nuka nekas jukai ? ¿ Tura tuke wainmichu akiinausha itiur yamaisha wainmawa ? — tiarmiayi .

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Tu tinam ni apari aimiak : — Juka nekas ii uchirintai . Tuke wainmichu akiinamia nuwaitai .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Antsu itiurak wainmakma tusarkia iikia nekatsji . Tura yáki wainmamtikiama tusarsha nekatsji . Antsu atum nekaatasrum wakerakrumka , ningki iniastaram . Niisha nampuaru asa , ningki ujatmaktatrume , — timiayi .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Judío juuntri irunun shaminau asar tu aimkarmiayi . Judío juuntri ainau mash iruntrar chicharnainak : — Aints kichkisha Jesús Mesíasaitai tinauka ii iruntai jeanmaya jiikir akupkatai , tinu asaramtai shamiarmiayi .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Tura asar : Ii uchiri nampuaru asamtai , atumka iniasrum nekaataram , — tiarmiayi .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Tu tinamtai wainmichu tsuwarmaun ataksha untsukar : — Wína tsuwaarauka nekas Yusetai tita . Antsu Jesúska tunaarinuitai tusar nekaji , — tiarmiayi .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Tu tinam niisha aimiak : — Tunaarinuashi tusanka nekatsjai . Antsu junak nekajai : Wikia yaanchuik wainmichu ayatun yamaikia paan jiimjai , — timiayi .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Tamati ataksha iniinak : — ¿ Itiurtamkama ? ¿ Itiur jiimtikramsama ? — tiarmiayi .

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Tuutas awajinam nisha ayaak : — ¿ Wi yanchuk timiajrume nuka antatsrumek ? ¿ Warukaya ataksha etserkata tusarmesha wakerutarme ? ¿ Atumsha nekasrumek ni umirkatasrum tarum ? — timiayi .

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Tamati kajerinak : — Ameka nekas nu aints nemarnuitme . Antsu iikia Moisés nemarnuitji .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Iikia Yus Moisésan akupkamuka nekaji . ¿ Antsu nu aintska tuniantskai ? — tiarmiayi .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Tu tinam niisha ayaak : — Maj ¿ itiurkamnawaita ? Wína wainmamtikruku wainiatrumek ¿ nuka tuniangki tusarmeka nekatsrume ?

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Iikia nuka paan nekaji : Yuska tunaarintin ainaunka anturtsui . Antsu Yusen pengker awajsaruka tura ni wakeramurin najanin ainau seamurinka anturui .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Yaanchuikia aints wainmichu akiinaun tsuwaruka kichkisha nekachuyaji .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Tura asamtai ju aintska Yus akupkachmawaitkungka , wainchati takatnasha kichkisha pengké turachminuitai , — timiayi .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Tamati jiyainak : — Ameka nekas tunaarintin akiinayatmesha ¿ warukaya iin nuikiartin ataj tame ? — tusar judío juuntri irunu nu aintsun iruntai jeanmaya jiikiar akupkarmiayi .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Iruntai jeanmaya jiikir akupkamu asamtai , Jesús nuna nekaa , nu aintsun wainak : — ¿ Amesha Yuse Uchiri nekasampita tamek ? — timiayi .

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Tamati niisha ayaak : — Juunta , ¿ yaachita nusha ? Wisha nuna wainkan : Nekasampita titasan wakerajai , — timiayi .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Tamati Jesús chicharak : — Ameka nuka wainme . Amijai chichaaja nuwaitjai , — timiayi .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Tamati nu aintska tikishmatar chicharak : — Apuru , nekasampitme tajame , — timiayi .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Tamati Jesús chicharak : — Aintsu nintin mash nekau asan , wína nekasampita turutinaunka , tura wína nekasampita turutinachunka akankartasan ju nungkanam taawitjai . Tura aints paanchaun nintimunka paan nintimtikratasan taawitjai . Tura chikich ainausha anangmamsar : Wikia paan nintimu weajai tu nintimturinaunka paanchau nintimtikratasan taawitjai , — timiayi .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Tamati fariseo nuni pujuinauka nuna antukar inintrinak : — ¿ Iisha paanchau nintimnukitaij ? — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — Atumka wainmichu akurmeka , atumi tunaari nekachu asaram tunaarinchau aminuitrume . Antsu anangmamkuram : Ii tunaaringkia atsawai tinu asaram , atumi tunaari sakarchau ainiarme , — Jesús timiayi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Nunia Jesús ataksha aints ainaun nuiniak : — Wi taja nuka nekasaintai . Aints uwijartin ni uwijarin wenurmaunum kashi ukuawai . Tura kasa ainau uwijan kasamkartas waitinmaka waaitsuk , atu yantamen wenurmaunum wakaar wayaatin ainawai .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Antsu uwija wainuka waiti amanum nuke waiini .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Uwija wainin taamtai , waiiti wainin waiitin uraktinuitai . Tura uwija ni waintairi chichamenka pengker antin asamtai , nisha uwija naarin kichik kichik inaituk untsuuyi . Tura ni uwijarin mash chirichrin yuwaarat tusa jiiyi .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Tura wenurmaunumia mash jiiki ayas wekaini . Turamtai uwija ainau waintairi chichamenka anturin asar , ni untsuam nemarin armayi .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Antsu wainchatiri chichamen nekarchau asar , ni untsuamsha nemarinatsui , antsu tupikinawai , — timiayi .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Jesús nu nuikiartamun aints ainaun ujakmiayi . Tura waininayat nuna takuampi tawa tusarka nekaacharmiayi .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Tuminamtai Jesús ataksha chichaak : — Nekasan tajarme : Wikia uwija wenukri waiitiriya tumawaitjai .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Wi taatsaing , anangkartin ainau winiarmia nuka uwijan kasaminawa nunisarang armiayi . Antsu wína nemartin ainauka uwijaya nunisarang asar , Yus akupkachmau ainaunka anturkacharmiayi .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Wikia uwija wenukri waiitiriya tumawaitjai . Uwija waiitinam wainawa nunisarang wína umirtukaru ainauka tuke uwemrartin ainawai . Uwija wenuknum wayaawar , nunia jiinkiar chirichrin yuwina nunisarang wína umirtukaru ainau wini wininau asaramtai , wikia niin tuke wainkartinuitjai .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: “ Kasaka aya kasamkatas , tura aintsun maatas , tura jean mesratas winiyi . Antsu wikia aints ainaun tuke pujut nangkankashtinun susataj tusan , tura tuke wijai warasarat tusan tawitjai .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: Wikia aints ni uwijarin pengker wainua tumawaitjai . Uwija wainin nekas pengker aa nuka ni uwijari ainaun uwemtikratas jakatnuitai .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: “ Antsu aints kuikiajai akikiam uwijan wainuka uwija niinuchu asaramtai , yukartin winamtai , nuna wainak uwijanka ajapa ukuuyi . Tura yukartin uwijan achiamtai , uwija irunu mash pisaayi .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Nu aintska aya akikiam takakmin asa , uwija ainau warukati tusangka nintimtsuk tupikini .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: “ Antsu wikia uwija wainin nekas pengker aa tumawaitjai . Tura asan uwija wainin uwijan uwemtikratas jakatnua nunisnak wisha jakatnuitjai . Wína Apaachirka winaka nekaru asamtai , wisha wína Apaachirnasha nekajai . Tura wína aintsur ainauka uwijaya nunisarang ainau asaramtai nekajai . Tura niisha winasha nekarinawai .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Tura chikich aints ainausha uwijaya nunisarang ainayat , wína chichamrun antichu ainawai . Nu aints ainauncha wini winiarat tusan untsuktinuitjai . Wi turamtai chikich umirtin ainaujai mash iruntraramtai , wisha uwija wainua nunisnak nu aints ainaun wiki mash wainkatnuitjai .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: “ Wikia jakayatun jakamunmaya ataksha nantaktin asan , wína aintsur ainaun uwemtikratasan jakatnuitjai . Wi turatin asamtai , wína Apaachirka wína anentui .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Wiki wakerakun jakatnuitjai . Wi wakerachmataikia , kichkisha wínaka mantuwarchamnawaitai . Antsu wína Apaachirka : Nunaka turata tusa akuptuku asamtai , nunaka turatnuitjai , ” Jesús timiayi .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Tamati judío juuntri ainau nu chichamnasha antukar ataksha metekchau nintimsar ,

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: untsuri chichainak : — Aunka iwianch engkemtawai . ¿ Waurak tausha waruka anturu wearme ? — tiarmiayi .

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Tinamtai chikich ainau aiminak : — Atsa , waurkungka chichaa weatsui . ¿ Iwianch engkemtuamuka wainmichun tsuwarminkai ? — tiarmiayi .

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Yumanch nantutin Jerusalénnum tuke fiestan najanin armiayi . Yaanchuik ii juuntri ainau Yus seatai jean ataksha iwiararun pachisar nintimtin armiayi .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Tura asaramtai Jesús Yus seatai juun jeanam jea tesaamurin Salomón jeamkamia nuni wayaamiayi .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Turamtai judío juuntri ainau niin tentakar : — ¿ Mesías ayatmesha waruka nuwaitjai tusam , paan etseru weatsme ? Ameka nekasam Mesías akumka , nuwaitjai tusam yamaikia paan etserkata , — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús aimiak : — Yanchuk etserkamja nuka antukiatrumsha , nekasampita turutsurme . Wína Apaachirka turata tusa akuptuku asamtai , wi turaja nusha wainkaram : Nuwaapita tusaram paan nekaatnuitrume .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Turayatrum wína aintsruchu asaram , nekasampita turutsurme .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Wína aintsur ainaun uwijaya nunisnak untsuam , anturtukar nemartinawai . Tura winar asaramtai , nuwaapita tusan nekajai .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Wikia pujut nangkankashtinun suwitjai . Tura asamtai tuke wait wajaktinnumka pengké wechartin ainawai . Tura wi wainu asamtai ¿ yáki jurutkit ?

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Wína Apaachirka mash ainia nunaka nangkamasang timiá kakaram asamtai , wína aintsur ainaun wína Apaachir surusmia nuna kichkisha atantrukchartinuitai .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Wisha wína Apaachirjai kichkia nunisrikitji , — timiayi .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Jesús tamati judío juuntri ainau : Kaya jurukir tukur maatai tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Turinam Jesús chicharak : — Wína Apaachiru kakarmarijai wainchati takatan nekas pengker aa nuna nukap takakmasu asamtai ¿ tu takat pachisrumea wína kayajai tukur maatai turutrume ? — timiayi .

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Jesús tu iniam judío juuntri ainau aiminak : — Nekas pengker takat takaakminia : Kayajai tukur maatai tatsuji . Antsu ameka aintsutiatum , wikia Yusetjai tumamu asakmin , kayajai tukur maatai taji , — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Tu tinam Jesús chicharak : — Atum umirkatin chichamka tu aarmawaitai : Yus chichaak : ‘ Atumka yusetrume ’ timiayi .

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Yuse chichamengka nekas asamtai , nu aarmauka pachisrum : Nuka waitaitai tichamnawaitrume . Ni chichamen antukaru ainaun pachis : ‘ yusetrume ’ tinu asamtai , nu chichamka nekasaintai .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Wína Apaachirka ju nungkanam akuptuku asamtai , wikia nekasan Yuse Uchirinjai tau aisha ¿ waruka winasha : Yusetjai tau asam pasé chichaame turutrume ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Wína Apaachiru takatrin wi turai wainiatrumek , nekasan turachmataikia , nekasampita turutirap .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Antsu wikia nekasan Yuse takatrin takakmamtaikia , winaka nekasampita turutiaram . Tura wina nakitrakrumsha , wi turaja nu pachisrum : Nekasampi nuka Yuse takatrin takaawai titaram . Nu takurmeka , wína Apaachirka wijai metekaitai , tura wisha wína Apaachirjai metekaitjai tusaram , paan nekaataram tusan tajarme , — Jesús timiayi .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Tamati ataksha : Jesús achiktai tinamaitiat jiinki wemiayi .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Nunia Jordán entsa tumajin we , yaanchuik Juan imiakratmia nuni pujumiayi .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Turamtai aints untsuri Jesúsan jiisartas weriar , tura wainaikiar chicharnainak : — Nekas Juanka wainchatai takatnaka aitkachmiayi . Turayat Jesúsan pachis mash tímia nuka nekasaintai , — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Tura nu nungkanmaya untsuri Jesúsan nekasampita tiarmiayi .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Betania yaktanam aints Lázaro naartin jaak tepemiayi . Nuka nu yaktanam ni umaji Maríjai , tura chikich umaji Martajai iruntrar puju armiayi .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Nu jau umaji Marí naartin ukunam kungkutin sumak , apu Jesúsa nawen ukatar ni intashijai mujturmia nuwaitai .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Tura Lázaro jaak tepamtai , ni umaji mai Jesúsan chichaman akuptinak : — Apuru antukta , ami amikrum jaawai tita , — tiarmiayi .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Chicham akuptukmau asa , Jesús nuna antuk chicharak : — Nu jaak tepauka tukeka jakashtinuitai . Antsu aints ainau Yuse kakarmarincha wainkarat , tura Yuse Uchiri kakarmarin wainkarat tusa jaawai , — timiayi .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Jesús Martancha , tura nuna kaincha , tura umajin Lázaroncha nekas aneemiayi .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Tura Lázaro jaawai tamaun antukiat , wári wetsuk ni pujamunam jimiaran kanurmiayi .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Nunia ni nuiniatiri ainautin chichartamak : — Judea nungkanam ataksha waketkimi , — Jesús iin turammiaji .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Turammatai ayaakur : — Nuikiartinu ¿ aunia aints amin kayajai tukurmiar mantamawartas wakerutminau wainiatmesha nuni ataksha waketkimi tame ? — timiaji .

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Tu chichaakrin Jesús nuikiartamun etserak : — ¿ Tsawaarka doce ( 12 ) horas paanchaukai ? Ju nungkanam pujuinautisha tsawai wekaakur , paan wainmau asar tukumkashtinuitji .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Tura kashi wekaakurkia tee asamtai tukumkatnuitji , — turammiaji . Nuna tusa wina umirtakrum pujakrumka , nekasrum paan nintimsaram pujustinuitrume . Antsu wína umirtutsuk pujuinauka , teenam wekainawa nunisarang wait wajakartin ainawai , taku timiayi .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Nunia ataksha iin chichartamak : — Ii amikri Lázaro kanak tepawai . Tura wi werin shintartatjai , — turammiaji .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Turammatai iikia ayaakur : — Apuru , nekas kanak tepakka , nuniangka pengker wajastatui , — timiaji .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Jesúska Lázaro jakamurin nekayat : Kanak tepawai turammiaji . Antsu iikia : Nekas kanuru asamtaiyash taj , tu nintimramiaji .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Tu nintimkurin Jesús paan chichartamak : — Lázaroka yanchuk jakayi .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Tura nuni wi pujachu asamtai jakayi . Antsu atum wína nekasampita turutin asakrumin , wisha atumin nintimsan waraajai . Tura yamaikia nuni werir jiismi , — turammiaji .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Turammatai Jesúsa nuiniatiri kichik Tomás , Jimiamramu naartin , iin chichartamak : — Iijai metek mantamawarti tusar iisha wearmi , — turammiaji .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Tura Betania yaktanam jeatak wajasarin , Lázaroka yanchuk cuatro ( 4 ) kinta jakau asamtai , iwiarsari tinau antukmiaji .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Betania yaktaka Jerusalénnumia kampatmachik kilómetro arakchichu ayayi .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Tura ni umaji jakau asamtai , Marta tura Marísha wake mesekar juutinamtai , judío ainau untsuri pengker nintimtikratai tusar weriarmiayi .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Turinamtai Jesús tatanak wajasi tinamun antuk , Marta Jesúsjai ingkiuniktas jiinki wemiayi . Antsu Maríkia jeanam juwakmiayi .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Turamtai Jesúsan ingkiung Marta chicharak : — Apuru , ame juni pujakminka , umaar jakachmin ayat jakayi .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Tura wainiatun ame Yus seamka , waring achat mash tuke tsangkatramkatatui tusan nekajme , — Marta Jesúsan timiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Tamati Jesús chicharak : — Umaimikia ataksha nantaki iwiaaku pujustatui , — timiayi .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Tamati Marta aimiak : — Nekasam tame . Nungka amuamunam mash jakaru ainau nantakiartin kinta jeamtai , nisha nantaktatui , — timiayi .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Tamati Jesús chicharak : — Wiitjai jakaru ainaun inannunka . Tura Wiitjai pujut nangkankashtinun sukartinnaka . Aints wína nekasampita turutinauka jakariat tuke iwiaaku pujusartinuitai .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Tura yamai pujuinausha wína nekasampita turutinauka tuke jakarchatin ainawai . ¿ Amesha nusha nekasaintai tamek ? — timiayi .

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Tu iniam Marta aimiak : — Ja ai Apuru , wikia ame tame nunaka nekasampita tajame . Ameka nekasam Mesíasaitme . Nekas Yus akupkamu asam Yuse Uchirinme . Yuse chichamen etserin yaanchuik amin pachitmasar : Ju nungkanam tatinuitai turamiarmia nuka ametme , — timiayi .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Marta nuna tusa Jesúsan ukuki , kain Marín untsuktas waketkimiayi . Tura jeanam jea kain akanak ujaak : — Nuikiartin ani wajas untsurmawai , — timiayi .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Tamati Marísha nuna antuk , wári wajaki Jesúsan jiistas wemiayi .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Antsu Jesús yaktanmaka tuke wayaachu asa , Martajai ingkiunikmia nuning pujumiayi .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Tura asamtai Marí wári wajaki jeanmaya jiinki weamtai , jeanam Marín pengker nintimtikrartas pujuinausha nuna wainkar : Iwiarsamunam juutias weatsuash tusar nemariarmiayi .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Tura Marí jeanmaya jiinki , Jesús pujamunam naka tikishmatar chicharak : — Apuru , ame juni pujakminka , umaar jakachmin ayat jakayi , — timiayi .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Tamati Jesús Marínasha tura nijai tsaniasar taarusha juutinaun wainak , napchau nintimias wake mesekmiayi .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Tura iniak : — ¿ Tunia iwiarsamarme ? — timiayi . Tu iniam aiminak : — Apuru winim jiita , — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Tinamtai Jesús juutmiayi .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Turamtai judío irunu nuna wainkar chicharnainak : — Jiisia , Lázaron nukap aneawai , — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Tura chikich irunu chicharnainak : — Wainmichun paan wainmamtikin asa , juni pujakka ¿ Lázaron jakashti tusa surimkachampash ? — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Tura Jesúscha ataksha napchau nintimias jakau iwiarsamunam jeamiayi . Pampanam iwiartai waa juun amanum kaya juun ututkamuyayi .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Tura asamtai Jesús : — Kaya epenmiau uratkataram , — timiayi . Tamati jakau umaji Marta chicharak : — Maj , cuatro ( 4 ) kinta jakau asa kawaarak mejeawai , — timiayi .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Tamaitiat Jesús Martan chicharak : — Ame nekasampitme turutkumka , Yuse kakarmari wainkatatme ¿ wi tichamkajam ? — timiayi .

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Tamati iwiarsamunam kaya ututun jurukiaramtai , Jesús nayaimpinmanini pangkai jiimias Yusen seak : — Apaachiru , ame tuke anturtau asakmin , maaketai tajame .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Wi seamka tuke anturtu weame tusan nekajai . Turayatnak aints juni iruntrar wajainausha wína pachitsar : Nekasampi Yus akupkamuita turutiarat tusan tajame , — Jesús timiayi .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Nunia kakar untsuak : — Lázaroa , nantakim jiinkita , — timiayi .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Tu untsuam Lázaroka iwiarsamunmaya jiinak , uwejencha tarachjai jingkiamu , tura nawencha tura yapiincha tarachjai kangkarmau jiinkimiayi . Turamtai Jesús aints ainaun chicharak : — Wekaasat tusaram atiataram , — timiayi .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Judío Marín nemariarmia nuka Jesús jakaun inankinun wainkar , untsuri nekasampita tiarmiayi .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Antsu chikich ainau fariseo pujuinamunam wear , Jesús turamun etserkarmiayi .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Tura ujakaram nuna antukar fariseo ainau sacerdote juuntri ainaujai iruntrar chichainak : — ¿ Nu aintska wainchati takatan untsuri aints wainminamunam turu wea nusha itiurkainjik ?

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Ii pachischakrinkia , aints ainau mash nuna anturkar nemarkartatui . Turinamtai romano ainau kautramkar mesetan najaninak , ii Yus seatai jean yumpuntraminak iincha amutmakartatji , — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Tu chicharnainak pujuinamtai , kichik sacerdote Caifás naartin , nu musach sacerdote juuntri naamkau asa chicharak : — Atumka pengké nintimtsurme .

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Israel ainautikia mash jakarai tusar ¿ kichik aintsuk maatin pengkerchaukai tusaram nintimtsurmek ? — timiayi .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Antsu Caifáska ningki nintimsangka nunaka tichamiayi . Antsu nu musachti sacerdote apuri asamtai , Yus nuna titi tusa nintimtikramiayi . Jesús Israel ainaun uwemtikratas jakatnuitai , taku nunaka timiayi .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Antsu Israel ainaunak uwemtikrataska jakashtinuyayi , antsu Yuse uchiri ainaun mash nungkanmaya irurtas jakatnuyayi .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Caifás nuna tamati , nu kintati judío juuntri ainau iruntrar : Jesús maatai tusar , chichaman najatawarmiayi .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Turinau asaramtai , Jesús paan wantinkangka judío nungkanmaka wekaasachmiayi . Antsu ni nuiniatiri ainautijai nuniangka jiinkir , entsa atsamunam yakat Efraín tutainum jear nuni pujusmiaji .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Israel ainauti fiestari , Pascua tutai jeatak wajasamtai , chikich yaktanmaya ainau untsuri Jerusalénnum wearmiayi . Tura Pascua fiestaka jeatsaing , Moisés turataram timiau asar , ni namangken nijarartas , tura ni nintin iwiarartas kaunkarmiayi .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Tura Jesúsnasha wainkartas wakerinak aints ainau Yus seatai juun jeanam wayaawar chicharnainak : — ¿ Atumsha itiur nintimrume ? ¿ Jesúscha ju fiestanmasha tatimpiash ? — tu ininisarmiayi .

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Fariseo ainausha tura sacerdote juuntri ainausha chichaman akupinak : — Atumsha ni pujamuri nekaarmeka etserkataram , — tiarmiayi . Tura nekaawar , nuniangka Jesúsan achikiartas wakeriarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Pascua fiesta seis ( 6 ) kinta jeatak wajasamtai , Jesús Betania yaktanam wemiayi . Lázarosha Jesús inankimia nusha nu yaktanmasha pujumiayi .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Jesús Betanianam jeamtai , yurumkan yuwartas inarkarmiayi . Tura Marta yurumkan ukaimiayi . Tura Lázarosha , tura chikich ainausha Jesúsjai misanam iruntrar yuwarmiayi .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Tura yuwinai Maríkia kungkuti nardo tutain , nekas akik aa nuna litro japchirin ita , Jesúsa nawen mash ukatramiayi . Nuniasha nawen ni intashijai japir mujturmiayi . Turamtai jeasha mash kungkuimiayi .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Tura kungkutin ukaramtai , Judas Iscariote , Simónka uchiri nuni pujau , Jesúsa nuiniatirintiat , ukunam niin suruktin amia nuka chichaak :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: — Kichik musach takakmasar nu kuik jukir , nu kungkutikia sumakmin amiayi . Tura asamtai ¿ waruka au suruk kuikian juki , kuikiartichu ainaun sutsuksha ? — timiayi .

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Antsu Judaska kuikiartichu ainaun yaingtaska nunaka tichamiayi . Nuka Jesúsa nuiniatiri kuikiarin wainin asa , kuik engketinam chumpiar susam , nuna kasamnuyayi .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Judas tamati , Jesús chicharak : — Inaisata . Jumchik kinta arus wína iwiartusartin asaramtai , ju kungkutijaingkia ukatruri .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Kuikiartichu atumjai tuke irunui . Antsu wikia atumjaingkia tukeka pujuschatatjai , — timiayi .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Judío untsuri Jesús Betanianam pujawai tamaun antukar , wainkartas wearmiayi . Tura Lázaro jakaun Jesús inankimia nunasha wainkartas weriarmiayi .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Tura judío ainau untsuri Lázaro jakamunmaya nantakmiaun nekaawar , sacerdote ainaunka nemartan inaisar ukukiar , Jesúsan nekasampita tusar nemariarmiayi . Tura asaramtai sacerdote juuntri ainau mash iruntrar : Lázarosha maatai tusar chichaman najatawarmiayi .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Pascua fiesta jeatak wajasamtai , aints untsuri Jerusalénnum kaunkarmiayi . Tura kashin tsawaarar , Jesús tatatui tinamun antukarmiayi .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Nuna antukar numi nuken charukar jukiar , Jesúsjai ingkuniktai tusar , yaktanmaya jiinkiar untsuminak : — Yus juuntaitai . Yus akupkamu winá nuka nekas pengkeraitai . Nuka Israela apuri asa nekas pengkeraitai , — tiarmiayi .

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Jesús wekama burro uchirin wainak , Yuse chichame aarmawa nunisang keemsamiayi . Nu aarmauka nuwaitai :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: “ Jerusalén yaktanmaya ainautirmeka shamkairap . Jiistaram . Atumi apuri burro uchirin keemas winitramui . ”

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Jesús Jerusalénnum weamtai , ni nuiniatiri ainauti Yuse chichame yaanchuik aarmawa nunisang umirui , tuuka nintimrachmiaji . Tura ukunam nayaimpinam waketkiamtai , Jesús turatnun pachisar yaanchuik aarmawa nunaka nekas miatrusang umiawapi tusar nintimramiaji .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Aints ainau Jesúsan nemarsar wekainauka , Jesús Lázaron iwiarsamunmaya inankinun wainkau asar , ni wainkamurin chikich ainaun ujakarmiayi .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Tura ujakaram , chikich aints ainau Jesúsa turamurin nekaawar , Jesúsjai ingkiunikiartas Jerusalénnumia jiinkiarmiayi .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Tuminamtai fariseo ainau mai nuwamtak chicharnainak : — Pai , aints ainau nu aintsun nemarsacharti tusaram , surimkatatkamaram pengké tujinkarume . Jiistaram . Mash niin nemarinawai , — tunaiyarmiayi .

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Pascua fiesta jeamtai , chikich nungkanmaya ainau Yus juuntaitai tiartas Jerusalénnum untsuri kaunkarmiayi . Griego ainausha jumchik iruntrarmiayi .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Tura nu aints ainauka Felipen jiisar , nijai chichasartas taarmiayi . Felipeka Betsaida yaktanmaya aintsuyayi . Betsaidaka Galilea nungkanmaya yaktaitai . Tura griego chichau ainau Felipen chicharinak : — Sairua , iisha Jesús wainkatasar wakeraji , — tiarmiayi .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Tu tinam Felipe Andrésun weri , nijai metek tsaniasar wear Jesúsan ujakarmiayi .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Tu ujainam Jesús chichaak : — Wikia aints ayatun Yus akupkamu asan , yakí wetin kintarka jeatak wajasi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Nekasan tajarme : Wikia trigo jingkiajiya nunisketjai . Jingkiaji araachmauka tsapachu asa yujachayi . Antsu jingkiaji araamka , kauriat tsapain asa nukap yujaayi . Wisha nunisnak jakan nunia nantakin , untsuri nungkanmaya ainaun uwemtikratnuitjai .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Aints ni wakeramurinak nintimias jatan shamak pujakka , árak tsapaichua nunisang mengkakatnuitai . Antsu aints Yuse wakeramurinak nintimias jatan shamtsuk pujakka , árak tsapai nukap nerekua nunisang pujut nangkankashtinun jukitnuitai .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Aints wína umirtutan wakerakka , nekas wi turaja nunasha turati . Tura nuna turakka , wi nayaimpinam pujustatja nunisha pujustinuitai . Turamtai wína umirtukunka wína Apaachirka nekas pengker awajsatnuitai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: Nunia Jesús ataksha chichaak : — Yamaikia nukap napchau nintimsan pujajai . ¿ Wisha warintajak ? Apaachi , ¿ wína mantuwartas wakerutina nunaka inaitusarti titajash ? Atsa , nunaka pengké tichatatjai . Antsu turutawarti tusan taawitjai .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Apaachi , amin naarmin pachisar : Ameketme juuntam turamiarti tusan wakerajai , — timiayi . Jesús tamati iikia nayaimpinmaya chicham antukmiaji . Nu chichamka nuwaitai : — Wína naarun pachitsar : Ameketme juuntam turutiarti tusan , yanchuk aints ainaun nintimtikramiajai . Tura ataksha nintimtikratatjai .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Aints ainau nu chichaman antukar : Ipiamtarui tiarmiayi . Tura chikich ainausha chichainak : — Yuse awemamuri nijai chichasi , — tiarmiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús chicharak : — Wína antumtikruktaska nu chichamnaka akupturkachi , antsu atumin antumtikramkatas nu chichamnaka akupkayi .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Yamaikia ju nungkanam tunau ainia nunaka mash nekamtikiatatjai . Tura ju nungkanmaya apuri Satanásan nepetkatatjai .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Wína mantuwartas yakí takuriaramtai , mash nungkanmaya ainau wini winiarat tusan nintimtikrartinuitjai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Nuna taku ni jakatniurin aints ainaun nekamtikiamiayi .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Jesús tamati aints ainau chicharinak : — Iikia Yus umirkatin chicham aujkur : Mesíaska jatsuk tuke pujustinuitai tusar nekaji . Tu aarmau wainiatum ¿ waruka ame ‘ Yus akupkamuka aints wajas yakí takuntinuitai , ’ tame ? ¿ Nu Yus akupkamuka Mesíaschaukai ? Antsu nuchawaitkungka ¿ yaachita nusha ? — tiarmiayi .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Tu tinam Jesús aimiak : — Atumka teenam pujusairam tusan , wikia Yus akupkamu asan , paaniua nunisnak yamaikia jumchik kinta atumjaingkia pujustatjai . Tura asamtai atumsha Yuse uchiri wajasrum , paaniunam wekainawa nunisrumek paan nintimtursataram . Teenam wekainauka tuning wekaij tusarsha nekainatsui .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Wikia paaniunam tuke pujau asamtai , wína aintsur atasrum nekasampita turutiaram , — Jesús timiayi . Nuna tina we uumak pujusmiayi .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Jesús wainchati takatan timiá untsuri turau waininayat , judío ainau niin nekasampita ticharmiayi .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Tura Jesúsan nekasampita ticharu ainau yaanchuik Yuse chichame etserin Isaías naartin aarmia nunaka miatrusarang umirkarmiayi . Nu aarmauka nuwaitai : “ Apuru ¿ yaachia ii chichamencha nekasampita turammiaji ? ¿ Tura ii Apurisha ni kakarmarincha yaná inaktusmiayi ? ”

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Tura kichnasha Isaías aarmia nuka nuwaitai : “ Yus nu aints ainaun wainmichua nunisarang nintimrarat tusangka , paanka nintimtikrachmiayi . Tura asamtai ni jiijai jiiminayat , wainmichua nunisarang wainmaktatkamawar tujintinawai . Tu ainiachkungka paan nekaawarminuitai . Tura nintijai paan nintimsar ni tunaarin inaisaramtaikia , wikia nu aints ainaun uwemtikratnuitjai , ” Yus Isaíasan timiayi .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Isaías Jesúsa paaniurin wainkau asa , nuna timiayi .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Tu aarmau waininayat , judío ainau untsuri Jesúsan nekasampita tiarmiayi . Antsu judío juuntri ainausha jumchik Jesúsan nekasampita tinayat , Yus wína pengker nintimtursat tuuka nintimtsuk , antsu aints ainauka nekasar pengker nintimtursarat tusar , fariseo ainaun shaminak , iruntai jeanmaya jiirkiarai tusar , paanka wikia Jesúsan umirnuitjai ticharmiayi .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Nunia Jesús kakar chichaak : — Aints wína nekasampita turutinauka winaka turutinatsui , antsu wína Apaachir wina akuptukmia nunasha tinawai .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Tura wína waitinauka wína akuptukun waininawa nunisarang winasha waitinawai .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Wikia paaniunam pujau asan , wína nintimturina nusha ju nungkanam teenam pujusarai tusan tamiajai .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Wikia aints ainaun wait wajaktinnum akupkatasnaka tachamiajai . Antsu aints ainaun uwemtikratasan tamiajai . Tura asamtai aints wína chichamrun antukiat umirtachmataisha , wikia nu aintsnaka wiasmamtikiashtinuitjai .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Antsu aints wína nakitrinak wína chichamrun pachischaruka ningki wakerinak wait wajaktinaka juwinawai . Tura nungka amumatai , wína chichamrun pachischaru asar , wait wajaktiniun jukiartinuitai .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Wikia wína nintirjaingkia chichachuyajai . Antsu wína Apaachirka ningki wína akuptuku asa : Tu chichasta tusa , akatur akuptukmiayi .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Tura wína Apaachir akatur akuptukmia nunaka aints ainau pujut nangkankashtinun jukiarat tusa akuptukmiayi . Wikia nuna nekau asan , wína Apaachirka akatur akuptak : Tu tita turutmia nunisnak chichaajai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Pascua fiesta tsawaatsaing , Jesús ni Apaachirin waketkitas , ju nungkan ukuktin kinta jeatak wajasun nuna nekaamiayi . Tura ni aintsri ainautin ju nungkanam tuke ukurmaktin asa , iin nuwik aneenmimiaji nuna nangkamasang inangnamunam ni anengkratairin paan inakturmasmiaji .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Turamtai Satanás Judas Iscarioten , Simónka uchirin : Jesús surukta tusa nintimtikramiayi . Tura Jesús Yusnumia tau asa , yamaikia waketkitatjai tusa , tura ni Apaachirisha Jesúsan : Mash ainia nu inau atatme timiau asa , nunasha mash nekaamiayi . Tura tsaa jeamtai , iruntrar uwijan yuwaartas pujuinai ,

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Jesús wajaki wejmakrin aik wangkeas tarachin juki kachumamiayi .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Tura kiimiatinam yumin yarak , ni nuiniatiri ainautin nawen nijatramar , nunia tarach peaakmaurijai ii nawen mujturmarmiaji .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Nunia Simón Pedro nawen Jesús nijatratas wakeramaitiat nuka chicharak : — Apuru ¿ ameash wina nawer nijatrurtam ? — timiayi .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Tamati Jesús ayaak : — Ja ai , wi turaja nuka yamaikikia paanka nekarashtatme , antsu ukunam paan nekaratnuitme , — timiayi .

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Tamaitiat Pedro ayaak : — Apuru , ameka wina nawerka pengké nijatrurchatatme , — timiayi . Tamati Jesús chicharak : — Wikia nawemin nijarchamtaikia , wijaingkia tsaniasmeka pujuschamnawaitme , — timiayi .

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Tamati ataksha Pedro ayaak : — Apuru , takumka nawersha nijatruram uwejrusha kiiturta , tura muukrusha majetrurta , — timiayi .

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Tamaitiat Jesús chicharak : — Atsa , aints yamai maaingkia , namangkengka pakuichau atinuitai . Tura asamtai wárikia namangkenka nijamatsuk , aya nawenak nijartinuitai . Atumka yamaikia pakuichawa nunisrumek pujarme . Antsu mashkia pakuichawa nunisrumka pujatsrume , — timiayi .

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Mashkia pakuichawa nunisrumka pujatsrume , tímia nunaka niin suruktinun nekau asa timiayi .

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Tura ni nuiniatiri ainautin nawen nijatramar umis , Jesús ni wejmakrin entsar misanam keemas iin chichartamak : — ¿ Wi aitkaja juka waruka aitkawa tusaram nekarmek ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Wi nekasan atumi Apuri asamtai , atumka winaka nekasrum : Nuikiartinu tura Apuru turutrume .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Tura wikia atumi nuinin ayatnak , tura atumi apuri ayatnak : Mianchawaitjai tusan , atumi nawen nijatkamu asaram , atumsha nunisrumek : Mianchawaitjai tusaram , mai nuwamtak atumi nawe nijatnairataram .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Wikia mianchawaitjai titaram tusan , atumin nekaprakun aitkajrume .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Nekasan tajarme : Aintsu inatiri ni inamurinka nangkakashtinuitai . Tura aints akupamu ni akupamurinka nangkakashtinuitai .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Ju chichaman wi tajarme nu nekakrumka , tura umirkaram pujakrumka nekasrum warastinuitrume .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: Wi atumin mash eaku asan , mash paan nekajrume . Tura asan atum ainautirmin wínaka mashkia umirtukuitrume tusanka tatsujrume . Antsu kichkin pachisan : Wina umirtukchawaitai tajarme . Tura asamtai Yuse chichame aarmawa nunisang nekas umiktinuitai . Nu chichamka nuwaitai : “ Wijai yuya nuka wína nemasur wajasi , ” tu aarmawaitai .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Nuka turuntsaing yamaik ujaajrume . Tura wi nuna turuna umisamtai , winaka nekasampita turutinuitrume .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Nekasan tajarme : Aintsun wi akupaja nunasha nakitsuk anturinauka , winasha nunisarang nakitrutsuk anturtinawai . Tura wína anturtinauka wína akuptukuncha nunisarang anturinawai , — Jesús timiayi .

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Nuna tusa Jesús napchau nintimramiayi . Tura paan chichartamak : — Nekasan tajarme : Atumniang kichik wína anangkrua surutkatatui , — turammiaji .

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Turammatai Jesúsa nuiniatiri ainauti jiinisar : — ¿ Yanak takung taj ? tu nintimramiaji .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Tura wikia nekasan ni aneetiri asan , niin ayaamsan yuwakun pujumiajai .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Tura asamtai Simón Pedro ni uwejejai inakmas : Iniasta . ¿ Yana takung taj ? turutmiayi .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Turutmatai wikia Jesúsan iniakun : — Apuru ¿ yaachita ? — timiajai .

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
